title: Alison: Online Education App
description:
Learn Anything, Anywhere, Anytime For Free.

Earn globally recognised, CPD-accredited diplomas and certificates from over 5,500 courses. Join Alison‚Äôs community of 45 million+ learners from over 195 countries on the world‚Äôs largest free online learning and empowerment platform.

Are you looking to upskill? 

Or looking for a career change?

Perhaps, you want to launch a side hustle?

Whether you‚Äôre a student, a recent graduate, an employee, an entrepreneur, or simply a lifelong learner ‚Äì Alison gives you access to the tools you need to empower yourself and get closer to your dream future.

Learn across 9 categories: IT, Health, Language, Business, Management, Personal Development, Sales & Marketing, Engineering & Construction, and Teaching & Academics

WITH ALISON, YOU CAN
Tailor your learning based on your needs and interests
Build job-ready skills for in-demand roles
Grow industry-relevant knowledge and upskill
Showcase accredited Certificates and Diplomas on your resum√© 

WITH THE ALISON APP, YOU GET
Free access to 5,500+ mobile-friendly CPD-accredited courses
Course content suitable for use in areas with low internet connectivity
Personalized course recommendations 
Flexible self-paced learning at your own convenience
To schedule study reminders and track your progress
Synced coursework progress across all your devices


POPULAR CERTIFICATE COURSES
Media Studies - Gaming, the Internet and Social Media
Teaching English as a Foreign Language (TEFL)
Fundamentals of Health and Social Care
JavaScript Application Programming
Learning Lean Six Sigma: White Belt
Basics of Motivational Interviewing
Anger Management and Conflict Resolution

POPULAR DIPLOMA COURSES
Diploma in Caregiving
Diploma in Business Administration
Diploma in Customer Service
Diploma in Mental Health
Diploma in Environmental Management
Diploma in Workplace Safety & Health
Diploma in Food Safety

Learn with expert-curated study material: Increase your knowledge by getting access to over 5,000 free courses with certificates created by subject matter experts. Who knows, you might just end up being more skilled than your boss (if you aren't already).

Pick up right where you left off: Whether you‚Äôre at the beach, in the mountains, or lazing in bed under a blanket, your learning never has to stop. Unless of course, you want to stop.

Explore our extensive directory of industry-relevant courses: Is there a new skill out there? We've got a course for it. With our ever-evolving course library, learn data science, animation, marketing, cybersecurity, real estate, interior design, creative writing, and much more. When there is solid proof of alien life on Earth, we'll have a course on how to talk to them too.

Share your achievements: Get your certificates and diplomas posted right to your doorstep. Hang it on your wall or just hang out with it, we won‚Äôt judge.

Take your career forward with Alison in just a few clicks - empower yourself today!

Alison is a for-profit social enterprise, dedicated to ensuring anyone can study anything, anywhere, at any time, for free online.

summary: Unlock careers or learn skills for your next job in finance, marketing or coding

scraped_reviews.content: there is a lot of incredible material in here. however a really big issue is outdated courses. there needs to be a label for when these courses were originally created, I've gotten halfway through several courses on marketing and project management only to find out they were written when the internet was barely a household concept. I've had to find new courses several times after starting these
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your review. I'm sorry to hear that your experience at Alison was less than satisfactory. We will be taking your feedback on board and continue to improve our service, as our mission is to provide free learning to everyone so that each one of our learners can empower themselves. Thanks again for the feedback, and happy learning!

scraped_reviews.content: the fact that there are certificates, and diplomas is fantastic for leveling up your skills, building up your resume & stacking up your certificates & diplomas. This is fantastic! It really helped me for getting to the next level in terms of work and career in the medical as well as the tech field also. Although, there are so many different fields that you can learn from so that is a plus for anyone who is new to or exploring Alison. com
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jasmine, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Free education is always a winner in my book! The options for courses are endless. I only have 1 issue with the new updated version, my navigation bar is blocking me from exiting ads. And it's quite frustrating because now I have to change my navigation bar settings for just one app. Please check on this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi , thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the course I am taking. The instructor makes some mistakes along the way and does not fully explain things as much as I would like in the videos, so I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. The course material should be vetted better and edited without errors. Seems more "On the fly" than a lesson plan or scripted presentation.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi , thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly was going great for several months(about 9 months roughly). Now suddenly it refuses to let me login today. used it the past 2 weeks no issues. Today it's unable to find my account but says I already have one when I try to re-sign up with my email. PLEASE HELP. TIA! . Edit to update: no longer an issue. It was likely a minor problem already being sorted out when I'd reported the problem. THANK YOU KINDLY! üòá
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so sorry you are facing this issue, Emilee. Could you drop us more details about the issues at support@alison.com? We will then address the problem immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Slow all the way around!! It doesn't matter if I use the app or the website! It's constantly lagging and The quality of the videos is hit or miss.. and most of the courses won't help in obtaining an actual career.. while there are a few courses on here that can help with up-skilling.. I wish there were more legitimate course options.. more certifications, etc..
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there. All Alison courses are CPD accredited. Alison's courses are accessible worldwide and we provide free access to anyone who wishes to learn.
As for the issue, could you please try to use another network to see if it can improve? If it doesn't help, please reach out to us at support@alison.com. We want to get this fixed for you.

scraped_reviews.content: UI is simplified yet there is no tutorial (trial and error). Charts are very difficult to read on mobile - many charts read like you're learning how many syllables a word contains. It's very jarring! There are also quite a few grammatical errors. There are a broad swath of jobs skills to choose from however they appear random and overly basic with no structure. Adding a goals tab would benefit. Slides, thus far, are technical and offer little in the way of example, especially the "how."
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Casey, thank you for your feedback. This certainly sounds like a frustrating experience. Could you please contact us at support@alison.com and let us know the name of the course with the issues? We will forward details to our Publishing team to sort all issues ASAP.

scraped_reviews.content: The information itself is very helpful, and the courses themselves are truly free. The Certificates all require payment, and the amount of typos and grammatical errors throughout the courses is very high and takes away from the professional feel of the subject matter. Also, test questions get marked as wrong if you enter singular or plural and they happen to want the one you didn't enter, even though your answer is technically correct.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Misty, thank you for bringing this to our attention and we want to apologise for any inconveniences or problems that these issues caused you. Could you please let us know the name of the course to support@alison.com? We will notify our course publishing team about this and we will get this fixed as soon as possible. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I couldn't just search available courses, I had to complete a questionnaire so courses could be suggested. The questionnaire requires a specific number of items for each question, but a lot of options didn't suit me. I focused on business and IT items, but it had no courses to suggest based on my selections. My suggestion is to add an option to bypass the questionnaire and search for courses.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rachel, thank you for your comment! Please note that there is an option to search for courses on the app. Simply click on the "Explore" tab at the bottom of the screen to access the search page. If you have any additional questions please do not hesitate to contact us support@alison.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I would give this three or least a half star. The app is great, found amazing classes. But over time I'm learning, I fallen out of interest from the videos. Like sooo many videos of the intro and what I'm studying. I rather watch two videos and read a article. Than do a test, cause my brain would ask what we read in that article and helps me to engaging a lil more in my courses. Little more reading and less watching videos. Cause we can watch a video through phones and not take in anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Haillee, we really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and suggestions with us. We will certainly consider your suggestions in future app developments. In the meantime, if you have any questions at all, feel free to contact our customer service team - support@alison.com. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I love it!! Only thing, I recommend telling students: when typing an answer in the box during your assessment test, be sure to use numeric value or you get the answer wrong even if you typed it out. Ex "four" needs to "4". That is all. Love the friendly encouragement emails on the way to completing your goal. A great value for completing the first and second degree. Thank you so much!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shinysol1, we really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and suggestions with us. We will certainly consider your suggestions in future app developments. In the meantime, if you have any questions at all, feel free to contact our customer service team - support@alison.com. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE the Alison curriculum. However, I downloaded the app to learn on the go when I don't have my laptop on me, and the app is not user-friendly at all. It's overall buggy, there are multiple intrusive ads, and perhaps the worst part is when I'm doing checkpoints and tests, they don't show me the entire question. I am learning about floristry and during the testing they only show me part of the sentence instead of the full question. It's extremely frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shay, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: The Alison online education app is awesome! At first, I wasn't sure how the app would compare to being directly online, but my experience is a positive one. The courses that I've chosen work well in the app. Also, my progress is saved at certain intervals, so that my place of study isn't lost. Using the app has been a pleasant and focused experience thus far. I like it, and recommend it to those contemplating improving their skills!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Norman , we are happy to hear you had a positive experience! We value your input and encourage you to let us know more details about your experience with us. Keep Learning, Be Empowered. üòä

scraped_reviews.content: Alison is the best online educational platform I have found so far, and I have tried quite a few of them. There are so many options. Just about anything You want to learn, Alison has at least 1 if not numerous classes on the subject. Some instructors are better than others, but it costs nothing to try a class. If the instructor puts You to sleep, drop the class and find a better one. The only cost is to get a diploma. There are occasional ads but I don't think they are a burden.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Billys, thank you so much for your kind review! We are thrilled to hear that our platform has made learning accessible and easier for you. Best wishes from the Alison team. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy the learning. I wish there was more description of the subsections and the menu was broken down more. A precursor of what to learn from the subsection would be advantageous to be more prepared for the quizzes and tests. I am currently taking course on property management and wish there was a plan for a diploma instead of paying separately for certificates of several courses. Learning for free is great and paying for the certificates is nice instead of paying for classes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Kelly, thanks so much for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: At first I enjoyed learning and trying to pass the tests. Until I got to the video part of the cognitive techniques on anxiety and mindfulness. I have a very hard time understanding what the lady is even saying in the videos. I've tried to watch it several times and she rambles on and whatever she is saying is so hard to understand I can't learn any of those parts. Maybe just stick with the reading it and learning or getting someone who can talk so we can understand them.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello There, please contact our Customer support team at support@alison.com and let us know the name of the course, our Publishing team will check the course and help to sort the issue out.

scraped_reviews.content: Alison provides a 'taste' of the course material so you can decide whether it is worth your time and money. Don't make the mistake of believing this app replaces paid tuition. There's a vast amount of courses to choose from, you can search by categories, or keywords. Courses selection is taken from a variety of degree options, including (but not limited to) certification and diploma. Highly recommend for prospective students who aren't sure about their career choice(s).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sonja. We can‚Äôt thank you enough for your kind words about Alison. Your review means a lot to us and lets us know we are on the right track! Best wishes from the Alison team. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: Great classes. Most are very short and to the point. They are free unless you want/need a diploma or completion certificate. Most of the completion classes are about 1.5 hours and diploma classes start at about 10 hours. Good information if you just want to increase your knowledge of certain areas. I have taken about 20 different classes just to learn a little about everything. Also if your test questions do not load correctly, this app was designed for desktop/laptop applications not mobile.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi DeAnn, we really appreciate the time you took to write such a detailed review! We are really glad you are enjoying Alison‚Äôs app. In the meantime, if you have any questions at all, feel free to contact our customer service team - support@alison.com. Continue learning on Alison and empower yourself!

scraped_reviews.content: Good:) edited, the courses are still admirable but now it's minor discrepancies like, when I get the answer wrong, it doesn't show me the right responses (before the final exam), like the prior version did. Henceforth, I'm not able to download nor forward my criteria and certifications that were completed to my digital profiles. Finally, the update is a little off putting vs. the prior app installment, I prefer to excel with more content than videos IMO! Ty for reading folks and enjoy.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Renee, thanks so much for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: Overall, the app is great if you want structured courses. However, I find it quite irritating to always have to always tap the screen before I open the app (after clicking the app icon). Some of the courses are too outdated for 2025 and I almost always have to supplement them with external resources. I don't know about others but I personally feel like the alternate player should be the main player because the main one is very bad in all aspects as a video player.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Gabriel, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app most, it's nice platform but I want to suggest one thing more to add in this , that is a "Scholarship plan" please Alison Team work on it because so many students need it and I'm also one of them. overall you're better than many other platforms.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sabahat, thanks so much for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison app. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and suggestions with us. We will certainly consider your suggestions in future app developments. Best wishes from the Alison team. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: WellI can't use any of the certifications in montreal to apply for any jobs but it gives you a general idea of what you want to learn.A lot of the questions have nothing to do with what you learn.You'll get a question but the answer was never in the video. also I wish there was a way to bookmark or save courses. That you wanna take in the future.

I‚Äôve been enjoying Alison learning so far. Some courses are definitely better than others‚Äînot all are created equal‚Äîbut overall it‚Äôs been a useful experience. I‚Äôm still unsure how much weight these courses carry for job applications or professional references in Australia, but they‚Äôve been helpful for personal learning and skill-building.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Waldo, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Thank you for offering such great free courses, and I really enjoyed learning on the platform in the past. However, the mobile app needs improvement in terms of frequent crashes, too many Ads, and quizzes marking correct answers wrong due to spelling errors. All these issues had disrupted my learning journey, therefore I am relying on another platform. But fixing these issues would make again Alison a much better experience than before.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mohamed, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Your app has a very big problem, whenever I leave the app and come back I'm logged out, it doesn't matter if I just left for 5 mins, it's also very picky on what speed of Internet it opens with, it's a very helpful app but frustrating to load or open, I would appreciate if you made it lighter and removed the login issue, otherwise great app but please fix it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Stephen. Thanks for your feedback! We're aware of the login issue and are already working on a fix in upcoming releases. It‚Äôs mainly related to internet loading speed, but we know it‚Äôs frustrating and are improving stability to make the app lighter and smoother to use. We appreciate your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: awesome app and good that they don't make it very easy as you should just focus on gaining the information as knowledge and not just get things done for you. the tests and their timing are excellent aswell as the structure and friendly theme or environment. love the light and clean colours of light green and light orange with cream white
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Khwezi, thanks so much for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I really like the app and the courses, but I always have to log into my account again and again when I go out of the app, and then it takes me like 5 tries to get logged in. it's annoying and frustrating. it never used to do that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so sorry you are facing this issue, Janie. Could you drop us more details about the issues at support@alison.com? We will then address the problem immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: This App is great for learning about multiple topics. I do however prefer learning by listening or watching videos instead of reading the lessons. I can read the subtitles that way I still get the reading done. Well done on adding the feature to download lessons. Keep up the good work and Thank you.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks so much for your positive feedback. We are happy that you are happy, and we are looking forward to your learning journey with us. Keep Learning, Be Empowered. üòä

scraped_reviews.content: Not usable on Motorola Stylus. I've tried changing the settings, doesn't matter. Ads take up the entire page, the back button won't let you escape, shutting the app off and coming back only works if the next ad is actually closable, and it can take a few tries to get one. Most of them don't even show the exit button. Not worth it on this device. Course material varies. Some of it is very amateur.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Victoria, thank you for your comment! Please try to reinstall the app or use another network. If the issue still persists do not hesitate to contact us support@alison.com. Our agents will sort the issue out ASAP.

scraped_reviews.content: Alison courses are very flexible and detailed. You can learn at your own pace and be always reminded to complete your course when you haven't checked into your courses for some time. The visuals also make it a lot easier to understand and follow the course
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ula, thanks so much for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I want to know why as soon as I get to 80% done with the course. It then logs me out and I can't seem to log in again to continue where I left off. So now I've lost all my progress and won't be able to get my Diploma. Luckily I didn't pay yet for the Diploma otherwise they would have scammed me with the money. Whatever you'll do don't trust this app because I uninstalled it and re-downloaded it and it showed I can't log in anymore and shows an error. its a scam guys
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are so sorry you are facing this issue, Lyall. Could you drop us more details about the issues at support@alison.com? We will then address the problem immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Great learning experience- easy to find courses, courses laid out clearly, easy to navigate. 1 caveat though - not having American English as an option is causing a little bit of an issue with testing as I miss a few answers due to the spelling differences...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Dawn, thank you for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Happy learning! üòä In the meantime, if you have any questions at all, feel free to contact our customer service team - support@alison.com

scraped_reviews.content: It was great and easy to use on my phone. I came across it for the first time how joyful I am that words can not even describe. Thanks to the founder and all who are working to keep it up. Indeed Education for all is possible especially for some of us who live in west Africa with little or no income at all and desiring to learn.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Emmanuel, we are so glad to hear that you are enjoying the Alison App! We would love to make your learning experience even more positive. Is there anything you would recommend us improving?

scraped_reviews.content: course are clear well structured and detailed, concise and direct. but less visual illustration, deceptively manipulative:I mean why can't you just make it clear that the certificate is not free instead of hiding in the disguise of free course just to lure people into reading it and after that to be met with a shocking unexpected disappointment to pay for certification while they can't even input all the attributes/3 maximum types of names: first, middle and last names? Simple as A B C .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dadi, thank you for bringing this to our attention and we want to apologise for any inconveniences or problems that these issues caused you. Could you please let us know the name of the course to support@alison.com? We will notify our course publishing team about this and we will get this fixed as soon as possible. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: I won't be using this app again and customer service is not helpful at all. Answering my enquiries 2 days later. Once finished my course I realised i had my name without my surname on it. I changed it in the same day and contacted them to make sure they printed my full name. I got my certificate with just my first name and they answer my request 2 days later saying they cant resend it and if I wanted it changing, i needed to purchase it again full price ... so unprofessional.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Juan, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: very good and well detailed explanation from Microsoft excel 2013 ....The guy Toby A, explaining is so good üòäüòä I'm satisfied with him ..but I'm not happy with the amount of the certificate ...I have finished 3 courses now yet I can't collect the certificates .. please review the certificate amount after which I'll rate 5 stars for now I'll give you 4 stars üëç
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Destiny! We're the only platform offering ALL courses for free. We charge for Certificates to help us create more free courses. If you can't purchase a Certificate, share your Alison Profile, which updates with your completed courses, at no cost. High-quality learning on our platform is always free. No other app offers this.

scraped_reviews.content: Of course. Rating Alison requires looking at it from different angles, as its value depends entirely on your goals. Here‚Äôs a detailed breakdown. Overall Rating: 7.5 / 10 Summary: Alison is an excellent platform for free, foundational learning and skill acquisition. It's best for self-motivated learners looking to explore new topics or add a certificate to their resume without financial investment. However, it has significant limitations regarding certification value and depth of learning.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Vincent, thanks for your comment. Alison courses do not provide external accreditation, but we have our own expert team who work on course content. Alison's courses are accessible worldwide, and we provide free access to anyone who wishes to learn. In the meantime, if you have any questions, please email us at support@alison.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This is a great online educational platform that accommodates all learning programs and individuals. You don't need to know it all to be here and if you do know it all, it doesn't hurt to get some more knowledge and insight. It has been great for me and Alison remains my number one online educational study platform. side note: they should reduce the cost of claiming certifications though üòÇüòÇ
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi OBINNA, thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: Although I've not been so consistent in my learning process Allison gives you a self paced learning experience and it's super amazing what the team is doing. Great UI/UX interface and an easy-to-navigate environment.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks so much for your feedback! We are really glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Continue learning on Alison and empower yourself!

scraped_reviews.content: Great application for learning, the courses are arranged in order and easy to learn. You can learn anywhere you wanted online or offline, The choice is yours. Thank you Alison for providing such an amazing app which help so many people aquire knowledge for free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Erick, thanks so much for your feedback! We are glad you are enjoying the Alison App. Happy learning! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: LOTS of bugs in this app. The more I tried to explore the app, the more bugs I discovered. I can't even try to use this app, it's just not reliable with all the bugs getting in the way of proper function and use.
So far, I am enjoying studying on Alison. The only suggestion I have is perhaps to let people know the certificates are not free although the study material is. otherwise great experience so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Swabahat, thank you for your feedback. Alison's courses are completely free to study. Once you have completed an Alison course, you have the option to purchase a certificate, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world. If you have any further questions, please reach out to us at support@alison.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Went to sign up, when it brings me to the contract page that's it. I hit continue and my phone vibrates, but that's it. Doesn't bring me to the next page.

scraped_reviews.content: This course is motivationally best in its simplest form to understand and focus to completing each course in due time. Jacquiie Malau of Papua New Guinea.üëç

scraped_reviews.content: It would be great if there was a way to bookmark courses we intend to do in the future rather than having to search for the courses all over again or having to enroll to 'save' the course for when I intend to finally start it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi , thanks for reaching out. Do you mind sending us an email to support@alison.com to let us know what problems you are experiencing? We will then address these immediately.

scraped_reviews.content: With the quality of education they offer on Alison, making is free is awesome. Can you guys just help us out with the amount of ads. So learning can be more fun. I want to appreciate the team(developers and everyone) who created this app.

scraped_reviews.content: Very helpful and amazing can't compare this app to any other app , it's in perfection. Download it and you will never regret

scraped_reviews.content: I switched from Duo because they force feed so many new words, I couldn't remember them. I began to notice the AI voices would mispronounce a lot of words. Busuu is nice in that along with AI, there are videos of real speakers so not only can you hear them pronounce the words correctly, you can see how they move their mouths. My only problem is in Latin Spanish, progress is stuck on 1% fluent and no words are being added to vocabulary review, whereas I'm not having that problem w/ Italian.

Three years on. Subscription won't sync between devices. Progress won't sync. But at least the useless leader board points sync. Excellent priorities. Refunding subscription. Again. (Don't offer to help. This is basic functionality. Get it right.) Another year, another year of not being able to access the app. App logged out. Won't let me log in. Won't send a password reset. Still took my money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Mike!

We are really keen to assist you.

Could you please make sure to get in contact with us at team@busuu.com?

Many thanks,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: I was considering buying a premium subscription after Duolingo lapsed, but no more. The ads to buy premium are egregiously in your face, popping up at least 10 times per lesson, completely covering the screen. The other ads are the worst kind, too, find the x or the >> three times in a row for the scammy apps you've seen a million times before. And on top of that, the lesson often fails to load after you finish the ad, and you have to do it all over again. All huge red flags. No thx

Busuu will introduce 5 new words & a new type of conjugation all at once, explain nothing, quiz you on it *once*, & then move on without giving you time to absorb anything. And reviewing lessons doesn't even count towards your streak! Phrase translations are often missing, no option to pause and resume lessons (which are sometimes 10m long), and the ads for premium are INCESSANT. Clean UI, some great features, and the progress tracking is clear and satisfying, but I'll be looking elsewhere.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Mason,

We're sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction with Busuu.

We noted your feedback and passed it on to the relevant team for future improvements.

If you need any assistance, please write to us at team@busuu.com.

Sincerely,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: Learning Korean Great app I find myself really enjoying the lessons. The lessons aren't overwhelming. 12 days in and I can understand most words. They aren't punishing free customers for not paying for a subscription. What I would change 1. Going back within a lesson; accidentally hit continue and had to restart the lesson (this might be a paid subscription feature) 2. Adding all words to the dictionary (again might be a paid subscription feature) Overall great app Highly recommend

UPDATE: Serves ads but course content no longer loads! Useless! Better than Duo, but over a mere week they've become so aggressive about advertising Premium at every opportunity I am no longer considering purchasing a subscription, especially considering they can't be bothered to create speech segments that actually work. It doesn't matter how simple the word or sentence, how fast or slow I speak, whether there's background noise, it just fails me every time. Also takes forever to load.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Kilgore,

Thank you for the detailed feedback about ads and other issues.

Please try reinstalling the app or updating the app to its latest version as the problem with speech recognition was solved.

Best regards.

Busuu team,

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, does well at teaching the basics + important things to know (like how to refer to certain people, language etiquette in certain countries, etc.). Just wish there were more language options; I'm personally hoping for an Irish course. If you're looking for good teaching, this is a good app, but if you're looking for more diversity in languages, you might wanna find another app. If an Irish course is added, I might just switch from Duolingo to Busuu entirely.

It's OK, but It has some problems. (Russian) 1. The audio to hear the reply to a question just plays the question instead of the response. 2. You also cannot click words to see them defined or hear them pronounced to refresh your memory. You have to wait for use another app or wait & hope a future exercise will say the word you're not sure about & miss the reinforcement chances. 3. All the audio is very quiet. Even in a silent room, I have to repeat it many times & can't hear the nuances.

The lessons in this app are really good, and I appreciate actually learning about the language, but I usually can't do more than one at a time. I watch the ad to get a new one, but it just stays stuck on the loading screen (and of course the ad always loads fine... so I just watch it for nothing). I wish I could actually do a few lessons at a time.

This app just keeps getting worse!! I'm still no better at speaking (actually conversing) in Spanish. It deletes your streak when you choose to review yesterday's lesson or an earlier one to strengthen understanding instead of just moving to the next lesson. It doesn't give you an English translation in the answer section most times so when you forget a word or don't understand a sentence there's nothing to remind you. GARBAGE BUSUU!! WASTED MONEY!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

We are sorry to hear about your disappointment with our app.

Could you please email us at team@busuu.com? We would like to hear more about your experience.

Best regards,

The Busuu Team.

scraped_reviews.content: Great app for learning a language, much more relaxing than Duolingo. just a couple of small nitpicks: it would be nice if the hiragana, katakana, and Romani could be accessed from the main lesson area to the review area. second, I prefer Duolingo's way of ha doing lessons, which is keeping you on the question on an incorrect answer until you give a correct one, unlike Busuu, which moves on, and repeats the question at the end.

Update: Poor design once you pay for premium, was not automatic. Had to google the issue and found the solution to "restore purchase" then app was working correctly. I will add 2 stars to my initial rating. Poorly designed. Upgraded to premium, but still got ads and could not access premium. I canceled and lost money from the subscription. Is this a scam to get at least a monthly payment? Very upset. Maybe possible to go through credit card company to deal with the fraud.

This is usually such a thorough and helpful app for learning languages. The content is in reasonably sized chunks and the explanations make so much sense. I used Busuu to practice Latin American Spanish, Japanese, German and French. The Arabic course needs A LOT of work though. Not only does it need more lessons but I shouldn't be getting quized on words until all of the letters/characters have been covered. Especially in review mode it would be good if there was an option to just review letters

I like this app a lot more than Duolingo, I like that it has more real life listening examples, etc. Where this app becomes problematic is that I can never get the lessons to actually load on my phone. I could click the "watch ad to open lesson" button 15 times, watch 15 ads, and when I close the ad it doesn't open the lesson so I try it again. It works no problem on my computer though, but this is super inconvenient, and honestly makes me want to find another app that doesn't waste my time.

The app is great for learning in a structured way. However, the developers need to fix the audio issue. you have to increase the volume, and then the ad loads with a louder volume which gets annoying. Also, many times after you watch an ad, the lesson won't load. you have to restart the application and rewatch an ad to load the lesson.

This app has some really good information about grammar and fun tips along the way. there are videos of real people pronouncing words and sentences. The community part is an amazing addition. It allows native speakers of the language that you are learning to help correct spelling, grammar, or even pronunciation of words and sentences. I'm sure there are better ways to learn a language, but this has kept me working on it day by day.

I have a few issues with this app, and they are frustrating because they would be relatively simple to improve upon. 1. The free version regularly prompts you to watch advertisements, which load seamlessly. The lesson itself frequently crashes. 2. At least at the B2 level, the lessons START with a lot of very layered and nuanced topics about environmentalism, burnout, etc, have you listen to/read long passages about them, and THEN LATER do lessons covering vocabulary and grammar.

It seems good on the surface. My concern is that the app encourages you to correct other students work. While that is usually fine, I have noticed a number of students, who are not native speakers, incorrectly marking people's work. This could be confusing. So I have decided, for my part, to ignore other people's comments on my own work for now.

So far, I like the overall experience with this app, compared to duolingo. However, I did notice some discrepancy between the data regarding fluency percentages in relation to word strength. When I open the application this morning, I had a mere one 'strong' word, "Czƒô≈õƒá!" Oddly enough, I hadn't quite memorized the exact spelling for the word I had supposedly learned fluently. After practicing my vocabulary, and strengthening my skills in the other 11 , my fluency remained at 3%.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Jess,

We're sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction with Busuu.

So that we can better understand the problem you are experiencing, please contact us at the following e-mail address: team@busuu.com, and our team will be happy to help you.

We look forward to hearing from you.

Sincerely,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using the free version for a week or so. and I like it so far. less money than duolingo. should I decide to purchase. What bugs me though, is that the charges are recurring?? if you can remind us ahead of time that it's ABOUT to renew, why can't you just remind us its about to expire?? I think you count on people quitting and forgetting about their subscription and get charged again for something their not using. If i pay for a year, cancel that same day, will I still get my year?

This app provides a lot of video pronunciation examples and some translations and explanations. Writing, listening, and speaking are addressed. But the community-correction approach is uneven and didn't meet my needs. Regarding the 7-day trial: It wasn't easy to cancel the 7-day free premium. The Cancel Subscription button only appeared in the Google app, not the browser. I wrote to Busuu's help email and got an auto-reply saying they'd respond within 72 hours (which could be beyond the 7 days).
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Deborah,

We are sorry to hear about your disappointment with our support team and our response times.

I have checked and confirmed that you have already been able to cancel your free Premium trial subscription.

Kind regards,

The Busuu Team.

scraped_reviews.content: would be a 5 star. unfortunately it lies and says you can learn for free, well once you get up to about chapter 7 it requires you to have premium. they'll say you don't that you can "watch ad" but no matter how many adds you watch you still can't continue on... unless they can fix, don't waste your time and how would emailing you help? the only thing that would help is you updating your app so it doesn't do this. what a pointless reply!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Chance,

Thank you very much for your feedback.üòÆÔ∏è

Try to reinstall the app, as it usually fixes the issue.

If the issue persists, please do not hesitate to contact us team@busuu.com

Thank you very much!

Busuu team,

scraped_reviews.content: I started learning Mandarin Chinese, and after two other failed attempts with different resources, using Busuu made it make sense. Much much better than the Duolingo "repeat this phrase ad nauseum and never learn to build sentences." Busuu gave me grammar instruction and let me interact with native speakers. I can review words I've learned and retake lessons as much as I want, and it's all in the mobile app. Well worth the subscription price for me.

After using the free version for about a month, I signed up for the annual subscription during a sale ($35, 75% off the normal subscription price, and even the renewal is locked in at 50% off the normal price of $127), and it has worked out very well so far. Doing about 12 language courses at the same time. Only current issue is can't access the leader board function as of two days ago. Contacted tech support and they're looking into the issue.

I really hate to say it, but inferior to DuoLingo, if you're not willing to pay for the full version. Speaking practice? Need premium. Reviewing what you've learned? Need premium. I've been using the app for two weeks, and starting today I either have to buy premium, or need to watch an ad to start each lesson, on top of the ads at the end. Even DuoLingo doesn't throw this many ads at you. I wish I could rate this app higher, but I can't.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Ursus,

Busuu offers free access to our complete courses. This model is made possible by the support of advertisements displayed within the app in our Free access.

We noted your feedback and passed it on to the relevant team for future improvements.

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: Really hate that the German letters are not available on the app. There are still way too many features unavailable unless you purchase the premium version. I do really like the feature on the app that lets members practice writing and speaking with other native speakers (but a lot of it seems only available to premium members).

scraped_reviews.content: too little repetition and in languages within other characters than English it is impossible to write them so you have to skip these exercises and you won't learn them. Some exercises are poor in context so the learning experience is minimal. There is a lot of promise in this app so keep on going. thanks for the update. one more request: my eye sight is bad, so it would help me to be able to zoom in. especially when the characters are in Arabic‚ò∫Ô∏è
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Mark,

Thanks for your feedback.

We noted your feedback and passed it on to the relevant team for future improvements.

Sincerely,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: i really enjoy this app, much more so than duolingo, but i do have a gripe about it. in the japanese course, it is IMPOSSIBLE to skip the katakana and hiragana lessons without watching an ad or paying for premium. when i started a busuu account, i already knew katakana and hiragana, but theres no way to disable or skip those lessons unless i want to watch an ad, which is REALLY annoying. other than that its very nice.

I like this app so I purchased a Premium subscription. I do have 2 requests though: 1) Please INCREASE the kanji and hiragana FONT Size!!! It's really difficult to differentiate between „Å≥ and „Å¥, for example. I don't have this issue in other languages apps. And 2) I'd really like the option of turning off all Romaji - I think this is a crutch that will hold me back from improving my reading skills. Thanks for listening!

This is a great app to learn a new language and it is amazing to have real people to interact with but the common issue is the constant pop up advertising after every short lesson of spicy ads and its very annoying and gross. Also when you try to exit out of it you have to exit at least 3-4 times in with the premium pop up before you get onto the actual app again then repeat. It doesn't make it worth it to make you buy premium as they think they do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Nia,

Thanks for your feedback!

If you‚Äôve seen an inappropriate ad, please report it to team@busuu.com so we can investigate and remove it. We appreciate your help in keeping our platform safe and enjoyable for everyone.

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: I had been using Duolingo for over a year to try to learn Japanese and a few months working on Dutch. I switched to Busuu a few weeks ago for my Dutch study. I was skeptical at first, but this app has blown me away. The chapter structure is perfect and the lessons accommodate multiple learning styles. Grammar and spelling concepts are explained very well and in ways that are easy to remember. I feel more confident in my understanding of Dutch after a few weeks on Busuu than a few months on DL!

As far as a language learning app, I liked the setup and the lessons were good, I just don't think it's style worked for me (my lack of consistency didn't help with retention). The app is also really pushy about premium to the point that the ads seem longer than the exercises. Plus there's forced participation in their "community" for someone to check your exercises or you get random requests from people to check their work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Andrew,

Thanks for sharing your feedback with us.

We noted your feedback and passed it on to the relevant team for future improvements.

Sincerely,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: Only usable if you pay for it. The ads are not subtle and often lock you into one of those horrible "mini game" demos that are impossible to leave. Central American Spanish is locked behind the paywall. I used it for about 10 mins before it earned itself an uninstall. Find an alternative if you value your time. I'm OK with ads for a free service, but not 10 seconds every 30 seconds. It's worse than YouTube, and that's saying something.

I started using this app early this year instead of duolingo, because I don't want to support AI for language. its a cheap shortcut that hurts the environment and lessens authenticity, as well as just risking more outright mistakes. The free trial of premium was alright, i liked the clips of native speakers, but the incessant advertisement about 70, 75, 80% off deals for a subscription that's still overpriced at the "70% markdown" and to top it off I get back on and see theyve added ai now too.

I love this app. I'm learning Japanese and it's taught me so much more than Duolingo did. It explains stuff so much better. When I was using Duolingo I felt like after every lesson I had to go Google something I didn't understand, or something that wasn't explained, but I don't have to on Busuu! I love that you're able to access the main lessons for free, and there's no hearts or energy meter to limit my learning either. I also like how it shows photo examples with the lessons.

Threw things at me too quickly and randomly became too hard for me. I end up having to retake the lessons a bunch or not even trying until the end-of-unit review. Ads (usually unskippable) occur every 2 seconds and happen more often as you advance. I get you need profit, but it's boring and repetitive. The only thing I like is, unlike Duolingo, it teaches more practical things to learn as a beginner. For example: common phrases, questions, greetings, goodbyes, etc.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Cameron,

We're sorry for any inconvenience.

Busuu offers free access to our complete courses. This model is made possible by the support of advertisements displayed within the app in our Free access.

We noted your feedback and passed it on to the relevant team for future improvements.

Best regards,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: The lessons are quick but effective. I got through a chapter and was able to follow a conversation about the topic immediately! I also love that they let native speakers give input on a learner's exercises. I don't love how frequently they ask you to buy a premium subscription. SEVERAL times each time I open the app. Notifications, pop-ups, ads within the app, after just about every lesson. It's a bit annoying.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:

Many thanks for your feedback.

Thanks for using Busuu and good luck with your studies! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: I use the Busuu app for Japanese, and it's been very helpful. I'm currently about 25% done with the A2 level lessons. The lessons don't drag on, they have good material, and it's relatively easy to understand. The vocab and grammar drills are also very helpful. I would love to see a couple additions to the app. Voice recognition for vocab and grammar drills (instead of just text input). And being able to save particularly impactful lessons for future review. I'd also like a button to copy text.

Great for fresh beginners, but not higher levels. I am a slightly more advanced beginner in korean (thought still definitely still a beginner!) and I tested out of all avaliable free classes. It didn't have much for me to learn and the vocabulary practice wasn't avaliable for the free version, so it wasn't for me. But, they have a system where native speakers can review your speaking and writing which is super cool and helpful! If you are just starting a new language I would recommend!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Julia,

Thank you for your lovely review ü•∞.

We're happy to see that you're enjoying our community!

Good luck with your further studies!

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: Misleading billing and no reasonable free option. I tried to get the promised 7 day free trial, but it immediately tried to bill my card for a year. Luckily, my payment method in google is expired, so it didn't work. I would have subscribed after a trial period if I liked it. I tried to keep using the free version, but every 10-15 seconds, the screen goes to a "free trial" page, which you then have to skip before going forward. Impossible to use this way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Dear Angela,

We're sorry for the confusion with the 7-day free trial and the interruptions in the free version. Please contact team@busuu.com for assistance. Your feedback is invaluable, and we're working to improve your experience.

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: They do seem to have fixed previous bugs. This is a pretty good app through the A1 level, covers the basics well, but the difficulty escalates sharply early in A2 and there aren't enough practice lessons, drills, or explanations. I'm now completely lost in verb tenses and will probably quit at this point. I don't think you could become fluent using this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Sarah,

Your feedback is very important and much appreciated. It plays a vital role in shaping our service and improving our customers' experience. Every comment is carefully reviewed and shared with the corresponding teams.

If you have any additional comments, we'd love to hear from you at team@busuu.com (mailto:team@busuu.com)!

Busu...

scraped_reviews.content: I write this review as someone wanting to get back to studying Japanese. If you're an absolute beginner, you probably would be fine picking this app up; it certainly has some fun gimmick in being able to engage with native speakers to an extent. However, if you're at an intermediate level, you'll notice immediately what is lacking here: kanji. This is a critical component for anyone wanting to go beyond elementary reading, and even makes it harder to absorb vocabulary as kanji is in itself a big giveaway for the meaning of a word. I couldn't find any setting to turn kanji on or off (although you can switch between kana and romaji). Other things I find lacking: - advertised a placement test but I did not see any such option when I started the Japanese course - requiring payment info to do the premium trial (always a scummy move when a company tries to automatically begin payment after the trial period) - I find the pictures can be big giveaways for vocabulary meaning during the tests, which makes it artificially easier when doing recognition testing - pictures should only be prompts for recall/production. - Speakers at times do not speak clearly and mumble or speak deadpan, which makes it hard to clearly understand sentences Some of these flaws likely carry to other languages - others may be unique to the Japanese unit only. I can't offer a rating as far as the other lanuages go, just my experience with this one. Trying to find intermediate learning options for Japanese is difficult, but I think I will pass on this one, at least in so far as paying for anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Emilee,

Thanks so much for taking the time to share this with us! We have shared your feedback with our teams so we can continue working on improving our platform. Thank you for learning with busuu!

scraped_reviews.content: Changing my review after a hiccup early on with the app itself. I have been enjoying Busuu for learning Japanese. I like the little videos to go along with some of the words & phrases, it helps me to visualize & remember. I like being able to review vocabulary & grammar as many times as I want. I don't deal too much with the corrections, I'm spending enough time trying to learn Japanese, so I don't have much to help others with English. So far, so good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Amy,

Thank you for your lovely review ü•∞.

We're happy to see that you're enjoying learning with Busuu.

Good luck with your further studies!

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: The content itself is pretty good and helps to retain info. However, that's only when all the features of the app are working. Lately, the review section no longer works and all accumulated words are gone. The paid version is quite expensive so I don't appreciate not having full functionality. I was told there was no time frame for this issue but also, when I mentioned refund I was told they will "provide compensation if the issue takes longer than expected"...but there's no time frame...so...
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Irene,

We are sorry for the issue currently affecting the Vocabulary Review.

Our team is investigating this to resolve it as soon as possible. If you reach out to team@busuu.com, our team will be able to inform you regarding any updates and assist you with anything else when the issue is resolved.

Thanks for your patience.

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: For the first couple of weeks, this was great! It explained things that Duo didn't. But now it's skipping ahead and quizzing me on things I have no way of knowing. (Example: it just taught me new words in hiragana, but the quiz uses entirely kanji.) I've used the "report issue" button numerous times, but there's simply no way to advance. (Re: developer response: there's nothing more to tell. If I was taught the word in hiragana, that doesn't help me guess the kanji.)
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello Wil,

Thank you very much for your feedback, although we are sorry to read about your disappointment with our Japanese course.

Could you please write to us at team@busuu.com with more information about this? We will be happy to help you.

Best regards,

Busuu Team.

scraped_reviews.content: pretty expensive for sub and some features, like reviewing words, don't workb it always gives me the same words to review and just brings up all saved words when clicking on weak, strong, etc. I even had trouble when I tried to sign up for a trial and then pay for a sub. Additionally, there are no options to turn off romanization and community features. I like the grammar lessons though and the lessons are fun and interactive, but there should be way more typing and pronunciation practice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

Thanks so much for the review!

But rest assured that We've taken note of your request and will pass it on to the Education team ü§ó,

If you wish to send us more detailed feedback, don't hesitate to get in touch with us directly on tam@busuu.com

Thank you for your cooperation!

Busuu team

scraped_reviews.content: I really like this app. It was affordable, its easy to use, I am learning German much better than when I was trying on my own. I have a few suggestions for improvements. It should give the English translation after each slide so I don't have to keep looking up meanings to words. Also the button on the bottom of each page that we click to continue is covering the special characters and I have to scroll down then click. It would be really nice if they fixed that.

Bait and switch! The app sent my phone a push notification offering me 60% off an upgrade to premium for my one year anniversary. When I opened the app from the notification, the offer was nowhere to be found, and it wanted me to upgrade at full price. I backed out of the upgrade screen and it offered me a discount of 30%. The app actually works really well, and I was going to pay for it, but I'm no longer interested after seeing their business practices.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ojy!

This is quite unusual!

If you haven't already, can you please make sure you get in touch with us at team@busuu.com so we can look into this for you.

Many thanks,

Busuu Team

scraped_reviews.content: The beginning is really nice, it helps you learn hiragana, katakana, and some kanji in the japanese course, which is the only one I've tried yet. It has nice tips on how to use grammar and some of the words you're learning. But after a while you'll notice that those tips stop and anything above the first section just seems to be what I'll call "vocab packs" where the emphasis on grammer is mostly gone. This app is more for beginners.

I've really enjoyed the heavy emphasis on both written and spoken language. I learn more easily when I can read and write rather than just parrot words. Most other apps seem to have either no real written component, or they'll only offer nonsensical fragments of writing. The methodology in this app reminds me of the college courses I took years ago.

title: Google Wallet
description:
Google Wallet gives you fast, secure access to your everyday essentials. Tap to pay everywhere Google Pay is accepted, board a flight, go to a movie, and more ‚Äì  all with just your phone. Keep everything protected in one place, no matter where you go.

CONVENIENT

Get what you need fast
+ Three quick ways for accessing your everyday essentials: use your phone‚Äôs quick settings for fast access, open the Wallet app from your homescreen or use Google Assistant when your hands are busy.

Access Google Wallet from your Wear OS watch
+ Get instant access to Wallet on the Wear OS main watch face with complications.

Carry cards, tickets, passes, and more
+ Catch a train, see a concert, or earn rewards at your favorite stores  with a digital wallet that carries more
+ [US Only] Unlock the world around you with a digital wallet that carries your drivers license and digital car keys

What you need, right when you need it
+ Your Wallet can suggest what you need, right when you need it. Get a notification for your boarding pass on the day of travel, so you‚Äôll never have to fumble in your bag again.

HELPFUL

Keep track of receipts
+ Easily find transaction details in Wallet, including smart details like location pulled from Google Maps

Seamless integration across Google
+ Sync your Wallet to keep your Calendar and Assistant up to date with the latest info like flight updates and event notifications
+ Shop smarter by seeing your point balances and loyalty benefits in Maps, Shopping, and more

Get started in a snap
+ Set up is seamless with the ability to import cards, transit passes, loyalty cards and more that you‚Äôve saved on Gmail.

Stay in the know on the go
+ Make boarding flights a breeze with the latest information pulled from Google Search. Google Wallet can keep you posted on gate changes or unexpected flight delays.

SAFE & PRIVATE

A secure way to carry it all
+ Security and privacy are built into every part of Google Wallet to keep all your essentials protected.

Android security you can count on
+ Keep your data and essentials secure with advanced Android security features like 2-Step Verification, Find My Phone, and remotely erasing data.

Tap to pay keeps your card secure
ALT: + When you tap to pay with your Android phone, Google Pay doesn‚Äôt share your real credit card number with the business, so your payment info stays safe.

You‚Äôre in control of your data
+ Easy to use privacy controls allow you to opt-in to sharing information across Google products for a tailored experience.

Google Wallet is available on all Android phones (Lollipop 5.0+), Wear OS and Fitbit devices.
Not all features are available for supervised accounts. Learn more about Wallet for supervised accounts here: https://support.google.com/wallet?p=about_wallet_supervised.
Still have questions? Head over to support.google.com/wallet.
