summary: Fast, secure access to everyday essentials like cards, passes or tickets

scraped_reviews.content: The interface for managing items is horrible. It would help if they can be grouped eg. Loyalty cards, payment cards, train tickets, flights. And a simple way to archive or delete items e.g by swiping them left or right, or even getting a context menu would be great rather than clicking into each one, scrolling down and clicking another button.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Simon! You can also leave a feedback directly to our team through the app: Open the Google Wallet app> in the upper right corner, tap your profile or account photo> Help and Feedback> Send feedback. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Payment cards keep disappearing. Apparently there are several possible causes for this, one of which may be that the app wasn't opened recently. No notifications are provided when this happens so that you could verify the card; you just find yourself stranded without a way to pay. For the reason alone, the app is unserviceable and cannot be relied upon for payment purposes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that, Aaron. Your cards can be deleted from Google Wallet if you change your Google Account password or turn off your screen lock. Learn more: goo.gle/3d5Mgmq. If this is not the case, it is best to contact our support for further assistance: goo.gle/38DqsZ0. Our specialists will be happy to help you in the best possible way. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: my user experience leaves me very frustrated 98% of the time. I'm considering going back to tapping a physical card. I consistently have to either verify a few times with thumb print, even when I've just used it , or the phone "moved too fast" even when it didn't or it literally does nothing at all, and I'm stood at the checkout, waiting & trying & nothing is happening at all... even when I come out of my wallet & refresh , it still does nothing... it's so intermittent. it's not good enough !!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that, Jens. In this case, we would encourage you to contact our support team directly: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Many greetings.

scraped_reviews.content: I appreciate that security is important when it comes to my cards. The recent update, however, has made the use of cards very annoying, so much that I'll probably start using my physical cards. 3 out of four times I need to reconfirm with fingerprint, it's slow, inconsistent and often times I end up spending extra 30 seconds to make a small payment. It's far from clear when I need to reconfirm and when not.

A year later update: the carousel method to choose a card hasn't been improved at all. It's still much slower than previously to go through cards as you need to wait for the animation to complete each time. If you frequently use different cards (I travel a lot), then it's very frustrating. It used to be so much better with just a simple list of cards on the app. At least the reliability got better.

Handy enough app. Able to see any loyalty cards I have and movie tickets. Only problem is some times it acts up when paying. A common message is I've moved the phone too fast when I haven't, so I've to close the app and try again. Other times it'll be fine then up pops "verify it's you" so I've to do that then pay, little annoying. Other times it doesn't do anything, though this may be an issue with the card machine than the app.

Fine for payment cards - does everything I want and expect. Rubbish for other cards. You can't assign a name to a loyalty card, so you can't manage severally the same type. You can't add a card which isn't already in their list. Until my other loyalty card app was killed off I thought this app was fine, but the loyalty card section is not fit for purpose.

I haven't made the move completely from card and cash to using this app, but as concert and train tickets are able to be saved here, I expect my use will increase. It's definitely handy to have, though I do like having a backup in case anything else goes wrong! Shame I can't add things like my library card to it, that's the one I forget the most!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues using Google Wallet app. Please check out this article to fix issues with the app: goo.gle/3b6hwwn. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Please allow sort by name. Please add share loyalty card. Would be useful in family scenario. Also search button would be useful at the bottom. Add Payment card gets in the way of you cards. There is already Add to Wallet in the bottom right. Have filter like loyalty cards, memberships etc. The GUI could fit more cards in the screen size. Like Stocard and Klarna.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Baldeep. Have a look at this article to use loyalty cards, gift cards or offers: goo.gl/aYBnRQ. If you still need help, we're happy to assist: https://goo.gl/tNCXEt. Thanks for reaching out.

scraped_reviews.content: Honestly, the app is fantastic. I use it a lot for boarding passes and tickets. It is a wonderful app to hold passes and make that process seamless. The only thing I wish Wallet had was a shortcut integrated for the phone like Samsung Pay. With Samsung Pay, you can swipe up from the bottom of the phone to accessnthay shortcut. It'd be awesome if Samung and Google could figure out that possibility with Wallet.

The app really went down regarding quality of the service. For months it has been declining my transactions, every single one! Unlocking pin code did not help! I even changed my card completely and it still cannot connect the card. Removed and installed the app, did not work. The app clearly has become absolutely unusable! No point of me downloading it again..!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear that, Violeta. There's a few different reasons a transaction can be declined. The most common is due to your bank declining the transaction, so you'll want to check with them. Check out this article for more information: https://goo.gle/3BcK0UM. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: It's good but desperately would love the ability to customise the loyalty card boxes (custom colours and images) like you can do on Samsung's version. I also have a lot of loyalty cards and scrolling to find the one I need is frustrating. We need a search option and the ability to change how they are shown, from the current list to a grid etc.

Completely screwed recently. All my cards from different banks disappeared during a payment. I tried to add them back, choosing cards in my Google Payments profile but, NO, "you have already added this card". Yes, I did. Then you removed it just from the UI and I can't re-add any. Additionally, recent additional verification has added inconvenience. Don't fix what wasn't broken! Back to physical cards for now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry to hear that, Adam. Your cards can be deleted from Google Wallet if you change your Google Account password or turn off your screen lock. Learn more: goo.gle/3d5Mgmq. If this is not the case, it is best to contact our support for further assistance: goo.gle/38DqsZ0. Our specialists will be happy to help you in the best possible way. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Having to repeatedly "verify it's you" makes it unusable. The need for verification shows up intermittently and unpredictably, so you try to pay, fail, and then realise oops, this time I have to verify. Also, to verify takes 2 steps - you have to tap on the top of the screen to show the fingerprint scanner, so you have to stop and use two hands. Make verification always mandatory above a user-set threshold and just auto-display the fingerprint scanner at the bottom without the extra tap. Easy.

Have unlocked phone using class 3 biometrics. It fails the transaction and asks for fingerprint again. This is not a step up in security, this is simply a step back in usability. The only thing consistent with in store payments now is that they will fail, you'll then tap your fingerprint again on your already unlocked phone, and then wave it around the card reader for about a minute waiting for the payment to transact again. Rubbish, how was this update actually released?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To provide a more secure and consistent in-store payments experience, Google Wallet now requires on-device authentication before completing a payment, regardless of the amount. This means you'll need to unlock your phone using a PIN, pattern, passcode, or Class 3 biometric for all non-transit tap-to-pay transactions. Learn more: g.co/help/3xjh9.

scraped_reviews.content: Needs to be able to search for specific cards and loyalty cards instead of endless scrolls through tens of or hundreds of passes and cards we have saved. It's Disorganized. Fine with one or two passes, but it's a complete mess otherwise. Seriously make tabs to find cards easier. Let us group cards by retailer. Let us categorize them however we want. The Gpay app was such a better interface!!!

The concept is good, execution is okay, but there's some terrible features. Automatically adds new things to the top of the list rather than ordering passes/tickets by date, and the UI reordering function mustn't have had much use testing, you have to move them bit by bit and tend to accidentally blast other ones out of order while trying to shift one down. If drag-reorder tool is too hard to implement properly - doubtful, other apps do it fine - then there should be other sorting options.

üí∏I RECOMMEND Google Wallet! It's a robust way for me to make my in-store, online payments, digital tickets, & various other store transactions in 1 central location. I've never had issues, so you will get security & privacy with Google Wallet. It keeps all your essentials protected. (It will not share your real credit card number, so your payment info stays safe) You can make contactless payments, add any loyalty program cards, & any gift cards. It's a FREE VERY USEFUL android exclusive app!üí∏

Works, but works TOO well. sometimes if i have my phone out just a few feet away from a payment thing (like to grab coupons/check my balance), it opens the app automatically, without my permission, and tries to pay. how the hell is that secure? no "confirm payment!" button or anything, just. phone open? payment terminal 1 foot away? PAY PAY PAY PAY PAY. i have to disable NFC just to keep it from accidentally opening (and theres no quick "disable/enable nfc" button). does NOT feel secure.

Google Wallet is handy for picking up tickets directly from Gmail, and the integration works well. However, beyond that, its utility feels limited. While you can add QR-based tickets, the app lacks broader functionality. A Digilocker integration, for example, would make it much more useful. It‚Äôs decent for basic ticket storage but has room for improvement.

With the introduction of the verify is you function, and I no longer have fingerprint on my phone as had to replace the screen, wallet is a waste of time. I may as well use the physical care and do chip and pin. I get the security perspective, but phones are generally secure, maybe the verify kicks in less often?

The update that now requires verification for each transaction makes this borderline unusable. It'll often decide it needs a fingerprint halfway through a transaction too, confusing the store's card reader, which then gets stuck in a loop. I don't understand how any of the developers that work on this product can possibly use it and not be constantly infuriated. EDIT: I love how Google is replying to complaints with the same copy-paste drivel. Yes, we know this is intended - it's stil bad!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To provide a more secure and consistent in-store payments experience, Google Wallet now requires on-device authentication before completing a payment, regardless of the amount. This means you'll need to unlock your phone using a PIN, pattern, passcode, or Class 3 biometric for all non-transit tap-to-pay transactions. Learn more: g.co/help/3xjh9.

scraped_reviews.content: I have passes loaded and used to be able to add tickets from Ticketmaster. It wasn't ever seamless. After speaking with a person where the tickets are purchased I was told that he have the biggest problem because it doesn't work well to Google Wallet. I was told to you guys a web browser instead to open up the tickets and save them to the wallet. Hopefully this solves the issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that, Rob. In the Google Wallet app, scroll up and to find your ticket. You can learn more here https://goo.gle/3y7dL66. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The new double authentication is so frustrating and unnecessary. It should be a personal choice whether you want this feature or not. Please give the option to turn it off. It is causing delays at shops. *Edit yes, we know its for extra security but it is flawed, unnecessary and a real nuisance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: To provide a more secure and consistent in-store payments experience, Google Wallet now requires on-device authentication before completing a payment, regardless of the amount. This means you'll need to unlock your phone using a PIN, pattern, passcode, or Class 3 biometric for all non-transit tap-to-pay transactions. Learn more: g.co/help/3xjh9.

scraped_reviews.content: I've had google wallet for a while now and it's really good. The paypal card is a lifesaver because it works almost everywhere. There were some issues in the first couple of days of this year (2025) where you couldn't pay contact less with the card in Germany but those issues have been fixed. I will continue to use Google wallet as my main wallet app!

Used to work flawlessly on my old phone but now I've bought a new phone and it now wants my pin before tapping on every transaction. It's quicker to get my wallet out and use my card which makes the app pointless. Also, I can no longer make purchases in apps anymore because after verifying myself, the google pay app gets stuck on the black loading screen. How can you mess up something that worked perfectly before?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello there, we are sorry that you continue to have this experience. In this case, we would encourage you to contact our support team directly: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Many greetings.

scraped_reviews.content: It seemed amazing. I spent quite a bit of time getting my payment methods correctly in the wallet and then making virtual cards for security purposes. That's a great feature of this app. After all that, I found out that my phone doesn't have the ability to tap pay. So everything I did was a waste of time. I went back to the play store. It said Wallet was compatible with my phone. It would have been nice to know about the tap pay ahead of time rather than after the fact. I'm so disappointed.

Worked fine before, now gets stuck in a loop of asking for verification and then losing the transaction then asking to verify identity again Edit to reply: Wallet prompts to either use the screen unlock pattern or fingerprint sensor. Fingerprint sensor didn't work, and trying to use the pattern resulted in the loop above. Phone was unlocked and app was open.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Charles. Are you using an unsupported screen lock method? (Class 1/2 biometric Face Unlock or Smart Unlock). If so, please switch to a supported method. If you're already using a supported method, try opening the Google Wallet app before tapping to pay. This will prompt any necessary verification beforehand. Learn more: g.co/help/3xjh9. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è Google Wallet has become part of my daily routine. I rely on it every single day, and it has never let me down. The app is fast, stable, and incredibly convenient. My cards load instantly, tapping to pay is seamless, and it always performs exactly when I need it to ‚Äî whether I‚Äôm working long shifts, grabbing a quick coffee, or doing my weekly grocery shop. I also appreciate how clean and simple the layout is. Everything is where it should be.

if you forget your debit/credit card you can use this app to pay for stuff, it's fast and reliable to use--you can just press and hold the power button to access the card reader--only if you have a specific phone type though, I've found out. Overall, the app is great! It functions fantastically thx for making this!

This app would get 5 stars if it would just make payments from the right card account. I have two (non-virtual) cards in my wallet, but if I select the non-default card for a particular payment, it switches back to the default card. I do NOT want to have to swap my default cards around all the time. This has been happening a lot lately, and I'm seriously considering just ditching Google Wallet. üò°
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello James. We are sorry that you continue to have this experience. In this case, we would encourage you to contact our support team directly: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Many greetings.

scraped_reviews.content: Very nice app, love it. On opening it enables you to switch NFC on. Great! However, when you have used your card and finished with the wallet there is no way, within the wallet app, to switch NFC off again. Rather inconvenient as you have to access the NFC switch within the phones top pull down menu to switch NFC off. Would be nice if you could toggle NFC ON/OFF within the app.

Great while it works, but not when I keep getting 'doesn't meet security requirements'on a phone where it's worked perfectly for the last few years! Edited to 1 star: software, phone and everything that online help/sites suggests checking are all correct, updated and as they should be. Still won't work. I'll be trying Samsung Wallet next ‚òπÔ∏è
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that. Check if your software is Play Protect certified. https://goo.gle/3OhaIyi. If you were previously able to tap with Google Wallet, reach out to your device manufacturer. There may have been a device software update that impacts functionality. Additional troubleshooting: https://goo.gle/3y7dKPA. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: Updating my 8 year old 5 star review. Still excellent with lots of new features added since my last review. I loved that it groups multiple tickets together for the same event and being able to add "everything else," which can turn a screenshot of a QR code into a wallet entry. That's pretty great, especially when a ticket arrives as a PDF with no link to add to wallet.

The app decides when it wants to work, it's so frustrating. I uninstalled it and installed it twice already today but still does not work. Can't wait for OnePlus to create a wallet app so we have competition. | Google as of 10/04/24 it is still not working. I uninstalled it and installed, but still nothing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues using Google Wallet app. Please check out this article to fix issues with the app: goo.gle/3b6hwwn. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: it was okay easy to use. I did also notice that there was some features that could be placed here to help us like face recognition and PIN codes right on the website itself. I may have missed it so if I did I'm sorry but I don't believe they have a settings for pin for wallet or facial recognition settings

Mighty dangerous app ! I feel like others besides me have complete control over my digital wallet. I have taken my old PayPal card out numerous times and even reported it missing. It continues to be a problem and let back in which has caused a freeze on my PayPal account.

All great and totally deserves a five star rating except one major flaw. Almost impossible to arrange saved cards in alphabetical order (for easy serach since there is no search button). When I try to hold and drag any card up or down to sort manually, it almost always mess everything up. Not sure if I'm missing anything here or there's any hidden feature that I'm not aware of. Developers please help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry about that, Naitikkumar. You need to edit a form of payment, you will need to do so from the website pay.google.com. More info here: http://goo.gle/3R7U85Z. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: The "verify that it's you" thing is SO FRUSTRATING. I verified it's me by unlocking my phone! I don't have time to do this EVERY. TIME. I. PAY. Adds an awkward 60 seconds to each transaction, as it also won't let me use my Google Keyboard to enter my pin on my Vivo x200 Ultra, so I have to change to the phone's keyboard first. Worst system ever, especially considering how integrated Google Wallet is into everything. Please remove this bug and let us choose our own level of verification!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Sandra, we are sorry that you continue to have this experience. In this case, we would encourage you to contact our support team directly: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Many greetings.

scraped_reviews.content: 2025: 1 Star now Added a new card, and it did not show up. Similarly, deleted an old card and it did not update. 2024: Was a 5 star review, now it's 2 star. Wallet should not have a card limit, but it was sprung up on us without notice. I am a person with several cards and this makes the app's usefulness very limited. It's ruined the app. Please remove the limit, it does not make sense.

As others have experienced, latest update deleted my driver's license. Edit: Tried to add ID back but app says it's already there, it does not show in the list and no way to recover, worthless for airports or anywhere else that accepts digital ID. Edit 2: You might find your license buried in the Add ID menu for some reason, if it has a View button, you might be able to delete and reload. Unstable and untrustworthy, I would not rely on this app for anything important.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues using Google Wallet app. Please check out this article to fix issues with the app: goo.gle/3b6hwwn. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: On Pixel Watch 3: Often very slow to load or unresponsive which is awful when you're trying to pay for goods or trying to show tickets in an event lineup. Also, quite buggy (e.g. the crown no longer scrolls after opening a loyalty barcode and swiping back to the list, and sometimes it gets stuck on the loyalty card completely and you have to close and reopen the app).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mark. We are sorry you had this experience. Please check out the "Fix a Problem" section in this article to see if the troubleshooting steps help: goo.gle/3y9SjNL. If you still experience issues, please reach out to our support team for help:goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Kind regards!

scraped_reviews.content: Google,oh dear, what has become of this once Great tech giant. Pay is the latest in an ever expanding list of services/apps that are now so complex to use. You just go elsewhere. Try to get help. Make sure you've got a lot of time to waste. Chat bots and faq's that are useless, instructions that are unclear. Try not to get dizzy, because you will be in a never ending loop, going round and around, to nowhere, but back where you began, now with hypertension.

Ruined the app recently. It works for loyality cards and tickets just once after installing. The list is there, but no entry could be opened: entries are grey and taps just don't work. Clearing storage works - just for one app launch and then the same story. again This continues already FOR MONTH... and it's not only for me - all BBs here are full with the same story.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Boris, we are sorry that you continue to have this experience. In this case, we would encourage you to contact our support team directly: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Many greetings.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm so disgusted with this app. It lost my driver's license info and my passport info. Sometimes it appears in the quick access menu, sometimes it doesn't. Sometimes it lets me add a credit card, sometimes it doesn't. To say this app is unreliable is an understatement.

I wish there was a way to set up folders or groups. I drive DoorDash, Uber, Amazon Flex, etc., which all have their own cards for personal use and *also* their own cards to use when shopping, and they all ask you to add them all to Google wallet. I would love a way to bundle together the cards I don't use so I'm not scrolling through all of them while trying to find my personal credit card.

Regularly new updates completely break the app. I can't open any of my saved loyalty cards. Thus the app gets absolutely useless. Another update may fix the issue. Until another update. This happened about 5 times so far. Will look for another solution to store cards. This one has proven unreliable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Dmitry. We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues using Google Wallet app. Please check out this article to fix issues with the app: goo.gle/3b6hwwn. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks.

scraped_reviews.content: If Have unlocked phone using class 3 biometrics. It fails the transaction and asks for fingerprint again. This is not a step up in security, this is simply a step back in usability. The only thing consistent with in store payments now is that they will fail, you'll then tap your fingerprint again on your already unlocked phone, and then wave it around the card reader for about a minute waiting for the payment to transact again. Rubbish, how was this update actually released?

Worked well for me for a few years. Now, it is very slow to approve purchases, and has failed me completely at a few shops, leaving me stranded, mid- purchase. I am here, having uninstaller and now re- installing the app. Hoping it will fix the situation. Otherwise, I'll be back to using physical cards, as using Google Wallet has become very stressful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rebecca! We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues using Google Wallet app. Please check out this article to fix issues with the app: goo.gle/3b6hwwn. If the issue persists, we can help you directly here: http://goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: After the latest update, the app completely stopped working. When I click loyalty's card icon, nothing happens. The same situation with my gf phone. Both - Android 16, Pixel 6 pro and Pixel 7. After applying the support recommended actions the problem was solved... It was surprising but after deleting cache and data of the app, all my cards are saved and app begin doing well.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Igor! We are sorry to hear that you encountered issues using Google Wallet app. Please check out this article to fix issues with the app: goo.gle/3b6hwwn. If everything looks good but you still experience problems: goo.gle/3Q7Hcg7. Thanks!

With video guidance, you can enjoy them in a simple and fun way. No equipment or coach needed, you can easily do the core workouts at home or anywhere, anytime. ‚≠êÔ∏è Why choose this workout app Lose Belly Fat? - Quick and effective workouts maximize fat burning and weight loss. - Requires no equipment. Burn belly fat, lose weight and stay fit with just your body weight. - Abs workout plans with 3 difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard) designed by experts. - Suitable for both beginner and pro, young and old. - Beginner friendly. - Animation and video guidance just like your personal coach. - Track your weight loss & waist slimming progress. - Track your burned calories on a daily basis. - Customized workout reminders remind you to tone your stomach. - Health tips help you develop a balanced diet for weight loss and good health. - 200+ stomach & core exercises aimed to bring you fitness and confidence. - Do these abs workouts 10 minutes a day to burn belly fat and achieve your goal of having a flat tummy. - Sync data with Google Fit. Try the aerobic exercises in this app to get rid of the annoying belly fat and improve your health. Stop wasting your time with those useless methods. Start working out at home to burn fat, tone your belly, lose weight and build muscle fast. You'll have beach-ready abs in no time! Belly fat burning exercises Looking for belly fat exercise? All these body fat burning exercise can be done anywhere at any time. Female fitness exercise With fat burning workouts for women, you can quickly belly fat loss and get 11 line abs. You need to combine fat burning workouts with low calorie diet to maximize the workout results. summary: Abs workout for women & men: lose belly fat and get a flat stomach in 30 days!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is truly amazing!! This app is recommended for both male and female, even if you aren't looking to lose weight, this app lets you create a daily workout routine of your choice to keep fit. This app also lets you do multiple workouts not only for your abs but for your legs, arms, neck, and face, they also have sleep routines in case you want a good night's rest. Five stars best workout app ever, definitely recommended!!

I love this app, I can exercise whenever and wherever I want. The workouts are not very long (15-20 min.) and you can choose beginner, intermediate and advanced. There are 20-30 second breaks between each exercise but you are allowed to skip the break if you don't need that much time to get into the next position. I'm noticing some slimming at my midsection which is my problem area. I really love this app.

Amazing app! I don't have a single complaint! Ads are obviously not pleasant, but they need to be there to actually keep the app running. I absolutely LOVE that they don't pop up in the middle of a workout!! They wait until you are finished. There are 3 levels. Beginner, intermediate, and advanced. This is a free 3 month program right here!! And you can even make your own workouts!! I love this app and definitely recommend it!!!!

This app is awesome. I started with beginners, some places I do more then asked and then hit next. Sometimes I skip the breaks, I'm glad it has this buttons, sometimes I don't need 30sec break. My endurance has gotten better within a week. Every day it's a different set of exercise which I love because it's not routine. The app is not to strenuous that makes you want to quit. I Feel like it's the right amount and level to keep one motivated!

Great app for a beginner like me! Tracks weight and waist size. Has "skip" buttons in case a particular exercise can't be done, and the coaching tips offer ways to make exercises easier or harder depending on your needs. Also has exercises for beginner, intermediate, or advanced workouts; though I've only used beginner so far and have lost several pounds and inches! Android LG Stylo 4

There are so many free workouts for more than I'd ever think of. I'm working my way through them. It's only been a month but there are crazy positive results. Usually I don't take days off but this gives multiple rest days a week on beginner. Super beginner friendly. If I can keep up this habbit up for 5 more months I'll need to upgrade. Based off what science says it takes to engrain a new behavior into everyday life. I hope I get there. 100% recomend this app. It's become one of my favorites.

I really do like this app. The excersize isn't hard, and it comes in multiple levels of difficulty based on how advanced you are at working out. Within those levels you can choose standard or easy on certain excersizes. It has helped me to start working out every day and lose a couple inches on my waist so far. The best part is there is rest days, so you are being consistent and you don't feel guilty not working out on those days.

Best app I've found! I have been using this app and eating healthier for a little over a month now, and I've already lost 10 pounds. You can select the intensity of your workout, it gives you breaks when you need them, and there is a computer voice moving you along through each exercise. Highly recommend this app. Definitely not disappointed in my results.

I enjoy the programs it has, and it goes up at a gradual pace. I'm not doing the days as designated, but after 80+ workouts, I have noticed results and have gone down a pants size. Don't think of this as a quick fix, but more of a lifestyle incorporation along with a good diet. The app is neat and also allows you to build your own workout routines or go for preprogrammed ones. I do recommend it, but always consult with your doctor if you have preexisting conditions.

Very good app! I love how it includes rest days, and how you can sync with Google Fit. I feel like I personally can stay more committed with this app because of the schedule it provides, whereas others you just kind of have to figure it out yourself, and as a beginnerlike myself that can get confusing. I also really enjoy how the exercises aren't the exact same every day so you dont have to worry about getting bored or losing interest! Also no equipment needed! Yay!

I love it! This is only my 3rd day using this app and it is so much better than any other app I've used! It doesn't give you exercise to over work yourself and it makes it fun so you don't even notice that you're finished with it... seriously love it! Thank you! P.S. the only thing is that I could not figure out how to change the time on the "morning work out alarm" ..it's set to 8 am and that's not the time I wake up, but there's doesn't seem to be any other options for those .. so I don't ever use the alarms :(

Great so far! I'm only on day 3, but with this app, I'm more motivated to excercise because it gives you small workouts to start and buils up to bigger ones as you lose more fat. So I'm not dreading having to so a big workout. It also has 30 second breaks between each excercise so you can catch your breath, or you can skip the break if you're ready to go to the next excercise. I also like that it has a BMI calculator, and you can see how you're improving when you change the input.

It's a good app. Lot of good abs, legs, cardio, and stretches. It has options to choose workout routines based on levels or customize on your own. The duration/repetitions can also be customized. It doesn't have all the work outs obviously. I wish I could type in or add pix of workouts that the app doesn't have. Also it would be nice to able to search workouts instead of scrolling up and down.

Love the app. I can do a 1-minute plank now! It's a little weird that it keeps telling me to follow the voice prompts to pace my exercises correctly, yet there doesn't seem to be anything that actually does that. As far as I can tell, I have all the options turned on, and I can hear all the tips during the exercises. But nothing that keeps me from going too fast as the tip suggests. One thing you need to change. During the side leg lift exercise, the voice says, "This exercise will help burn your love handles." That's misleading and not how exercise works. It'll tone your obliques, but you can't target fat in specific areas.

I love this app. It gradually builds you up to more intense workouts. It always incorporates stretching. And provides news and tips to a healthier you. For me, to pay, i think it was $2.99, to enjoy the app with no ads was a win. You can still enjoy the app without paying by watching an ad but its all worth it. I get a good sweat going after every workout (i like to do 2or3 as a session).

Very good app! Not too many pop up adds. You only see them when you finish a workout and then maybe a few else where. My favorite part about this app is that you can customize your own work outs! I really enjoy this because I can choose which exercises I want to use and exactly how many of them I want to do. Now I can create workouts that fit me and my time schedule! Oh plus it's more fun to make your own!!! üôÇüôÉüòÅ

Cannot recommend this app enough. I was apprehensive at first to use an app for a fitness routine, but now I can't imagine doing it without it! It takes all the worry about trying to set up a routine on your own, especially if you don't know where to start. The daily routine takes ~20 min to do, less if you skip through the 30 sec breaks. The best thing about the app is it has all the features you'd want (i.e. timer, progress tracker, custom routines, exercise guides) included within the app.

The main workout takes about 15 minutes, optional morning/evening stretches about 5 minutes. I can record/monitor my weight and waistline, including numbers from before I started the program - you can fix the numbers if you wrote the wrong thing down. The voice of the coach is a robotic, but that doesn't bother me. I'm a beginner - the workouts are challenging enough to feel it, but not so hard that I'm in excessive pain; also short enough that I can squeeze it into my busy life. So far so good.

I love this app so much, but it gets 3 stars for disrupting anything I do on my phone (work, etc.) by reminding me to drink water every 15 minutes. I drink 2 liters of water a day based on my weight, I do not need to be reminded. They should have an option to turn it off and it's odd that they dont. Please fix this and the app would be 5 stars perfect.

I saw the review saying pop up ads were popping up outside the app, and I tried it anyway because the dev's denial sounded so convincing that they wouldn't do that. The app is great btw, I got a great belly burn even in the short workouts...but alas, the pop ups occur. Come out of lock screen, get off a call, etc. If you can deal with that, get this app. If not, well...

app is great. the workouts allow you to progress without too much stress, but the in app coach gives you tips and modifications for if the exercise it too difficult or too easy, as well as the option to add more rest time between them if you need it. i have only two gripes: you have to stay in the app for it to continue going through the exercises, and sometimes, when i update my weight (bcs the app works and im losing) itll say my previous weight is still the lowest, not my current weight :/

If ur wiling to do the work it's a useful app. I started with the beginningers course to ease back into working out but mostly cuz I do it before bed. It's great for those who are just starting to work out, need to get back into a routine or just want a light workout. The app gives detailed instructions and even more detailed videos. With bonus workouts to download. The workouts aren't very long either, and u can go at ur own speed. I'm looking forward to trying the higher levels.

I very much enjoy this app, the way it does my thinking for me. The exercises seem well matched for my abilities, which it is helping to grow. Four stars, not five, because the robot coach voice is really annoying; it sounds super cheap. I wouldn't think it would be that difficult to get someone to record the instructions and encouragements for a better exercise experience.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Christopher, thanks for taking the time to write this feedback to us. We'll take your feedback seriously and try to make some improvements in the sound of the coach's voice. Please stay tuned! We seek your patience meanwhile. If you have any other problems or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at losebellyfatfeedback@gmail.com. üòä

scraped_reviews.content: I am extremely out of shape and let my weight and health get away from me. This app is amazing, yes it requires you to want to use ut but it us set up great for beginners and even experienced. Is very user friendly and i love the tips it guves while you are working out. For example, it can say "you should not feel tension in your chest and shoulders" during a specific workout and I will realize I do so I adjust to do correctly. I highly recommend and may try some if the apps by them as well.

Updated review (STILL 5 stars): If I could write more than one 5 star review I would. I have been using this app for 3 months. I HAVE ABS NOW. I'm toned. I never worked out this long before. Best part, I can do it right at home. With the update there is no shortage of workouts to try with all areas of the body and varying intensity. Program allows for gradual steady build up. Also, you can add resistance bands, dumbbells and leg weights to increase difficulty/muscle. I love it!

I love this app. Perfect for me as the most unathletic person ever to grace this planet. The routines slowly increase in difficulty, allowing your ability to grow. The app also gives you easier options for certain workouts. For example, I can't do a regular plank because of my weak shoulders, so the app told me to do a straight arm plank. My abs were more defined after only 2 weeks. My confidence is through the roof. I'd definitely give it a try.

This is the best ab app ever. The site is user friendly and offers several kinds of exercises. The workouts show how to do the exercises so you don't have to look them up. The calendar marks the workouts for you. You can also set alarms for reminders. Yes you have to watch an ad to download some of the exercises but the ads are short. It also does not ask for any personal information. I was able to sync my devices just by using my Google account.

I feel great and motivated. After 2 weeks people say they can see a difference and can see a 6 pack coming in. They ask what I have been doing diferent. You can tell the progress being made through the program. as you do them more, the easier it gets for you to do the exercise. It takes a lot of mental strength. I'd recommend listening to music while you do it. I found it helps keeping you more likely to follow through the program entirely.

Honestly, this is simple and easy. You are able to choose your level of fitness and it caters to you. It tracks all your progress on a calender and you can add in your weight and waist line if you are into that. The best part is that the app is that it also gives you rest days. It does not discourage you, instead it encourages me personally because if I miss a few days I can either pick up from where I left off or start from the beginning! No judgements!

Absolutely wonderful! This app really does help motivate you to continue working out every day and get you through the 30 days. I have not had a problem with the ads. Even with the beginner routines, this will make you sweat! There's a morning stretch and a bedtime stretch routine too that helps give you more energy in the morning and help you get into the mood to work out. And it just makes you feel good. There's even a workout alarm to remind you to do so if you forget. Wonderful app to help you get started working on your body.

Highly recommend this app! I haven't worked out in quite some time, so I started this app in March to try to strengthen my core. Since starting, I can tell I'm much stronger, my posture has improved, AND I'm actually seeing physical results which is crazy to me - I have definition in my midsection and am smoothing out my love handles that I've had forever!! The workouts are easy to understand, and I like that you can skip through the rest periods. Just stay consistent and don't give up!

This app was very helpful for me. I was motivated to stay on track. I lost about 4 inches on 60 days. I would have lost more had I changed my eating habits. I most definitely recommend this app to anyone. the excercises were easy to follow and each move has a video attached that shows human performing the moves. Very user friendly and doesn't take a lot of time out of your day.

This app has been helping me a lot... It just depends on me to actually follow through because these exercises work and the tips during the workouts are helpful. And the fact that you can also target areas that you are working on but I think that takes money, but your dollars will be worth it. You can also discover other workouts on the discover page, you can set the level of difficulty from intermediate to advanced so that the workout plan fits you. You can do sleepy time stretches, and more.

Only used it for a little bit but so far i love it. The app gives you choices of different workout routines depending on your difficulty. Tips and a calender with your duration time, calories burnt that day, and a weight chart are included. Extras include workouts created by trainors or streches on your discovery page. I love this app and it makes it easy for me to stay in shape on the go :)

Loving this app so so far! Very used-friendly and motivating for all levels of fitness. I really like that you can sync it to your alarm to remind you when it's time to workout. It also tracks your workouts in a calendar to show your progress. The workouts are quick and simple but also effective. I'm feeling results (good soreness and more energy) after only using for there days :)

I love this app. It's well paced, and it treats each side of the body evenly. I also like that it gives tips for doing the exercises properly, such as when to inhale and exhale. I also love how you can skip the resting time in case you're trying to get a quick workout in your day. I also love how it syncs to Googlefit so I get credit for my workout! Good job guys!

I have been searching for a good app for months and had it in my brain I needed an actual live person to watch and workout with each day and that these robotic versions would be awful. Boy, was I wrong! Not only do I get a great workout, the 15-20 minutes I do everyday fly by. Not to mention, there are no hidden fees. Totally free and loving this app.

The app really helped me shape my body in just a month, and the dietary tips were perfect! The breaks they gave me allowed me to calm down before going straight back in, and I love the feature to be able to make your own workout. The exercises they included in the routines were some of the best, I know, I've looked everywhere and every web I've seen has multiple of the exercises listed in this app. The tips the voiceover AI would give me while exercising helped me do it accurately. Perfection!

This is not just for your belly, but for your arms, perks your chest up, my butt looks amazing... the list goes on. I love how you can set reminders (that helps keep me motivated), there are little video clips so you know how to do the exersize. There are little tips during the exersize to help improve your workout. 5 stars from me. I have been using this app for several months off and on (ill do the 30 days take a small break and start back up again) For beginner, intermediate and advanced.

I really like this app. I gave it 4 stars because it is riddled with ads but theyre really not too bad. What i love about this app that i havent gotten in other similar apps is that ach workout (at least for the beginner ones) uses a great combination of cardio, ab work and yoga. It breaks exercercises down into small, easy chunks and doesnt time you when you are doing reps (which i appreciate), and gives you plenty of time to rest and easily lets you add or skip rest time in the moment.

Wonderful. I started to see actual results in the beigginer belly fat burner almost right away, and I was almost never sore after these. There's so many diverse options and customs that you can customize to fit you and your body, and at your own pace. Easy to operate and the best part? It allows you to watch quick 30 second videos to demonstrate some exercises you may not understand. A great app!

Amazing app! Love everything about it. Not only does it focus on your 30 day ab workout, but there are also other available workouts on the side. arm workouts, butt workouts, leg workout, HIIT workouts. I love the options! Everything is really easy to follow. The app notifies me when its time to workout and it wont let you cheat or fake the workout. Once the app isn't active the timer stops, and the workout isn't completed until the last set is done (including your stretches)

This app, along with Splits Trainer by the same developer are simple but effective dynamic stretches - many of which I do in my regular Yoga class. There isn't much in terms of explanation, and I see where someone unfamiliar with the exercises might injure themselves if not done properly, but for anyone who engages in regular stretching (yoga, cross training, dancing, martial arts) I would definitely recommend this app, and its companions, as a supplement to enforce routine practices.

I like half time & 10 sec audible count downs which allows me to concentrate solely on performing the move correctly. This audible also works over the workout music from my phone, not interrupting the flow of my workout; very nice! The advanced workout was a little much to start but I pushed through and am feeling a difference already in the strength of my core. There is a space to rest between each move, which can be extended if necessary, and each move can be paused with an instructional.

The only thing I would complain about is that the app gives you an option to set reminders for morning stretches, workouts, etc but so far it's only given me a reminder for my workout. The other thing is that it has the option to enable verbal feedback but it's not working. The exercises are great. Plus I love the daily health tips!

Love this app! Have been using it for only 10 days, but it has lifted my spirit and got me out of my funk. Since its been a while I started with the beginner level so I didn't get discouraged or hurt myself. It guides you through your routine with an example of how to do the exercise to make sure you're performing it correctly. The app gives you plenty of other additional routines to make it interesting just watch an ad and it's free. It has helped me to stick with an exercise routine.

This app surprised me, in a great way! I started at the beginning level - even though I was a bit active, I have back issues and didn't want to trigger any injuries. I have never felt very sore or injured after a workout - they increase difficulty very well. I did the first and second month straight through once each. I'm on my third pass through the third month/level, and I've also been doing some spinning. I've lost about 15 pounds, built some great core muscles, and I feel very strong!

Excellent workout, definitely feel it. It also has an excellent way to view how to do each of the workouts. My only complaint has to do with the lack of accuracy in calories burned. That being said don't use this app to determine your calories in and out, instead a simple fitness tracker as well as a calorie counting app will make this a non issue. Lots of ads, but they have yet to hinder my workout.

love this app. ot has great workouts and switches the routine up. Also doesn't cost just have to watch ads which you typically do all day if your watching YouTube. so many different options won't get bored with this app. im extremely happy to have found this of the many years trying different ones. This is by far the best. been working out for a week and already see the difference.

As a beginner to exercise this app was GREAT! I'm finally getting into shape after accumulating plenty of quarantine blubber. The exercises are great because you feel them working but feel great afterwards. I never felt stiff the next day or and there are plenty of breaks. The outdated bmi chart is the only bad thing. It was created for men in the military and does not take into account your body type or anything. Also, muscle weighs more than fat so a waistline is a better indicated than weight

summary: Trustworthy Online Shopping

scraped_reviews.content: Terrible customer service. Sellers get away with not delivering orders. Difficult to even change your phone number on the account. Unclear surcharges with purchases. Forceful insurance selling. Many times, Tokopedia will not let you leave a 1-star review, only 5 stars. Customer service couldn't be harder to reach. When you do reach the live-chat, they are not interested in being helpful. Awful buying experience.

I've got a horrible experience. 1. False information : They didn't check the last track of my order, I had to remind EVEN to send them the screen shot of the track order. 2. No confirmation: Without my confirmation, my order had been sent back to the seller. I didn't know that I refused without even accepting/seeing the condition of goods. 3. Slow response and no refund : 4 days have passed and the Tokopedia Team is still saying "We're still investigating" and still no refund.

Please do something about the fake sellers on your platform. There must be stronger and stricter measures to filter and verify sellers, because genuine buyers should not have to deal with this nonsense. I had to waste my time travelling all the way to a sub-agent just to collect a parcel, only to end up with incorrect items. If I selected and paid extra for a better courier service, the parcel should be delivered directly to my home ‚Äî otherwise what exactly am I paying for? So deleting this app.

The search feature is broken, the navigation is laggy and unoptimized. Other companies have better optimization compared to this app. Not to mention, since the merger, Tokopedia has been going downhill. It used to be my go-to place for buying and selling stuff, but nowadays it makes me want to uninstall it every time I use it because of how unreliable the overall app has become.

My last transaction is horrible, seller not inform me that one of the items is out of stock. I receive the package and just finished my transaction on app. Only realize i'm missing an item after opening it. When go to the app for filling my complain, the 'COMPLAIN' option is no longer there!! Try read all the articles on your 'care page' only to find no help at all. And one more, your CS line also already not available. Cmon! What happen tokopedia?where'sall the costumer care and protection go?

I've been experiencing some real issues with Tokopedia's search function lately. It's definitely become less reliable than it used to be. Before, I found it quite useful for finding specific products I was looking for, but now, I often get results that are completely irrelevant to the keywords I type in. It's frustrating because it seems the algorithm isn't working as expected.

Lazy customer service. They prefer using bots and automatic response. The customer service also can't do anything when there's a problem. Customer service can't even service the customers. They rely on us contacting the seller if there's a problem. The least they could do is apologising, but they aren't even trained to do that apparently. How did tokopedia even "won" an award for customer service is a mystery.

Worst shopping app ever. They made me go through loops just to change my number and refused to do it in the end. I want to delete my account then and they refuse to tell me too. I want to take out my money which they refunded to their store wallet btw and they told me to verify with the phone number I WAS ALREADY TRYING TO CHANGE. Honestly, go with Shopee, Lazada, or hell even Amazon. Once I get a new number to take my balance I am closing my account here. Trash app

Keeps crashing if you change stuff in your cart, the worst search engine ever that recommends unrelated items and hides relevant items, making it impossible to find what you want and compare prices, you can't see which coupons you're using and their terms when you check out, meaning it's impossible to find the best price, keeps recommending the weirdest items like pornographic tshirts, racist products, fake items, etc (which i have reported but still get recommended anyway), ai customer service

The apps getting more broken with each update. You now need to try search at least 3 times with the same keyword to get result, otherwise you will only get "item not found error". The plus icon on item doesn't always mean you get the discounted delivery fee when you checkout. There is no customer service whatsoever (Tokopedia care doesn't count because it is mostly broken bot, or 'narator' customer representative whom apperently their only job is to narate the problem without solving it)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Toppers, silakan sampaikan kritik/saran atau kendala transaksi kamu dengan menghubungi Tokopedia Care melalui Di Mana Saya Dapat Menghubungi Tokopedia? | Tokopedia Care agar bisa kami bantu cek lebih lanjut. Kami akan terus berupaya untuk meningkatkan pengalaman Toppers dalam bertransaksi di Tokopedia.

scraped_reviews.content: When are you going to make this app user-friendly and add English language for expats who live here??? I think it's the easiest part to make the app with "button" "switch from Bahasa to English" like in many other apps.

as a regular user, almost every day using this apps to purchased needs for personal or for works equipment, but las experience were very disappointed. earlier experience, once case bought from scam seller, video they send for evidence was edited, and the CS not well enough handling the case And on Oct 6, purchased, with virtual account payment. payment successful, but invoice never found. create complain ticket on the same day. Till now, no respon, always ask to f/u on tiket. now ticket is gone

the app can't open at all. I have installed, uninstalled, reinstall several times. I have installed at other mobile for years and the current system aren't friendly at all. slow, stuck your mobile completely and many more problems. apps so heavy and useless...

There is no or very poor customer protection for ability to get a refund for unwanted products. The app is very poorly designed. I am even unable to use my own phone number for the app. Customer support said my number must be a recycled number as even though it's a new SIM card it's associated with another account. Their suggestion is to change my phone number lol. Often it says debit cards aren't accepted for this order lol who doesn't accept debit cards.

I've had a very bad experience lately. I recommend using Shopee or Blibli instead of this app. There are many bugs and the sellers are unreliable. I bought some prescription medication, but the medication was different. Luckily, I didn't take the medication, otherwise the results would have been disastrous. Another issue is that the Tokopedia admins were completely unhelpful. I don't think I'll use Tokopedia again unless absolutely necessary.

solved edit: i suddenly stuck on verification page, cant take my money at all, and tokopedia have no customer service at all, my money definitely gone. I have no serious problem with this app, but courier availability is so poor only certain courier available, and the most important think is this app doesn't have free shipping feature for particular deal. Edit: Now tokopedia is the best marketplace in indonnesia

scraped_reviews.content: There's a problem with the item I purchased. The vendor sent the wrong item and I instantly filled out the complain. Finally, decided to return the item and ask for the pick up from tokopedia, but the courier didn't come until the last day of the limit time to return and the status changed into drop off, which already late for me to do. The complain then assessed to be done by tokopedia. But, the problem actually still not solved. I'm so disappointed for their service because of this.

Bad UI. Photo doesn't load on ASUS ROG phone 8. If I scroll down again and again, items pops up and when I click, I realize the one on search page pairs the photo and item name of 2 different things. I think the devs are screwing you investors. Lol

Buy something worth IDR 2,6 mio to a store but they only delivered cheap plastic key chain. The store later confirmed fraud by Tokopedia but no solution at all from Tokopedia. Useless chat that always say to return to the seller although I have said that the seller address is not complete (only street with no house number), no pickup of returned package from tokopedia until time's up and they say no way to return my money as they already send it to seller.

When you browse products by keywords and proceed to check the details of one product, the page doesn't return to where you left off, making it confusing to continue checking other products. Every time I hit return to the previous page, it always goes all the way back to the top, forcing me to skim through the products I have already viewed. These interface issues are annoyingly the same as the web version. Lastly, my WiFi is working fine, so stop displaying the pop-up 'no internet, please retry'

The app is really frustrating. The way they design the interface changes constantly, making it extremely hard to get use to the layout. Even worse, parts don‚Äôt always work properly. Recently tried to buy a mattress on the website, but because there was a discount and it was only available through the app, I was forced to switch. Really didn‚Äôt care about the discount and just wanted to use the website, which is much much more simple and more reliable.

Here lies Tokopedia (2009‚Äì2025). Never in my right mind before would I have said this, but the state Tokopedia is in right now is basically Shopee, only worse. Trash search engine, trash customer service, trash treatment toward sellers, trash T&C violation detection, trash Plus pricing. The cherry on top is that the promos nowadays are mostly exclusive to Plus users, which does not make sense to subscribe to with the monthly price unless you shop items worth at least a mil rupiah thrice a month.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Toppers, silakan sampaikan kritik/saran atau kendala transaksi kamu dengan menghubungi Tokopedia Care melalui tkp.me/supportMainapps agar bisa kami bantu cek lebih lanjut. scraped_reviews.content: It has more items than other local competition. Security is not as good, but sufficient. Visa/Mc is handled by other company. The option is hidden. I made mistakes couple of times selecting default payment method instead.

Appnya jadi lamban. Semuanya susah loading gara" banyak mbak" tiktok. update: it just keeps getting worse. Now, i can barely even browse products. It keep showing the same 10 products over and over again doesnt matter how far you scroll, then it lags and crash. y'all really screwed up hard.

Since the merger with TikTok, the application has become increasingly buggy and significantly heavier. The seller account application is also highly unreliable, as it frequently experiences downtime. In addition, many order invoices have gone missing. We kindly request that the application be restored to its previous state prior to the merger.

The UI sometimes changes into a more unfriendly interface, like needing more clicks to access the "Transaction" menu, sometimes after another update, it's back again. Updating interface is fine as long it's still easy to navigate. Removing the ease of access to the transaction list is bad if needed more click. And Tokopedia doesn't care about sellers who manipulate prices at the front, where the inside products isn't match the actual price. Finding the right products becomes harder.

im using this app since the time it was launch, until now. but in the past a year it became slow and slow, while the others app getting good and good. and the help desk just template robot answering my question... you can check my account history, how long i've been using this apps.

When my order came as different, broken, or even if the product showed no authenticity as mentioned by the seller, Tokopedia did absolutely nothing. All of the call center process, live chats, and return policy were merely non solutive AI or templates without further action can be taken by users. Once I was directed to the live chat, he just left from the chat after I addressed my problem. These were not just happened once, but countless. Want to get paid while doing nothing? Tokopedia.

I don't understand with Tokopedia anymore. Your UI is so annoying recently. I want to check my last purchase, already set the date, but not appear at all. Only 90 days before. I like to give a review, but the flow now? I have to upload at tokopedia media, then from that page I choose photo to put on review. Can't directly from gallery! too many bugs. I miss my old, steady App

When I ordered an item, I waited weeks only for it to get stuck at a checkpoint. I complained and the customer service said that I had already recieved the package. I sent proof of the missing package and they promised a full refund and until now I still haven't recieved my refund yet. I had to order another one.

good but have to improve the seller quality, these minute, there is seller that try to trick the rule that toped had been built, following the procedure but asking for extra money if the merchandise to be send. there no solution if there is problem, buyer have to solve their problem themselves. to face the "bad" seller. damn.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Toppers, terima kasih atas rating yang kamu berikan serta kepercayaan kamu dalam memilih Tokopedia sebagai tempat berbelanja online. Jika kamu punya kritik/saran, atau ada kendala pada aplikasi Tokopedia, silakan info melalui Tokopedia Care

The app really became garbage. Now it's not possible to be delivered anymore from some shops that haven't changed their delivery settings. The chat is often crashing and not updating. And there are SO MANY ADS in the search results. So many that I don't search anymore in the app. I search on the laptop with adblocker. Gratis ongkir is actually not gratis. Because of all this, now I just slowly change to Blibli to be honest. It's sad.

hey, I can't short item from cheapest price first. it's broken. same as your websites, it's broken. i don't know why i don't see any improvement from you lately, it's just getting worse and worse. features are broken one by one, and sometimes I fail to check out my items and put an item into the wishlist. please fix it.

The best online shopping in Indonesia! The delivery price ia a bit pricy but worth it. All payments, purchases and invoices history through Tokopedia is kept well on their data base even for 6 years long. No money laundry could have been happened on doing transaction with Tokopedia such as Utilities and other monthly bills. Plus, they mail all the invoices to your email for the proof. Unlike other apps they did not mail the invoices such as sh**pee and D*na.. thank you for being professional.

WORST ONLINE SHOPPING, CS are not useful and not discipline about time, Worst e commerce ever, filter are just never works, i facing hundred of incomplete database error or even 403 404, infinitely loop loading which are super annoying and the reason im slowly moving to shopee, thats really unacceptable for e commerce, i never experience any problem related to database or server error with Shopee

Yep still around and still have problems , finding the English Button last Review 2023. Same problems. Son Balinese could not find solution. On the Help Line. took him 20 minutes to go round in circles. l sent Email to Head Office in English and Bahasa. Yeah also made enquiry to purchase. No one uses Translate. Will give it a week, then Uninstall again. Strange all the Ratings are in English ?????????????

Impolite CS. End the chat even we haven't finish the problem and never get any solution. Customer will always be disadvantage if there's any issue. Seller can send anything they want and get profit because of that.
Every time I want the application transaction to be just loading, and unfortunately my discount is gone. even after I entered the payment pin using gopay, my goods were not purchased / checked out
laggy. My phone had no issue to run other apps and even games on split screen. But with only opening this app? The app laggy even after closing alll the other apps
Useless search function especially "in store" one, I've searched an obvious keyword of some products within the store and somehow it won't appear in the search results

More than half of the sellers have empty stores. They are scammers who don't ship and wait for the system to automatically cancel and refund the money. No one cares. The customer service center is the stupidest I have ever seen in all shopping apps. As long as there is money in the account, whether it is the buyer or the seller, the backend can freeze it at will. Moreover, the customer service is so stupid that it is impossible to communicate and can't understand human language.

I used to love shopping here but lately it's just getting worse and worse. So sad, since tiktokshop bought tokopedia, they never done anything to improve tokopedia, it's like they don't really care, just waiting till it eventually dies

scraped_reviews.content: Apps too heavy. Can't even navigate. Pop up notification while opening the app makes the app sluggish

Tokopedia is not trustworthy. There are many scammers operating on this platform and Tokopedia does nothing to help the buyer against them. Over Rp.5,000,000 was stolen by Tokopedia from me. I highly recommend that you think 10x before using this service. Perhaps if there are others interested we can take Tokopedia to court as a group and report them to the Police Fraud Division. I have all the evidence documented with video and screenshots to prove the criminal intent of this platform.
I've been getting a lot of server errors lately when adding items to cart or trying to pay, usually with error code IO-XXX. The last three letters always change.

title: AllTrails: Hike, Bike & Run
description:
Whether you hike, bike, run, or walk, AllTrails is your companion and guide to the outdoors. Find detailed reviews and inspiration from a community of trailgoers like you. We‚Äôll help you plan, live, and share your outdoor adventures.

AllTrails offers more than a running app or fitness activity tracker. It helps you discover dog-friendly, kid-friendly, stroller-friendly, or wheelchair-friendly trails, and more with turn-by-turn navigation to guide you through it.

‚óÜ Discover trails: Search over 500,000 trails around the world by location, interest, skill level, and more.
‚óÜ Plan your next adventure: Get in-depth trail info, from reviews to conditions to GPS driving directions ‚Äî and save your favorite trails for later.
‚óÜ Stay on course: Stick to your planned route or chart your own course with confidence when you navigate on the trail with your phone or Wear OS device. Use Wear OS to leverage tiles and complications to start and monitor your activities.
‚óÜ Find points of interest: Discover waterfalls, historic sites, ‚Ä®photo spots, and more along the trail.
‚óÜ Grow your community: Celebrate outdoor adventures and find inspiration by connecting with trailgoers like you.
‚óÜ Share your outdoor adventures: Easily post trails and activities on Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp.
‚óÜ Record your activity: Capture your stats, leave reviews, and post photos of your favorite hiking trails.


Discover trails that fit your nature. Trails for workout planners, hikers, walkers, mountain bikers, trail runners, and casual cyclists. Whether you‚Äôre pushing your limits or pushing a stroller, there‚Äôs something out there for everyone. Let AllTrails help you find it.

‚ñ∫ Do more outdoors with AllTrails Plus ‚ñ∫
Spend less time figuring out where you want to be, and more time enjoying where you are. With offline maps, wrong-turn alerts, and extra safety and planning features, your annual subscription gives you more tools for more adventures.

‚óÜ Search by distance from you to find the closest trails.
‚óÜ Plan for the elements like ground conditions, weather, air quality, UV index, and more.
‚óÜ See how conditions change along the trail and preview by time of day.
‚óÜ Unplug completely or pack a backup with printed maps.
‚óÜ Explore without service with map downloads for trails, parks, and entire areas.
‚óÜ Live share your trail activity with friends and family.
‚óÜ Prepare for the hills ahead: Follow topo maps and trail maps in 3D.
‚óÜ Focus on the view, not the map, with wrong-turn alerts.
‚óÜ Give back: AllTrails donates a portion of every subscription to 1% for the Planet.
‚óÜ Explore ad-free: Remove occasional ads by subscribing

‚ñ∫ New! Explore to the fullest with AllTrails Peak ‚ñ∫

Make the most of your time on the trail with our newest premium membership. Chart your own course, plan ahead for conditions, and explore popular trails ‚Äî with all the offline benefits of Plus.

‚óÜ Create your own route from scratch, or modify one of 500,000+ existing trails.
‚óÜ Explore the most popular places with heatmaps of recent trail activity.
‚óÜ Access every Plus and Base feature, too.

Whether you‚Äôre geocaching in a national park, browsing bucket-list mountain bike routes, or planning a trail run to clear your head, AllTrails Plus and Peak make the great outdoors even greater.
descriptionHTML:
Whether you hike, bike, run, or walk, AllTrails is your companion and guide to the outdoors. Find detailed reviews and inspiration from a community of trailgoers like you. We‚Äôll help you plan, live, and share your outdoor adventures.

AllTrails offers more than a running app or fitness activity tracker. It helps you discover dog-friendly, kid-friendly, stroller-friendly, or wheelchair-friendly trails, and more with turn-by-turn navigation to guide you through it.

‚óÜ Discover trails: Search over 500,000 trails around the world by location, interest, skill level, and more.
‚óÜ Plan your next adventure: Get in-depth trail info, from reviews to conditions to GPS driving directions ‚Äî and save your favorite trails for later.
‚óÜ Stay on course: Stick to your planned route or chart your own course with confidence when you navigate on the trail with your phone or Wear OS device. Use Wear OS to leverage tiles and complications to start and monitor your activities.
‚óÜ Find points of interest: Discover waterfalls, historic sites, ‚Ä®photo spots, and more along the trail.
‚óÜ Grow your community: Celebrate outdoor adventures and find inspiration by connecting with trailgoers like you.
‚óÜ Share your outdoor adventures: Easily post trails and activities on Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp.
‚óÜ Record your activity: Capture your stats, leave reviews, and post photos of your favorite hiking trails.


Discover trails that fit your nature. Trails for workout planners, hikers, walkers, mountain bikers, trail runners, and casual cyclists. Whether you‚Äôre pushing your limits or pushing a stroller, there‚Äôs something out there for everyone. Let AllTrails help you find it.

‚ñ∫ Do more outdoors with AllTrails Plus ‚ñ∫
Spend less time figuring out where you want to be, and more time enjoying where you are. With offline maps, wrong-turn alerts, and extra safety and planning features, your annual subscription gives you more tools for more adventures.

‚óÜ Search by distance from you to find the closest trails.
‚óÜ Plan for the elements like ground conditions, weather, air quality, UV index, and more.
‚óÜ See how conditions change along the trail and preview by time of day.
‚óÜ Unplug completely or pack a backup with printed maps.
‚óÜ Explore without service with map downloads for trails, parks, and entire areas.
‚óÜ Live share your trail activity with friends and family.
‚óÜ Prepare for the hills ahead: Follow topo maps and trail maps in 3D.
‚óÜ Focus on the view, not the map, with wrong-turn alerts.
‚óÜ Give back: AllTrails donates a portion of every subscription to 1% for the Planet.
‚óÜ Explore ad-free: Remove occasional ads by subscribing

‚ñ∫ New! Explore to the fullest with AllTrails Peak ‚ñ∫

Make the most of your time on the trail with our newest premium membership. Chart your own course, plan ahead for conditions, and explore popular trails ‚Äî with all the offline benefits of Plus.

‚óÜ Create your own route from scratch, or modify one of 500,000+ existing trails.
‚óÜ Explore the most popular places with heatmaps of recent trail activity.
‚óÜ Access every Plus and Base feature, too.

Whether you‚Äôre geocaching in a national park, browsing bucket-list mountain bike routes, or planning a trail run to clear your head, AllTrails Plus and Peak make the great outdoors even greater.
summary: Explore the outdoors: hiking trail maps, bike trails, camping & backpacking maps

scraped_reviews.content: I like this app for the ability to search trails, however, I wish the trails that charge admission were marked instead of having people drive all the way out to an area just to find out it's a campground and you can't get in without paying. The very next trail we tried was out in the middle of nowhere, it just dropped us off on a residential road where we had no service, nowhere to park, and no trail in sight. We're traveling and so far, this app is sending us on a goose chase.
