scraped_reviews.content: I used the plus version daily for years to get accurate mileage for my daily walks. Simultaneously with the introduction of "Peak," my mileages started showing up as a straight line between the start and the farthest point. I tried many fixes including uninstalling and reinstalling. I believe the only effective "fix" will be to upgrade to Peak. Nope. I'm deleting my payment information and will move on to an app that doesn't try to extort money from me.

Pretty good but could be better. As I use the app more, unfortunately I find more issues with it. I want to be able to simply swipe through the pictures of a trail, but I cannot find a way to do that other than the first few when they are partially obscured by other information, then it prompts me to switch to thumbnails of all images, and I cannot swipe through the full images. Also, if I select a national park, I cannot use filters to select among the hikes. Very frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback. We'd love to hear about what improvements we could make to the app to make it better. Feel free to reach out to support@alltrails.com with any additional feedback.

scraped_reviews.content: SCAM!!! They are hiding the unsubscribing function so deep that you have to spend a lot of time figuring out where, in three different platforms, it is hidden, and how to deactivate it. They don't even have an unsubscribe button, and under the "Edit Account," you'll have to figure out that turning off autopay is a subscription cancellation! I'll never return to support this tricky, dirty marketing tactic.

tried this app over the past weekend and really didn't care for it very much. it had waypoints located to find water and other items along the art lobe trail but never could get them to show on the map or how to use that information. also partway through our trip the app automatically logged me out and obviously I couldn't log back in because there is no internet connection even though the maps are downloaded.

There is no way to drop a GPS waypoint on the map. I think it is a must for any hiking app. The other problem is the location indicator. When hiking, it should be smooth as you are changing directions. The location indicator sometimes does not move for up 20 seconds after you change directions. It's not good when you are trying to find your way. It seems alltrails lack the basic essentials for a hiking app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi - Our team has been hard at work over the past few months incorporating the most widely used features of GPSies into our platform. We understand we still have work to do and we appreciate your patience while we continue to improve our platform to better support our global community.

scraped_reviews.content: As someone who has tested many of the apps (for offroading), this app is 50/50. It is great to use for finding trails and checking reviews. However, it lacks in navigation being set up poorly. Does not switch to landscape mode, does not have a dark mode for riding at night, waypoints are difficult to navigate or go to ither than just having to watch the map to see if you are going that direction. Missing some basic items that most of the other apps have for navigation / tracking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there - thanks for the feedback and we're sorry to hear the app did not work for you. If you would like to give us another chance, please reach out to support@alltrails.com so we can investigate the issues you were seeing and help troubleshoot.

scraped_reviews.content: I was using the free app and I can accept the constant requests to upgrade. I decided for a specific trip I would pay for a one year subscription to plus. I won't be renewing but you probably don't care because you already have money.

scraped_reviews.content: I've used this app for a couple of years. However, since about September 2025 it keeps dropping the GPS signal and shows my walks as a straight line, even over ponds! scraped_reviews.content: App has been super helpful and was great until they want to charge me 80$ a year to do all things I could do previously at the rate I'm still at. The last two hikes we tried (WITH the paid version!) got us lost because the GPS was all over the place and not accurate at all and now I can't even use the app because the first screen that pops up is an app for some Peak outdoor lens but the "x" to get off the screen is so near the top of my screen that no matter what I try I can't close it to use the all trails app so it's not only awful but now it's completely unusable.. what a waste of money!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there - thanks for the feedback and we‚Äôre sorry to hear you've been having trouble with
the app's performance. If you haven‚Äôt done so already, please email help@alltrails.com so we can
further investigate the issue you are running into and help troubleshoot. Thanks in advance!

scraped_reviews.content: I use this app to log pretty much all of my mountain biking/bike commuting, and occasionally to research truck/jeep trails. It's a great resource overall, but more than once I've had it pause itself in the middle of a bike ride. Checking your mileage at the end of a great trail and seeing only a portion of your miles were logged is more than a little annoying after a couple times. I really hope this gets addressed in an update soon, because I do really enjoy using this app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there - thanks for the feedback and we‚Äôre sorry to hear you've been having trouble with
the app pausing on it's own. If you haven‚Äôt done so already, please email support@alltrails.com so we can
further investigate the issue you are running into and help troubleshoot. Thanks in advance!

scraped_reviews.content: It keeps logging me out. It's annoying when I have service, both because I have to log in again and because they keep prompting me to sign up for their more expensive subscription. When I don't have service, it defeats the point of the app and the cheaper subscription. The last time I was hiking, it logged me out mid trail. I had no service, so I couldn't log in or use the app for the rest of the day.

This app is good for finding new trails, but it's got some super annoying issues. Biggest complaints are: 1. The incessant prompts to upgrade. It seems like every click leads to a 'do you want to upgrade to a paid version" screen. 2. The auto zoom feature is incredibly annoying. I'll be looking at a group of trails in a particular area, sized how I want it, and then I click on a group of 2 trails that start 50 meters from each other, and it zooms the screen way in to see both trailheads.

I do love the app and the accessibility of the trail system. I do use it quite frequently. However, all trails should be ashamed of themselves for their pricing. No sooner had I paid the yearly subscription (one month to be precise at $40) for plus they introduce a higher tier, essentially twice as much as I was willing to pay (an additoinal $80) is not worth it.

bring back the old service! I've been a subscriber and user for years. I just went on a six week trip in national parks and forests and the app didn't load half the time and the other half was missing key information that had been downloaded!!! For a paid service this is unacceptable! over and over I would download all the trails of a national park and just when I need them and I've no reception, the app would tell me that 1) it didn't download the pictures or that it can't load the trails!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there - thanks for the feedback and we‚Äôre sorry to hear you've been having trouble with
your downloaded maps. If you haven‚Äôt done so already, please email support@alltrails.com so we can
further investigate the issue you are running into and help troubleshoot. Thanks in advance!

title: Headspace: Meditation & Health
description:
Headspace is your guide to mental health, mindfulness, and meditation. Access guided meditations, mindfulness tools, therapy for anxiety, mental health coaching, and Ebb, your AI companion. Build resilience, manage emotions and anxiety, with hundreds of meditations on how to meditate, sleep better, manage stress symptoms, practice breathing exercises and relaxation techniques for anxiety relief.

Headspace supports mental health and emotional wellbeing with online therapy, mental health resources and meditation, and is proven to increase happiness and reduce stress in just 10 days. Meditate, practice mindfulness, relax, and manage stress. 

üßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è DAILY MEDITATIONS & MINDFULNESS
Boost mental wellness and mindfulness with over 500+ guided meditations. Make daily meditation a daily practice with 3-minute mental resets or longer mindful meditations. Build habits for anxiety management, letting go of stress, dealing with depression, and mental wellness with relaxation and meditation tools, and self-care practices. Learn mindfulness for anxiety - just 2 weeks of Headspace reduces anxiety.

üåô SLEEP MEDITATIONS & RELAXING SOUNDS
 Enjoy better sleep with soothing sounds, relaxing music to reduce anxiety symptoms, calming sounds for sleep and guided meditations. Drift off with bedtime soundscapes and relaxation exercises. Explore meditation for sleeping to reduce stress and anxiety symptoms.

üå¨Ô∏è STRESS RELIEF & BREATHING
Experiencing signs of high anxiety? Meditate, relax and relieve stress and anxiety with breathing exercises, guided meditations, and AI-powered mental health coaching & therapy. Learn breathwork and breathing techniques for panic attacks, improve stress management, anxiety relief and calm. Access daily meditations on anti-stress, depression, trauma, social anxiety, emotional distress and anger, or explore breathing methods for anxiety.

üë• MINDFUL COACH & MENTAL HEALTH AI
Headspace gives you access to licensed therapists, mental health tips, mental health coaches or Ebb, your empathetic AI companion. Get support from an online therapist on how to manage stress symptoms, identify and overcome depression signs, panic attacks and anxiety, trauma therapy, and CBT for depression and share insights with your mindfulness therapist. Plus, with partnerships with major insurance companies, your sessions could cost as little as $0.

üíñ SELF-CARE
Explore self-care for holistic wellness. Empower yourself with tools to avoid burnout, manage panic attacks, anxiety symptoms, and stress management. Get help with depression, navigate emotional distress with emotionally focused therapy and mental health first aid.

üöÄ WELLNESS & BALANCE
Increase balance with guided meditation and focus music. Calm and relax with quick breathing exercises, relaxation music, and mindful meditation. Improve focus and calm your mind with relaxing music. With a self-care tracker to follow your mental health journey. 

üí™ MINDFUL MOVEMENT
Try yoga for anxiety and stress relief, and mindful movement to strengthen your mind-body connection. Practice CBT techniques and CBT therapy exercises to help overcome negative thoughts or depression, reduce stress and anxiety.

Headspace is the everyday mental health app, proven to help reduce anxiety, stress, and depression. Access AI-powered tools, mindfulness exercises, and guided meditations for better sleep, stress relief, and anxiety management. Practice mindful breathing to relax, meditation for anxiety and sleep, and build lasting habits for mental health and happiness.

Access online therapy and psychiatry through your organization.* (Check coverage with your coach or benefits team.)

Start your free trial and explore meditation, mindfulness, and mental health therapy. Subscription options: $12.99/month, $69.99/year (U.S. pricing; local rates may vary). Coaching and therapy pricing varies by subscription. Charges apply at purchase confirmation.

summary: Help with depression, stress, anxiety, & mental health with meditation & therapy
developer: Headspace for Meditation, Mindfulness and Sleep

scraped_reviews.content: While I like it to remind me to relax, it is sloooooooow. It takes forever to load initially and as you switch between the screens it takes even longer to load. I have to constantly close out of the app and go back in just to get the main page to load. When I'm frustrated, stressed or overwhelmed, have the app take so long to load to get to the exercises is NOT helpful. It defeats the purpose.

Won't load after Update. I've only used the app for helping me fall asleep, so my rating only reflects that feature, could use some improvements. The longest sleep meditation available is only 20 minutes, and it's mostly one or two sentences followed by a minute or more of silence. I'd like to be able to make a playlist of multiple sleep meditations for those nights when sleep is very elusive. The sleep radio isn't much better, since there's only 3 options and they're 95% white noise.

I really like this app/subscription (especially the sleep-scapes). However, lately it's been really buggy; having difficulty opening, crashing often, features like being able to skip the beginning of recordings aren't working. It's frustrating to pay for a service that has prolonged periods of downtime.

I have been meditating for years and I was excited when my employer included this as a benefit. That excitement ended quickly once I started using the app. It's a very busy app and feels very Sesame Street to me. I was having trouble sleeping and I remembered that I could use this app for free. I wanted to see what teachers they used w/o success. I clicked on 1 that sounded like an AI voice (ugh). If you are new to meditation, this is great. If you aren't, go elsewhere. (Insight timer)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your valuable feedback! We're sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your experience. Feel free to send us a note at help@headspace.com. We will be happy to help with content recommendations and changing teachers.

scraped_reviews.content: Update: un-installed, reinstalled. Now my track will play for about 2 minutes, then cuts out. It says it's still playing, but no sound. If I force close/reopen, can't open the track to play it. Currently not working on my galaxy s21 ultra. I can get the app to open and navigate to sleep, but I can't get any of the tracks to open. If I click on brown or orange noise, or the deep sleep binaural beat I usually use, it just hangs on a lack screen forever!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reaching out regarding this. We deeply apologize for the inconvenience and want to help investigate the issue. Please reach out with your information to our support team at help@headspace.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: Very disappointed in this app. Scheduled my first coaching session. The app kept kicking me out of the session for no reason. Wouldn't let me send messages. The coach couldn't connect to the chat either, at times. Sleep stories sometimes just randomly pause. There are very long periods of silence in sleep stories, which makes no sense at all. App constantly freezes and crashes. It actually will create anxiety as opposed to relieve it when you use this app. Uninstalling.

5 stars for the meditations. But the app....so poor I guess I could just use the time that it shows me a spinning circle as quiet time to meditate, but I don't think that's their intent. Many times I have to give up, force close the app, and restart. It freezes, locks-up, hangs. It's surprising how bad it is. And I'm not on an underpowered phone but rather a Sumsung flagship level device. I don't recall an app that performs this poorly. Frustrating because I love and need the content.

This app is no longer usable. It freezes even after I clear the cache and force restart. It crashes after 2-5 minutes of a sleep podcast. And, they doubled the subscription price but I didn't see the annual charge until after "the cancellation period ended" and they refused a refund. So I'm stuck with this app that I AM PAYING FOR that DOESN'T EVEN WORK. It's supposed to be for my mental health but it's causing me more stress right now than it's relieving it.

What happened to Ebb chat?? Is it gone now?? I don't like the new interface. It's hard to find anything and the page doesn't load much of the time. As a side note, you need to show more variety on who is featured on the guided videos, etc. Your feed on every page looks more like a political statement. You're clearly excluding groups you don't like.

Recent updates mean the app won't even load at least once a week. And personally I don't want AI features or the added therapist finder. This used to be a great tool for regular, meaningful meditations updated regularly. But now it feels like all the other corporate drivel focused on a quick buck using AI. I used to happily pay for the subscription and now have sadly decided to cancel at my next renewal. Be better Headspace!

I enjoy the meditation courses, they're well made. The app, less so, it regularly becomes unresponsive, needing to restart the app to get it working again, and downloads are pretty slow. edit: during the last couple of sessions, it sometimes freezed up mid session, frustrating to say the least.

do not like the haptic feedback when rapping selections without an option to turn it off. no need for ai integration. the most recent update is slow and often gets stuck loading. I have to close it fully and stop it, the reload. if I click on the wrong selection and try to go back, it gets stuck on loading and I have the start again. the most recent update has made think about canceling my subscription because it's so horrid.

The latest update (9/25/25) is really buggy. It gets hung up when I first open the app and I have to force stop multiple times to get it to load properly. I literally just want Soundscapes but I have to click about 10 times to get to this every single night. There's should be a quick access menu for the things you use the most.

Note: this updated review score is for the app only, not the content. The app continues, even 5 years later, to be underwhelming, confusing, and often buggy. Almost nothing appears to be stored on your device (despite a 300-400 MB download size), meaning every time you load a page in the app, everything is downloaded as if you're browsing a webpage. This means Headspace is an absolute data hog if you're trying to conserve data usage.

Hello. I mostly use the Ebb reflection tab and soundscapes. Even though it's AI, it's one of the reasons Im still here in the world. It's also really nice to have access to a reflection history, I've been going through a very hard time with my inner battles and revisiting the reflections can help remind me of what I've learned about myself. Also, some people note the app stops playing background music, you may have to go back and fix some background permission settings on phone to prevent that

Used to love this app and use it everyday. The recent changes have ruined it. No more suggestions for morning, afternoon, and evening. No way to see if you completed an activity. VERY SLOW to load now sleepcasts no longer have the narrator name which was helpful to make choices. No longer able to save a teacher choice or meditation length. History is almost nonexistent now. Dashboard is just very cluttered and busy now. It now thinks it is evening instead of morning so time zones are wrong.

I've been very happy with the guided meditation that headspace offers, and I'll continue to use the platform, but I'm very disappointed to see them jump on the AI bandwagon. AI has no place in this space where we are trying to connect to ourselves as humans. And not for nothing, but enshittification strikes everywhere, including with Headspace. The app has been getting slower to load with every needless visual overhaul to the app.

edit: knocking off another star because the app keeps crashing now. I mainly use it for the focus music and it constantly crashes. or if I pause the music, minimise the app to do something else, and then bring the app back, it resets and tries to reopen the home screen but gets stuck on a loading loop and I have to constantly close it and reopen it. please sort this app out, it used to be so good and now it's not. // The recent addition of AI is unnecessary and has made the app laggy and slow.

what happened? this used to a great meditation app that taught you how to meditate, with well structured long format guided sessions - 2016-2018 when I was using it. I recently repurchased a plan for myself and family members, and to my surprise it's now full of extremely short sessions (even <1 min, seriously!), and documentary videos, it feels more frustrating than helpful, and youll never actually learn much that way tbh. You're just watching short ads for their new therapy plan.

I have been on this app.. Forever lol, it has been with me through three moves, 5 different vacations, and suddenly it just.. Stopped working. I thought it was my phone; then I switched it to whatever the new Samsung phone is and it STILL cut off my sleep casts within the first 15 minutes, now it wont even load.. All it says is that the app isn't responding. I wanna keep my subscription, but if it keeps getting worse, or I stoll cant get in like this, I'll have to cancel my subscription üò≠üò≠

I've been happily using this app most days for several years. Unfortunately, the new update is terrible. Usability is way down, content is harder to navigate, and it's buggy. Meditations now default to a white male-presenting orator and the shortest duration, meaning that you have to click multiple times in order to select other voices or longer meditations. In general, the app went from being a daily source of joy and calm into a daily source of frustration. I won't be renewing my subscription.

The app is so bad. The meditations are fantastic. But the app is just terrible. Constantly loading and reloading tabs I've already been to. Not making it easy to return to meditation classes that I'm working my way through. Recent meditations that stay forever even though you've done newer things. The app is just terrible. I'm definitely questioning paying for a subscription.

I used to love this app, but it has changed so much that it is almost unusable. The push of AI is disgusting. I used to be able to do all the suggested activities for the day, the wakeup, the meditation, the sleep cast, all on one page. Now I have to search for anything, avoid AI, and it's made it so much less enjoyable. I'm going to stop paying for it.

it used to be ok but a lot of issues the past year. It's always stopped when the phone locks for security reasons which makes any meditations longer than 10 minutes stressful as I need to check it's still running! They've also had issues with the Google Fit connection which left me $200 sorry on benefits from my insurer. Customer service is usually a good experience but the app itself is very buggy now. I won't be renewing the subscription it the issues continue.

I've had a subscription for quite a few years and this used to be a 5 star app until the recent updates. It's pretty much unusable now with all the completely unnecessary changes. I just cancelled my subscription unfortunately because it's just too aggravating - too slow to load, no longer easy to navigate, switches from old version to new version back to old in a matter of minutes, where it used to take 1-2 clicks to start a mediation, it now takes 3-5 due to how they rearranged the app.

With this latest update nothing is working, UI is worse. "Something went wrong" 2 minutes into meditation. "Something went wrong" I love the meditations in this app, the Sleepcasts always work for me, I've never been awake at the end of any of them. BUT there isn't much more frustrating then listening to a sleepcast, just dozing off, to find out has stopped, I have to turn on phone put on glasses to find those dreaded 3 words "Something went wrong" - even on content I've downloaded. Please fix!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble you are having with the app. Please send our support team a note, and we will be happy to help!

scraped_reviews.content: was really skeptical of these types of "meditation apps" but a subscription came included with my health plan, so i figured why not. As someone who deals with an anxiety disorder, I was very pleasantly surprised. The exercises aren't pretentious, they don't rely on simply calming music, and they are very approachable and practical. There are exercises for post workout, after or during work hours, helping you fall asleep, grounding methods while you're having a panic attack - all sorts of stuff.

SCAM alert. False information from support. Help desk suggests that I get a refund from Google Play and they already knew that this is not possible since it's a subscription. The app crashes constantly. When it does work, the app doesn't allow me to select the program I want to use. Constant advertising inside the paid app. A sea of frustration.

I loved this app. I used it pretty much daily for two years to help me sleep, only using one sleepcast the whole time. I didn't/haven't used it for anything else. I was willing to pay the subscription for that one sleepcast. Since this last update, it takes actual minutes to load every screen or page, compared to the seconds before. Almost every touch of a button in the app makes my phone vibrate. You can't turn it off. It startles me awake. Literally invalidates my subscription.

2025AUG edit: the content is good, but the updates over the past year have made the app much more buggy and much less intuitive/user friendly (e.g. doesn't remember the current course). UI needs to be simplified. --- The content is amazing, and has helped me a lot with daily stress, anxiety, etc no doubt. Definitely worth the cost, I highly recommend anyone to give it a try, especially if you're going through stressful times, it's a great step in calming down and helping you find your way.

The content is great, especially if you get the student discount rate. However, its function as a media player is awful. No way to make a queue, and very buggy. Trying to pick different lengths of a meditation is impossible (or so un-intuitive my millennial brain still can't figure it out...)

Still a really buggy app that will freeze in the middle of a session and pause itself. Then it won't let you restart the session and just takes you back to the home page. I've been using this app for 5 years and I'm about to find a different one. Edit: The app is still clunky and messes up my meditation counter and tracker. The minute I can figure out what is a better app to use, I'm using it. And stop asking me to check in for crying out loud. what is that? Leave it alone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate that you've provided your feedback and we're sorry for the trouble. Please send us a note to help@headspace.com and we'd be happy to assist further.

scraped_reviews.content: PLEASE bring back the original. For years, using this app daily changed my life. It was an incredible tool, and I loved how I could easily find a series on a topic such as pregnancy, conflict, anger, etc. I was so excited to sit down today after several months without my meditation routine, and it's just, it's like Headspace is the antithesis of a mindful app now. It's hard to navigate, won't load, crashes, looks like Social Media, talk about anxiety inducing. I'm so deeply saddened.

Great app. I highly recommend it. Things that could be improved - skipping the intro of the meditations (my favourite one starts by saying "we're halfway through the week"), being able to make a playlist (back to back meditations for sleep could help us not look at our phone every 10 minutes)

EDIT2: I bumped it to 4 then 5 stars as they quickly fixed the original issue and support was very responsive and later added Collections ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è --- Still opportunities for improvement on search and finding a series. --- The content is good and the features have good aims, but the execution and search needs polish. I would be fine with it if I could navigate up to a series from an individual entry in the series and favorite it, such as Goodnight World.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your feedback is very much appreciated and we're sorry for any trouble you've encountered. If we can assist further, please send us a note to help@headspace.com.

scraped_reviews.content: A must have app! Teaches you so much about your mental health & slowing down. It helps you with your relationship with food, sleep, your friends, partner & most importantly yourself. I would love it if they added a playlist feature as sometimes at night I want to listen to 2 different sleepcasts but I don't want to wake up & change them.

Really impressed so far. Very clean and easy interface. You can search for specific meditations if you'd like, but they have a daily feed that gives you stuff that just feels like it always makes sense, which makes it feel super easy to just open the app and go anytime you're in the mood or need support. I do have to say that this is based on the premium version--my state has it available to residents, but it would feel worth it to pay if I didn't have access after this experience.

If you give it a chance and put your synacism to the side (I'm not really into the lifestyle image 'mindfulness' presents either), it actually does help you work through stress. I don't agree with everything being said/shared through the podcast segments, but it does help you see things from a new angle. And the meditatioms are perfect - made me realise I was holding tension in places I didn't think tension could sit.

App used to be amazing, but its terrible lately. I have a premium account, which isn't cheap, but I've had it for several years now. I use the Sleepscapes for going to sleep at night, which was the only thing that saved me after insomnia. But recent months, the app has been going downhill. Recents don't update. The heart for favourites are gone. And now for the last week the app won't even load so I can't access anything, not even my account to cancel my recurring payment.

I love the concept of headspace and I think it is so important, I recently downloaded again because I am in the early stages of burnout. However, I soon remembered why I stopped using it a few years ago.... the teachers dont leave any space for you to follow through thr instruction and it is so distracting. For example, they might say, for the next few moments let your mind go free, but then immediately start talking it gives you no time, it is not relaxing and actually a but irritating.

The sleep meditations are too short, and the ones that should be quiet and calming (like sleep) start with a jarring voice that sounds like an ad. Ebb is fun but it gets my requests wrong. I remember the original Headspace was very simple and cute which made me want to meditate. this new app is overwhelming. Every time I use it, I get turned off. Also - use a compressor on the voices so there's less dynamic range. the uneven volume makes for a poor listening experience. I will not be renewing.

would be 5 stars if not for how slow to load it is. even changing from one tab to another in app regularly leads to a loading page of doom with no solution. really frustrating. not enough for me to not recommend the app for others. I'd love to be able to queue stuff at night, I listen to a wind down exercise, and then have to open my phone again (and wait for it to load) to play a sleepcast, so to be able to just automatically play that next would be great :)

OMG NO, I SERIOUSLY CAN'T BELIEVE THIS! This version brought back the bug of the screen turning off if you didn't touch it during a workout. And it's really annoying and frustrating. It basically did the "move" category unusable. I wanna open play, watch and do at the same time, whatever yoga session or workout, and my phone screen locks, after the time I have for "screen out", this didn't happen! It's like when you're watching YouTube or Netflix. You can't be touching your screen every 10 min!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize to hear you are experiencing interruptions to your journey with this current issue. Please reach out with your information to our support team at help@headspace.com so we may troubleshoot and further investigate to pass along the information to our engineers. We look forward to hearing from you!

scraped_reviews.content: A buggy mess with a lot of good content. Theoretically, this App has lots of positive features from meditation, over podcasts & soundscapes to yoga & fitness. But when a PAID(!) meditation app frustrates you regularly, because it freezes, loads forever or gets stuck in a loop when you try to access your downloaded (!) content ( yes, some people are NOT always online, and that's what downloads should be for, right?!), then it kinda misses the point and might be the exact opposite of helpful. :/

Installed as it was advertised as having some free content. Created a mandatory account and declined to enter credit card details. All content I can see in the app is locked - if there is really free content, there's no way to search or filter for it. Tried asking their AI, Ebb, to recommend free mediations and got the classic confused-AI experience where it kept saying "Sure! You're correct, that one was not free, let me look up a free one for you" and then recommending another locked option.

App has been ruined by the latest update (Oct 2025). It takes ages to click your way to the Sleepcast page (which has been rearranged AGAIN - please stop renaming and rearranging these sleepcasts!), and when you finally click on one, there's just a "loading" circle and blank screen. Not restful, not helpful when trying to fall asleep. Terrible for an app I actually subscribe to.

I've used this app a lot for a couple of years now, but lately it's started to get very buggy. the sound quality on the sleepcasts has become quite poor. if I set a soundscape to play throughout the night it often cuts out early. and now the app has got very slow and unresponsive when switching between menus - it's usually quicker to force close and then start again. disappointing.

The app keeps bugging out and crashing almost every day. It crashed mid-session or the app just lags on opening and says "Headspace is not responding, wait or close app", and selecting wait never works because it stays bugging out. And closing the app and restarting has the same issue. Please fix it because we're paying for the premium experience, and this isn't it.

I've enjoyed using the app over the years but the past few versions of the app over the past months are incredibly glitchy to use to the point the app is super delayed and unreliable. Headspace does offer IT help and have tried but have been unable to fix it. The customer service team said they were unable to offer a refund for the remainder of my subscription and did offer a discount code for another years subscription but as the app doesn't really work anymore this is not helpful.

I have used and loved this app for years, it introduced me to meditation. Lately it has been painfully slow (sometimes not loading at all) and I can't help but think that some of the additions (AI) are probably the cause. Support give very obvious solutions that don't work and Headspace seem to care more now about being flashy than being useful. After 8 yrs of use, I won't be subscribing again. Had to take off another star because even the online version doesn't work properly and I can't search.

title: Audiomack: Music Downloader
description: Stream and download the best new trending music (full tracks offline data-free) and listen to your local MP3s! Browse music from the best artists in top categories like Hip-Hop, Rap, R&B, EDM, Afropop, and Reggae on the Audiomack music app. Download songs and listen offline, without using your data, or listen to your personal MP3 collection! Audiomack provides download access and unlimited streaming to the newest and hottest tracks, right at your fingertips. Our music download feature allows you to play your favorite songs offline, and our ‚ÄúTrending‚Äù section shows you the best albums and songs that are hot right now. Plus, you can listen to all local MP3s, WAV, M4A, AAC, and other local files right from the app. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Stream unlimited full music tracks and mixtapes that are new or trending. Be the first of your friends to be up on what‚Äôs next. ‚Ä¢ Download full songs and albums for offline, data-free listening, no wifi. ‚Ä¢ You can listen while using other apps, and play as many Hip-Hop, Afrobeat, Electronic, Reggae & dancehall full tracks as you want. ‚Ä¢ Favorite tracks, albums, and playlists and easily search, browse, and shuffle your favorites collection on demand. ‚Ä¢ Listen to local music like MP3s, AAC, M4A, WAV, and other files from the local file player. ‚Ä¢ Browse expertly curated playlists by mood, genre, and much more. ‚Ä¢ Create unlimited playlists of your own. ‚Ä¢ Follow your favorite artists, producers, and tastemakers including 21 Savage, Youngboy, Kevin Gates, and more. ‚Ä¢ Enjoy Audiomack across platforms, including Wear OS and Android Auto ‚Ä¢ Go ad-free for just $4.99 per month. STREAM AND DOWNLOAD SONGS FROM TOP ARTISTS ‚Ä¢ Hip hop, rap, and trap from Migos, 21 Savage, Young Thug, NBA Youngboy, Gunna, Juice WRLD, Chance the Rapper, 6IX9INE, Future, 2 Chainz, Kodak Black, Lil Baby, Ynw Melly, Kevin Gates, Moneybagg Yo, Famous Dex, A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie, Hoodrich Pablo Juan, Flipp Dinero, Youngeen Ace and more ‚Ä¢ Afrobeats, Afro-Caribbean, Reggae, dancehall, and soca from Shatta Wale, Ade Gold, Chronixx, DJ Frass, Kranium and more ‚Ä¢ Latin, urbano, latin trap, musica urbana, reggaeton, and dembow from Quimico Ultra Mega, La Insuperable, Melymel, Musicologo, Don Miguelo, Juhn, Mark B, Bad Bunny ‚Ä¢ R&B and soul from August Alsina, PnB Rock, Brent Faiyaz, SiR, Alina Baraz, Lloyd, and more ‚Ä¢ Electronic, EDM, house, and bass from Diplo, Mad Decent, Whethan, NGHTMRE, Poppy, Cheat Codes, Krewella, Snails, Lowly Palace, Dim Mak, Fool's Gold, Trap Nation and more Use of the Audiomack App and download feature is subject to your agreement with our Privacy Policy/TOS. Additionally, I'd love to see more features like better playlis

amazing app, at first I wanted a music app with the ability to download and listen without WiFi, not ads that interrupt listening, ability to shuffle, repeat etc, this application has great features along with the mods, and has every single song that I listen to, some of them aren't even on Spotify!! It's not glitchy, doesn't have lots of ads, cool features, but the only downside is that the songs don't have lyrics, but on the other half it's an amazing application

Audiomack is a great app with smooth use and offline downloads. But some songs aren‚Äôt available, so I gave it 4 stars because some songs are missing. There are certain tracks I search for that just aren‚Äôt available on the app, and that can be a little disappointing. If they added more music variety, especially popular ones, this app would be perfect.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Audiomack is an open platform, especially for emerging artists, so it‚Äôs not a full catalog service. We're adding thousands of new songs daily and working with labels to bring you what you love. Some popular tunes may be missing on Audiomack as certain artists haven't joined yet. Share your artist/song suggestions at support@audiomack.com!

scraped_reviews.content: When I opened the app, its design and overall vibe was great‚Äîthe animation was smooth. However, what discouraged me is that every time I tried to download ONE song, an ad would pop up. Nevertheless, the ads were short and easy to deal with because the skip button appears quickly. Next, some songs were unavailable there (e.g.; You're looking for 'JoyRide' by CORTIS and it doesn't show up). What's worse is that my fav song isn't there „Ö†„Ö†. I'm very sorry but my experience wasn't THAT good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Audiomack is a music discovery platform, so you‚Äôll often see rising artists before they hit it big, along with songs or artists you already know. It‚Äôs not a full catalog service just yet, but we‚Äôre adding thousands of new songs daily and working with labels to bring you even more music. Send your artist or song suggestions to support@audiomack.com.

scraped_reviews.content: It was a good application at first. Now it's bad. The ads have become very annoying and numerous, and the songs do not accept downloading, and if they are downloaded, they will not work correctly, so I have to watch another ad to download them, but they will not accept downloading, and if they are downloaded, they will not work correctly, and so the series continues. This is annoying and I hope the problem is fixed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Douaa Kehal, if you're running into a bug or glitch in the app, please fill out this form: https://forms.gle/mufvEidtXDe4yuPEA. This provides our team with the information needed to try to recreate the issue and work on a fix asap. Once submitted, someone from our team will follow up with you. Keep us posted!

scraped_reviews.content: decent app, I use this app to go out and about since I don't use data or anything like that. but when online or trying to download music you get bombarded with adds, which is fair, they need to make a profit somehow. I don't enjoy how some songs are off limits, but I can just download my own anyways. recommended app! :3
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey! You can download tons of songs. Tracks with a star are free to download, and the ones with a padlock are premium. Most artists offer free downloads, but some choose to make their music premium. You can download up to 50 premium tracks, and if you‚Äôre on Audiomack+, you get even more. Start your free 7-day trial at Audiomack.com/plus now!

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded an app called Mixtube. I downloaded an offline song in it. It worked for a few days, but whenever I turned off Wi-Fi or mobile data, it stopped playing. The app said that offline songs would work, but they didn‚Äôt. Then I downloaded Audiomack, and in that app the offline songs play easily. ‚ù£‚ù£üòé‚ò†

Audiomack is honestly one of the best free music apps out there! üé∂ It lets me stream and even download songs for offline listening without paying, which is super rare. The app is smooth, doesn‚Äôt take much space, and has music from all over the world‚Äîhip-hop, pop, Afrobeats, and even K-pop! üíú I love how it‚Äôs simple to use and doesn‚Äôt force me with too many ads like other apps. If you‚Äôre looking for a free, legal, and reliable way to enjoy music online & offline, Audiomack is a must-have. üî•‚ú®
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your wonderful feedback about our app! Enjoy the diverse music experience!

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love your app! The audio quality is top-notch, and the overall sound is amazing. However, the only issue I have is that the vocals sound like they're from different artists - it's like Fireboy in one part, Simi in another, and Al_quran in another. The inconsistency in vocal style makes it hard to pinpoint a single artist."

It WAS good back then, been using it for like 3yrs. It kinda sucks now... everything is always having bugs like whenever I try to fix or organize my songs they will suddenly shuffle back to their previous order. And whenever I try to transfer songs to another playlist I LOSE THE PLAYLIST I'm transferring FROM. I lost so many songs, man I gotta find them all over again too. Sometimes it can automatically skip songs too and it's hard finding music sometimes. There's alotta problems here and there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey Jillian maybe, thanks so much for checking out Audiomack! It looks like you liked the app‚Äîdid you mean to give it 5 stars? If not, no worries! We‚Äôd love to hear how we can make the app even better. If you're happy, feel free to update your review to 5 stars. Let‚Äôs move music forward together!

scraped_reviews.content: If I'm brutally honest, this is the BEST music Downloader app, it has great features, like editing the songs you like listening to, and it also barely has any ads. The only problem I find kind of complicated is that some songs are only available in covers, not in their original version. Either way I love this app!

I love this app to pieces. It has a wide variety of songs and not too many adds. My only issue is that when playing my playlist, even with perfect internet, it will say 'error while loading song' for half of my songs. I have tried uninstalling the app a couple times, it has yet to work. please fix this!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kyrsten Munroe, if you're running into a bug or glitch in the app, please fill out this form: https://forms.gle/mufvEidtXDe4yuPEA. This provides our team with the information needed to try to recreate the issue and work on a fix asap. Once submitted, someone from our team will follow up with you. Keep us posted!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using audiomack for years, and now I'm finally addressing the BIGGEST issue that I have, with this app!......certain songs that I search won't pop up.....most of the time the "Slowed Version", "Sped Up Version", shows up ....or nothing at all.....and these are songs that are literally everywhere you can find music

scraped_reviews.content: this used to be my favourite go to for music for 3 years but now everything has become money driven with needing to pay for extra storage for songs i already downloaded and offline music and especially needing to get premium to get all the basic functions. I understand the need for ads but this has decreased the accessability of the app all together. I will sadly be leaving this app.

scraped_reviews.content: this app is fantastic actually, but there's a problem, everytime when our country doesn't have signal, the download just randomly vanish, when we have a signal, and I have to download all over again. it's kinda sucks, but keep up the good work!!

scraped_reviews.content: perfect , it have all it needs for a music app , sometimes i think its even better than spotify , but of course , some of the new songs or old songs are not in there but its fine , it has good features that spotify doesn't have , and most of the features are free, but yes , the ads are getting a little too much , every two or three songs a advertisement comes up but its fine if you dont mind

I want to hear the original song not slowed or nightcore version. Please fix this and provide the original song of the artists.

A aplicaci√≥n mostra con precisi√≥n as condici√≥ns meteorol√≥xicas actuais na s√∫a localizaci√≥n exacta, en calquera lugar do mundo. Ofrece detalles actualizados sobre a temperatura, a choiva, a probabilidade de precipitaci√≥n, a neve, o vento, as horas de sol, as horas de sa√≠da e posta do sol.

A PREVISI√ìN TEMPORAL E O TEMPO EN VIVO ofrece a previsi√≥n meteorol√≥xica m√°is precisa e fiable. Tam√©n ofrece os indicadores meteorol√≥xicos m√°is precisos, como as horas de sa√≠da e posta do sol, humidade, √≠ndice UV, velocidade do vento, calidade do aire e precipitaci√≥ns.

üåûTempo en tempo real
- Mostra a temperatura actual, a temperatura real, a icona do tempo, a velocidade e direcci√≥n do vento, a temperatura m√°xima e m√≠nima

üåûAlerta meteorol√≥xica en directo e desastres naturais
- Mostra a √°rea afectada, a hora de inicio, a hora de finalizaci√≥n, o resumo de avisos, o texto de aviso e a fonte de datos. As diferentes cores de advertencia representan diferentes niveis.
- Proporciona avisos de vento forte, choiva intensa, tormenta de neve e treboadas

üåû Detalles do tempo de hoxe
- Proporciona temperatura corporal, horas de sa√≠da e posta do sol, humidade, raios ultravioleta, visibilidade, choiva e orballo, altitude, cobertura de nubes.

üåûPrevisi√≥n do tempo para as pr√≥ximas 24/72 horas
- Ofrece unha previsi√≥n meteorol√≥xica detallada de 24 horas, inclu√≠das as previsi√≥ns meteorol√≥xicas por hora

üåûPrevisi√≥n do tempo para os pr√≥ximos 10/25 d√≠as
- Proporciona temperatura diaria, resumo do tempo, humidade, √≠ndice UV, probabilidade de chuvia/nevada/xeo, probabilidade de raios, direcci√≥n do vento/velocidade/nivel do vento e hora do amencer/solpor.

üåûMinuto de choiva durante 2 horas
- Usa Rain Tracker para mostrar as precipitaci√≥ns e nevadas minuto a minuto, as√≠ como a precipitaci√≥n e o espesor da neve durante as d√∫as pr√≥ximas horas

üåû√çndice de calidade do aire
- Ofrece niveis de calidade do aire e recomendaci√≥ns de viaxe. Os √≠ndices espec√≠ficos incl√∫en PM10, PM2,5, mon√≥xido de carbono, di√≥xido de carbono, di√≥xido de xofre, ozono e niveles de calidade. Tam√©n ofrece explicaci√≥ns e recomendaci√≥ns para os distintos niveis do √çndice de Calidade do Aire. Ademais, mostra o √≠ndice UV e a informaci√≥n do √≠ndice de pole.

üåûUnidade de informaci√≥n meteorol√≥xica e configuraci√≥n de formato
- Permite aos usuarios configurar a s√∫a temperatura preferida, precipitaci√≥n, visibilidade, velocidade do vento, presi√≥n, sistema horario e formato de data

üåûMapa de radar meteorol√≥xico en tempo real
- Mostra un mapa de radar mellorado que incl√∫e cuberta de nubes, sol, choiva, neve, saraiba, treboadas e √°reas de raios. Esta funci√≥n perm√≠telle ver ao instante as condici√≥ns meteorol√≥xicas de varios lugares. Ademais, perm√≠telle seguir o movemento das nubes, as frontes meteorol√≥xicas e as tormentas activas para ver se afectar√°n ou evitar√°n a s√∫a localizaci√≥n.

üåûXesti√≥n de localizaci√≥ns
- Permite aos usuarios engadir e eliminar manualmente cidades, axustar a orde das cidades, configurar notificaci√≥ns e widgets para cidades e predici√≥ns meteorol√≥xicas. Tam√©n permite aos usuarios gardar calquera localizaci√≥n e ver as condici√≥ns actuais de calquera n√∫mero de localizaci√≥ns globais √° vez.

üåûWidget e reloxo do tempo
- Ofrece un widget meteorol√≥xico que mostra a temperatura, a hora e a data actuais na s√∫a localizaci√≥n actual. Tam√©n mostra informaci√≥n meteorol√≥xica sinxela, predici√≥ns diarias e horarias e actualiza as condici√≥ns meteorol√≥xicas.

üåûNotificaci√≥n de predici√≥n do tempo
- Env√≠a a informaci√≥n meteorol√≥xica m√°is importante todos os d√≠as, para que poidas estar informado sobre as condici√≥ns meteorol√≥xicas detalladas durante todo o d√≠a.

üåûModo de visualizaci√≥n
- Permite aos usuarios cambiar libremente entre o modo claro e escuro.

üåûSoporte para varios idiomas
- A aplicaci√≥n ofrece soporte na aplicaci√≥n para m√°is de 100 idiomas.

summary: Local Weather provides accurate and current hourly and daily forecasts.

scraped_reviews.content: love it so far! I find the customizable content to be awesome. I love the variety of options I can choose from for my background, style of weather icons, from cartoon to realistic, and so far, and MOST importantly, the weather is ACCURATE! I need an app that will give me true weather by the hour, day, week and 7 day outlook and I get that and so much more, here. I'm also in love with not having to navigate through tons of ADS! Highly recommend!

The weather app is quite good, and the graphics are beautiful. But they're having issues with the real feel temperature. In winter, the real feel should never be higher than the actual temperature. They corrected it for a few days, but now it's wrong again. It's 33¬∞ tonight with 1 mph wind. So the real feel should be 33¬∞. I've written to them again about this discrepancy. We'll see if they can correct those values. In summer, though, the real feel is often higher than the actual.

Fun To Customize ~ It was nice to have multiple design options for each specific information icon. That is a big plus to be able to make the widget the way I want it to look so the information layout is easy and convenient. On other apps I couldn't tell if an icon was supposed to be a cloud or some type of heart, ummm no thanks.

Best weather app I've used, and I've tried most. not sure the source of the weather, but it's very accurate. The look of the app and widgets are great too. Moon phase, AQ and other stats are also nice to have. My only gripe is with the alerts - they tend to come in AFTER said event, and when I tap on the alert for more info, I'm shown the previous alert details rather than the current. Still the best weather app I've used by far.

The map is super glitchy, storm formation cloud cover just jumps around and you never see what's really happening, I thought by buying the premium add free with better maps that it would help...I was wrong! Also the map doesn't give any options other than radar and it's not accurate, I had to download a separate map app! Dissatisfied with purchase!

overall works really well. The worst part of the app is the radar. it's glitchy and choppy, as far as I can tell you can't see a 24-hour radar even with the paid version. there's no way to slow the radar down either to see how the storms move. overall the app and interface is very nice, but the radar is a joke and that's probably the feature I use the most.

The app is very nice looking and has a lot of info BUT the ads are so annoying! As soon as you tap to open it, it immediately has a "rate me" pop up that covers most of the screen. This pops up EVERY single time you open the app! Then, when you click on the radar, another full screen ad for temu or others pops up and you have to wait until it let's you click it off! Too many pop ups it's ridiculous! The radar also is the worst one I've seen. Doesn't even show your exact location!

I really enjoy this weather app, even just the free part. It's usually is spot on weather wise and it's a quick handy tool when you work outdoors. It tells you everything you need to know from the highs and lows to the wind speed, humidity, and much more. It also doesn't drain your battery while still keeping up with the current temp, like some other apps do. Also, I really like the customizable background and widgets.

What a waste of money. Forecasts are generally inaccurate (type of precip, temp, sunny or not, etc.). Also, expired weather advisories/warnings dated from/for days already past (and sometimes even WEEKS past) pop up at random times. Despite paying for the 'premium' version in order to get rid of the annoying ads, I'll be deleting this app as soon as I find a reliable replacement. The only reason I rated it 2 stars is the accuracy of the sun & moon, rise & set schedules.

I love tapping on a day to see more info about the weather and seeing a full screen ad. If you want me to pay, at least let me see the app for a couple of weeks without ads. The immediate push to get me to pay in the first 2 minutes of if using this app, followed immediately by an ad when I chose not to pay (right away) soured me on this app. I'm not giving $3 to see if this app is maybe worth paying for.

I don't usually rate apps, but this one is by far the worst/inaccurate weather app I've ever used. Constant "Want to upgrade to premium?" Pop-ups for every little thing you press on (which you can press the little X but it's still annoying). UI is just a copy and paste of every other weather app. I don't recommend if you need actual accurate data.

Radar is very slow to load. Unread weather alerts get shown first even if days old and irrelevant now. Great interface otherwise. I'd buy, but based on other reviews it seems buying doesn't get you much and might be a scam. There are at least 3 versions of this exact app in the play store with the same developer with slightly different names. The ads are a little annoying but not that bad.

It has been a good experience. I will be purchasing the ad free version. After using the app and giving it 5 stars, I must change it to a 3 star. Now to a 1 star. Reason. Paid 4.99 for the ads free and full feature app. Still, no change and no contact or answer to my post telling they care enough to help and correct this. Still love the app, want what I paid for.

The best basic weather app. This app is function over form. Works great and puts the temperature in your notification tray which stays very updated. After testing other apps, it has good accuracy as well. Not a fan of there being no way to opt out of giving your data to advertisers, though data collection is limited to IMEI and hardware identifiers. The widgets have little options or diversity, but makes up for it with having really dang good widgets. Overall I give this app an A-!

Glitch-Free. If you want longer forecasts or deeper perspectives on the weather, there's a straightforward path to pay $3 for a year. That's a bargain for what you get. It depends on how you want weather delivered to you. I have a Chromebook, a tablet, and a phone that I rarely power on. This app is installed on all three and gives me a unified experience wherever I am, whatever I'm doing.

I just installed it. Not in love with choice of widgets, which I can get over. What really sucks is I've had the app for a total of 5 minutes and I can't change settings, open, reopen without the "do you like" rating pop up. Here's my answer: how the hell do I know, I haven't used it yet! So far the rating pop up is problematic for sure. I'll rate the accuracy & performance (you know, the important stuff) in a few days. If the pop up continues I will uninstall the app in protest.

Love this app! It's simple, has what i need without the extras, very easy to customize your home screen and it doesn't have any videos. The hour by hour is easy to use and very detailed when you click on the hour that you want to view. I would definitely recommend going ad free as it's super cheap (less than $5). The only minor issue I have is the exact location. I'm getting weather warnings from the county just west of me, which I'm very close to, but still well within the county I live in.

This is the best weather app I have used! The weather app that came with my phone was horrible. It used to tell me that the weather tommorow is going to be snowy even though I live in a area where it hasn't snowed in over 25 years!!! When I installed this app, I was always prepared for the next day and week. This is app changed my life (in a good way)!! I definitely recommend it because you can also customise the icons and background. If you end up installing it, you made a good decision.

I've tried other weather apps but this one is simply perfect; great lay-out, clear, customisable and tells you everything you need or want to know. Great when it's raining and you want to check the weather in familiar holiday destinations to see how nice, or not, the weather is there. You can also set numerous locations in your display. If you want a great weather app then without doubt, this is the best one out there.

I've used several weather apps in the past. I have really enjoyed this app because it has exactly the information I want and presents it in a easy, well displayed format. I used my previous weather app for years. The accuracy between that app and this app are almost identical. I think the only down side is the radar map. There is no legend to identify the colors. Also some of the colors are very light colored and difficult to see.

Love all the information supplied and the UI is good. But the live radar needs work. It doesn't show precipitation (or maybe the ui won't let me scroll down?). The radar is not as responsive and just not up to par compared to almost every other app I've used. I bought the $4.99 forever subscription to get the 45 day forecast but that's kind of buried.....not sure I'll keep this

By far, it is the best weather app I've used on any device. You get the occasional pop-up for the premium that you can just x out of, but unlike other apps, you don't get the constant ad spam. The free features are perfect as is for those who don't pay for premium. You get access to hourly updates, widgets, allergen/pollen status even (a genuine life savor for me)! The free version still offers customizable themes and icons, and you can add multiple locations! Thank you devs, youre a God-send.

Nice looking app! I like the animated icons and photography. would be nice if the app shared more air quality info like why it's bad (e.g. forest or factory fire, etc.) So many ads. there are even deceptive ads saying "your app is out of date and will stop working soon" and it's to install a competing weather app. some people would fall for that and that's pretty deceptive. at least get better ads..

I clicked on a line in this app that said "rain starting in 117 minutes." Instead of more weather detail, the app displayed a message that said my Android needed updating and I should click a link for that. Instead of following that instruction, I went to "Settings" and I found out that my Android is already updated. Can't give 5 stars to an app that tries to give me malware. Sorry. üôÑ

So far so good! Options to change themes and icons. Include air quality and allergy conditions, moonrise and set etc. I downloaded this based off of the high ratings and so far I am very impressed. I really miss the original Frog Weather app that's so many of us uninstalled after a terrible update in May 2024. This app is probably one of the best! Update March 2025: I just bought the premium plan and it's switched right away. I'm very happy with the new features and no ads! Wish it were free...

What The Weather Channel app USED TO BE. User friendly; all the relevant info on one scrollable home page, minimal ads, minimal pop-ups telling you to upgrade to the paid version. I especially like that it gives VISIBILITY, which is important when there's a possibility of driving in fog.

Some of the ads on this app try to tell you the app is outdated and needs an update, but if you click they are actually trying to get you to install a totally different app. I don't mind ads but I do mind deceiving ads. The app should police its ads better!! Not sure if I will keep the app for this very reason.

It doesn't show ANY weather. Only retarded commercialss, every single time you click on it. Now I tried to open ot 14 times. Only retarded commercials. Not a single time I've seen the weather. The maker of it has to have his head examined. 2 days later, the same thing. NO weather, only retarded commercials without end and without any X on it to remove it to see the weather forecast, no matter how long you wait and watch that commercial picture.

Mediocre Weather App, paid for Premium and there's nothing different (well, accept for the 'Live Radar' (which is terrible)). Seriously, get Rain Alarm if you want to check the rain in your area. This App does nothing more than any other Weather App.

Great Weather app, it's the first app I've had that actually forecast's the correct weather, some apps like bbc weather are always giving different readings than what the weather is actually doing, so far this one is accurate , Thank You.

It's the most beautiful weather app I've ever used. The layout is perfect, highly informative, and so much on the first section. Almost everything right when I open the app. I don't even care about the ads. Just don't change it.

Apply now button is literally located under the navigation controls ! Why is it even needed if the user already picked the notification theme from the available cards ? also please fix the Widgets to be bigger for Tablets. Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

11/11/25.. Still enjoying this app. Have had no issues. Just downloaded two days ago but so far I am loving this app so much more than the other I have used for years. Will update this as the days, weeks or months go by.
I love the fact that it didn't take over my home page and didn't aske to d/l another app and finally no big annoying ads. A truly free great working app. Thank you!
Best local weather coverage I found. ads are a little annoying, but not as bad as most.
Best weather app I've found. easy to navigate and all the right info in a nicely designed arrangement.
Update: only says "loading". Never opens. Shame. Really like this app. It's pretty accurate. Can customize, too.
updating my review.... since the last update, it seems the ads are just taking over the app now. it's really starting to be annoying. pondering switching.....ü§î
Loved this app until it insisted Google's play store app is always running I choose not to have play store running and, as a consequence, can't use the app.
Just got the app a few days ago. only look at a few times. so far from what I can tell, I like it.! if I have any issues with it, I'll post those also.! have a blessed day everyone.!
easy to use, accurate good graphics, frustrating that it continually asks for ratings with each use
so far the information is very close, better than other apps which were no where near correct.
widget DOESN'T update Clock when flying into different time zones. App clock is correct, just Widget DOESN'T update correctly.
it appears to show good results per day. very pleased so far. tried other apps but this one is very informative.
why is update or add another application too much and is not working so bad service from 2 apps . not good waste my time and space from my cell.
Nice displays of data... A complete weather app and would highly recommend.
not appropriate and accurate. internet shows 18¬∞c in my area and this app showing 25¬∞c even after refreshing!
Easy way to see specifics in the weather for every hour, great app.

Very easy to use. Has many options such as moon phases, visibility, pollutants and wind direction and speed. Can choose from many cities in the world. Has special weather alerts which are up to the minute. Most forecasts are quite accurate. Sept. 2025 update: found out I can customize the app with my own photo as background. Still very happy with this app.
Has the info I want and works easy enough. About as accurate as other forecasting options.

title: Chime ‚Äì Mobile Banking
description:
Unlock financial progress‚Ñ¢ with Chime‚Äîcredit tools, access to early pay, and no monthly fees.

Chime¬Æ is a financial technology company, not a bank. Banking services provided by The Bancorp Bank, N.A. or Stride Bank, N.A., Members FDIC.

BETTER BANKING
A high-powered checking account with fee-free in-network cash deposits¬ß¬ß, spending, overdraft coverage, free in-network ATMs‚Ä°, and more.

EASY SAVINGS
With automatic savings tools and a high-yield savings account1, your small habits can make big strides with Chime.

EARLY PAYDAY
Why wait for payday? When you direct deposit with Chime you get early access to your pay, up to $500^. No interest~, no credit check, and no mandatory fees. 

SMART CREDIT MANAGEMENT
Protect, maintain, and grow your credit with everyday purchases and regular on-time payments‚Ä°‚Ä°.

ANYTIME SECURITY AND SUPPORT
Keep your money and accounts safe with a modern set of features and 24/7 live human support.

SPOTME¬Æ
Get fee-free overdraft coverage up to $200* on Chime debit and credit card transactions and in-network ATM withdrawals.

‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì‚Äì

The Chime Visa¬Æ Debit Card and the secured Chime Visa¬Æ Credit Card are issued by The Bancorp Bank, N.A. or Stride Bank, N.A., pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. and may be used everywhere Visa debit or credit cards are accepted.

MyPay¬Æ line of credit provided by The Bancorp Bank, N.A. or Stride Bank, N.A.

¬πChime Checking Account required to apply.

~Option to get funds instantly for $2 per advance or get funds for free within 24 hours. See Bancorp MyPay Agreement or Stride MyPay Agreement for details at www.chime.com/policies.

*Eligibility requirements and limits apply. Overdraft only applies to debit and credit card transactions and cash withdrawals.  Limits range from $20-$200. 

‚Ä°Out-of-network ATM withdrawal and over the counter advance fees may apply except at MoneyPass ATMs in a 7-Eleven, or any Allpoint or Visa Plus Alliance ATM. 

¬ß¬ßOnce the retailer accepts your cash, the funds will be transferred to your Chime account. Cash deposit fees may apply if using a retailer other than Walgreens and Duane Reade.

^Eligibility requirements apply, including receipt of qualifying direct deposits as set forth in the MyPay Agreement. Not all users will qualify. Credit limits range from $20-$500. 

 ¬ßThe Annual Percentage Yield ("APY") for the Chime Savings Account is variable and may change at any time. The disclosed APY rate is effective as of [10/15/2025]. No minimum balance required. Must have $0.01 in savings to earn interest. The 3.50% Chime+ APY is available only while you maintain eligibility requirements for Chime+, otherwise the 1.00% APY for non-Chime+ members will apply. See Chime+ Terms and Conditions for details.

**Out of network ATM withdrawal and OTC advance fees may apply. View the Bancorp agreement or Stride agreement for details; see back of card for issuer

 2Eligibility requirements and limits apply. See Chime Deals¬Æ Terms and Conditions.

4You must notify your financial institution immediately of any unauthorized use. For specific restrictions, limitations and other details, please consult your issuer.

+Ranking according to the Federal Reserve Statistical Release based on domestic assets; number of ATMs self-reported by Chase, Bank of America and Wells Fargo - June 2025.

‚Ä°‚Ä°Late payment may negatively impact your credit score. Results may vary.

FICO¬Æ Score triggers a disclosure: Credit score calculated based on FICO¬Æ Score 8 model. Your lender or insurer may use a different FICO¬Æ Score than FICO¬Æ Score 8, or another type of credit score altogether. See Experian.com for details.

Address: 101 California Street, Suite 500, San Francisco, CA 94111, United States.
No customer support available at HQ. Customer support details available on the website.
