summary: Banking with no monthly fees, fee-free overdraft, and early payday.

scraped_reviews.content: 2 years later from when I called out this issue and no change .. I believe that most people would agree that when viewing "Transactions" whether in credit builder or checking account, it should show us our total balance at-the-time, below the amount of the transaction. For instance, if I had $23 then spent $5, below the $5, should say $18. it would help so much when tracking our spending. and it would affect nothing negatively to add that basic feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there. We appreciate the review, and we can certainly see how this would be useful. The running balance feature which showed the balance every after transaction has been deprecated as of February 18, 2025.

Nonetheless, we'll share your feedback with our team internally and look into this.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using Chime for years, and it's such a great banking app. No transfer fees, no overdraft fees, fee-free atms all over the place, direct deposit is lightning fast, and the user interface is fairly manageable. The one issue I've had recently, I'm not sure if it was with the last update but, there's a glitch where if I transfer a certain amount of money, chime transfers it twice, although I only did one transfer. Please fix.

the best bank I've ever used. its very convenient and easy to navigate with intuitive features that allows you to move money around, lock cards, and track your spending. the one downside to chime is that is it not completely widely available. there has been times over the years where I've been told a merchant doesnt accept chime or that its not compatible linking with apps and such. that being said the positives outweighs the negative and the experience it brings.

I'm new to using online banking, and am still learning, so while I am finding that this APP isn't really difficult to use, still. . . I think that the layout is cluttered, and not organized in a way that makes it easy to navigate your way around and get to where you want to be (especially on the small screen of a cell phone). I'm hoping they will make the more important features, that a person primarily uses the app for, more prominent than the BIG BLOCKS of ads along the bottom of the screen.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, there! We appreciate the feedback! We'll pass your feedback along to our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend for you to contact us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363 and we will be able to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Worst bank service ever!!! I been using this service a long time and still haven't gotten 500 dollars of MyPay. Don't believe what they say, they don't fix anything with your account and lie to you saying the system hasn't updated yet when you get a installment loan, when it's been two months after the fact and you paid it off early but your credit report still won't reflect any of that. Only thing good is you get paid up to a day early.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Isaac! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us through the app or at 1 (844) 244-6363, and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I've used chime since 2019 and never had issues, but I recently had some transactions that I did not purchase, and they keep denying my dispute (twice). im so fed up and hilighly unsatisfied. And now, after 6 years, im gonna have to switch banks cause that's pretty much theft. I've been a loyal customer for so long but chime has gone down hill so bad. DO NOT RECOMMEND.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Liz! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Being denied in your dispute is incredibly frustrating.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us at 1 (844) 244-6363, and we'll be able to help.

scraped_reviews.content: Blatant scam artists. I made an account with them a few years back. I deposited a small amount of money to test the app/electronic bank out. a hear or two in, I remember trying to log in with no luck, saying my account was closed or something along those lines. A phone number was given to call, and once I tried going back to find it, it was gone. Google it - they are known for closing accounts and even racking on charges. Their most common excuse is "fraud".
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Marky. We appreciate the review and we are sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We will share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, we recommend you to reach out to our Member Services team at 1-844-244-6363, and we will be able to help.

scraped_reviews.content: This service is garbage. I can't add virtual cards to Google Wallet, they are stuck in the loading screen. I can't see my card numbers in the app. This is the only banking app that I have problems with, and I have twenty cards and bank apps. Go figure this out. I opened an account a few days ago and will close it once I take my money out. Customer service is also garbage; they can barely speak English.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating. We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, we recommend you to reach out to our Member Services team again‚Äîwe‚Äôd love the opportunity to turn this around for you.

scraped_reviews.content: Be very careful and watch your money very closely. You add up all your transactions and you'll realize you are short money. This go around I was short like 110 dollars. And they do not report accurate information to credit bureaus. So if you use that "Credit Builder" Card. Good luck. They don't report payments a lot of the time. they don't report accurate numbers. Just be very cautious. This account has been a huge pain. and trying to get help is so aggravating. They use AI for support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, John! Chime typically reports to credit bureaus at the beginning of every month. Credit bureaus can take a few weeks to process reports, so you might not see the changes until later in the month.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us through the app or at 1 (844) 244-6363, and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: This app is by far the best.. Just one issue I found today where part of my debit history is missing. June, July, Aug, and Sept are missing but I can see before and after that. Otherwise, this app has a bunch of analytics to track the different categories of what Ive spent so I have been able to crack down on over spending. Chime support was great too! Went from ai chat to real person chat to a phone call in a very short amount of time. My missing history might be a common glitch in the app..

Chime is not recommended for it makes things only harder for you and it only wants to show you some ads and has a weird way of using credit card and debit card. requiring you to transfer money from one card to the other in order to use it and as the card labeled credit card is not actually a credit card but just another debit card which there is no difference in transfer from your savings to checking account, so Please like this Comment to the top to Be seen and be useful to others. NOT A GOOD!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there! We appreciate the review. Secured Chime Credit Builder Visa Credit Card helps build credit without the hassle of traditional credit cards with no annual fee, no interest, and no minimum deposit or credit score. It works differently from regular credit cards because they require a cash deposit which sets their spending limit.

scraped_reviews.content: in terms of bank statements and such this app is top notch but there's not a lot of info for any of the buttons on the app. i accidentally signed up for a credit builder card just trying to get them to tell me what it does. its a debit card linked to your credit score. it automatically takes ALL of your direct deposits. and now I get constant popups about activating the card I DIDN'T ASK FOR and I can't just shut it off. i have to completely delete my account with the credit company.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Nunya. We appreciate the review and we are sorry to hear about your recent experience.

If we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us at 1 (844) 244-6363 and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I've been with chime for 3 and 1/2 years and I do really love all of the features of a bank account that they provide. this app is just really hard to navigate sometimes though. I habitually lock my card, but it takes a good 5 minutes to load up and then I have to click through like five different screens just to get to my physical card settings. each screen takes a while to load too. I have no need for a virtual card by the way, I don't know why they put that first in card settings.

I'm so thankful for the vigilance of this app to protect my account. It has ALWAYS caught fraudulent charges before they go through. I get an overdraft spending amount and it takes it as soon as money is deposited into the account so I don't have to worry about it but also, it covers charges for me as often as I need it to as long as I'm paid up from the last time!! You can't go wrong with Chime!!!

Do not, under ANY circumstances, use this app. I opened it so I could set aside money for a trip, but my last transfer has been held for almost a week now with no plan to release them. Everytime I call you get an update the information changes. I even tried canceling the transaction so it could go back in my original account, which they refused to do. Once this clears, I will be closing this account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Danielle! We appreciate the review and we are sorry to hear about your recent experience. We will pass your feedback along to our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around. We recommend to get in touch with our Member Services team again.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this banking app! No fees for overdraft, I get paid 2 days earlier and if I need a payday advance, they do that too, without fees! The app is easy to use, the layout is easy to navigate. You can even deposit paper checks to your account, from your phone! They also have a credit card that builds your credit. I have direct deposit and my paychecks can be automatically split between my checking, savings and credit builder accounts. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would.

customer service is unable to do pretty much anything on my account because of "security reasons". two different issues, both times they were unable to assist me. both times it stopped me from accessing my money. this is now the third time its happened. honestly, theyve gone WAY down hill. like most companies, they care so little they wont even assist your problems. Chime replied to this review saying theyll contact me. they have not. wouldnt be surprised if it were an AI response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Nathaniel! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this platform now it's always an issue! I utilize my pay but now because I've had two weeks of checks smaller than usual it isn't allowing me to access it. It would be understandable if the guidelines didn't clearly state that it would be available as long as you've had a qualifying direct deposit within the last 21 days!!!! Which I have! Not to mention customer service reads from a script when it comes to answering my questions.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Shayla! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us through the app or at 1 (844) 244-6363, and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Everything was going great until I tried to receive an ACH transfer. It just wouldn't work. Plus they changed the limits and some rules. I might just stop using this. What a shame. It seemed great, but if venmo can do something that this app can't, then just hang it up. This app unfortunately looks like nothing but a waste of time and effort. If it can't handle something as simple as an ACH transfer without completing breaking, then I don't see a point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Blake, we appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

scraped_reviews.content: I've had a great experience with Chime, up until recently. I received an unrecognized charge from "Playstation" that I disputed. There were no transaction details, and I never received an emailed receipt. Update: Still, it's a mostly great experience with Chime. However, I'm still irritated with customer service. It would be nice to be directed to a locally based call center.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Dereck! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Service team again.

scraped_reviews.content: I used chime for years and never had a problem. until the mypay started. I qualify for it and it would give a credit limit but not let me access any of it. I have talked to over 10 ppl trying to fix it. I was escalated 4 times to higher ups who were supposed to contact me.they never did. 4 times. today I had to have a phone call 3 times because I was disconnected twice. I had been given the run around so many times over this. if there was a more serious issue good luck getting a hold of someone
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
The Available now amount is the maximum amount you can take as an advance on any given day. It usually increases every day up to your credit limit based on our estimate of your earned income.

In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

scraped_reviews.content: It seems there is an issue with refunds. I have been having issues with it myself. $116 is missing from my account, it should have been refunded. The merchants have been contacted and have told me many times that it was sent back. The only issue I am having is with Chime. They erased my $90 transaction for some reason. Chime do better, and give my $ back.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Brittany! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of concern can be frustrating.

If we can help with anything, please contact us through the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

scraped_reviews.content: not too bad for most of the features but don't ever, I repeat, EVER, deposit personal checks as they claim it'll be available in 5 business days. I'm now on day 6 and all they say they can do is document my problem. mind you, I needed the money when they said it would be available because I'm a handyman and it's for a customers job, they don't care!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Alan. We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this.

If we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us through the app or at 1 (844) 244-6363 we will be able to help.

scraped_reviews.content: I couldn't say enough great things about chime, ever. I am so thankful for them , I've been with them three years I guess now I wouldn't use any other banking. they are so handy with a number of useful options. saving checking credit building spot me my pay, advance when needed. ability to move money from one account to the other at your fingertips, plus easily accessed customer service..it's all great!! thanks chime!

chime has been great, the only reason I gave it 4/5 instead of 5/5 is because they could definitely improve their customer service. sometimes it's great, not difficult to use and gets what needs to be done taken care of. other times it's slow, doesn't solve the problem and you have to talk to them multiple times before the issue is resolved. any problem I've ever had did end up getting resolved in a satisfactory way, it's just a hit or miss for how they go about getting to that resolution.

When I first got it everything was nice. Now, delays with my paycheck and just recently it says there is no Internet connection while my wifi is working as normal with everything else including my phone and the rest of my apps. With no connection I can't access the money I do have. Most problems can be overlooked due to how little the impact is but this is way too much. There are better banking apps out there.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ryan, we appreciate the review. We‚Äôre dealing with some unexpected issues with our Chime Android app. We‚Äôre working hard to bring everything back online as soon as possible. Please try our website, chime.com, until the issue is fixed.

If your card is frozen, you can unlock it at https://app.chime.com/settings/account-settings

scraped_reviews.content: A friend sent me some money through this app. When transferring straight to my debit card, it worked fine. However, Chime convinced me to sign up for the app with the promise of $15 free. Once I signed up, I was unable to withdraw ANY money that was sent to me from anyone else! Customer Service told me I have to wait two weeks for a physical debit card to come in the mail before they'll let me have my money. Do NOT download this app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Michael! We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about your recent experience. We‚Äôll share your feedback with our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

scraped_reviews.content: Have had a great experience until now. Logged out accidentally and can't seem to be able to get back into my account. deleted the app and reinstalled it a couple times, reset my password a couple times and checked for any update and can't access anything. All 8 get is a message saying "No internet connection. Check your internet and try again."
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Stephanie! We appreciate the review. We‚Äôre happy to report that our Chime Android app is running normally again. We appreciate your patience while we sorted things out. If you continue to have issues, we'd recommend to close and reopen the app, do not uninstall/reinstall.

For up-to-date information on our services, visit http://chime.com/status

scraped_reviews.content: App is saying I don't have internet connection. I've tried clearing cache, uninstall and reinstall app, changed my password, restarted my phone and nothing is working my other apps are working fine. It's definitely Chime that's the problem. Fix this bug. I will be calling customer service very soon because I won't be without having access to MY OWN MONEY!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hey Bethany, we appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. We‚Äôre dealing with some unexpected issues with our Chime Android app. We‚Äôre working hard to bring everything back online as soon as possible.

If we can help with anything, contact us at 1-844-244-6363.

scraped_reviews.content: I've had chime bank/app for a year & a half it's been great, I definitely recomend to anyone especially if you want to repair your credit, that is the best part, going from a 0 to now close to a score of 700, amazing, just wish they would add your balance after each transaction on your transaction list, so I can look back and see where they keep saying they need to spot me when I know I have money in my account before spending?! üí∞

I have used Chime for years. It's a great way to help balance and stay on top of your finances and credit. Thera just one problem, it is ridiculous that you are not allowed to get a completed direct deposit form in an amount other than a full deposit. There's even two other boxes to select for a dollar or percent amount but you can't choose them. If you plan on splitting your paycheck between chime and another bank, hope Chime gets the bulk of it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Stefawn! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We'll share your review with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a easy to use and simple app with multiple features - virtual cards, daily balance notifications, option to lock cards, FEE FREE overdraft if you use direct deposit, transfer monet, pay al bill and even a map with a choice of ATMs that you can withdraw from for free and side hustle opportunities. BUT I don't like the new layout. the option to lock your card used to be along the bottom but it's now located in settings. I don't like clicking on too many things to use one feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Ash! We hear you and can certainly see how this would be useful. We'll share your feedback with our team internally and look into this.

Thanks for being a Chime member! üíö

scraped_reviews.content: I'm sorry, but the new interface sucks. It's become overly complicated just to lock/unlock your card, etc. I might be in the minority, but it used to be a breeze and it seems like they're creating problems in an attempt to solve problems that didn't exist. New issue: Can't access card info on the app. It just says "temporarily unavailable."
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi there! We appreciate the review, and we're very sorry about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app, or at 1-844-244-6363.

scraped_reviews.content: I love Chime! I've had them for 5 years, they've been amazing. Their App is easy to use. Free deposits at Walgreens. Easy transfer of money to Chime Credit Builder or savings. It's FREE! Can be used just like a regular bank account with an account number. Paychecks deposited days early. Has Bill pay features. I have zero complaints about chime. I rave about them to everyone that will listen. Easy to get new card #. Thank you for your excellent service. Will be using Chime for years to come!! ü§ç

used to love this app, now my phone isnt even compatible with it... how hard is it to create a sleek slim design that multiple people are going to be able to use on multiple phones. It's a banking app, not an mmorpg. What could you possibly have added that would make an app that used to work perfectly not even compatible with my current phone...
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Joseph! We appreciate the feedback. To ensure app security, we do have to eventually phase out older phone models/OS versions from access to the Chime app. However, you can still use http://app.chime.com to access your account features for your Chime account.

If we can help with anything, please get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

scraped_reviews.content: Great another mess up. Now the transfer won't work. Have money in my savings want in my checking and it won't work. And when I want to talk to someone the transfer me over seas to India. üòÆ‚Äçüí® anything to put more money into there wallets. I'm about to give on this app and find another. I do the move money but I keep getting the message Oops, something went wrong please try again later. Worst app ever. It's all on there end but supposedly it's my end. I give up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
To transfer funds:

-On the homepage, tap Move.
-Tap Transfer Money and select your Savings as the From account. Then, choose your Checking as the To account.
-Enter the amount to transfer. Tap Review.
-After reviewing the details, tap Transfer.

We'll share your feedback with our team. If you contact our Member Services again, we'll help further.

scraped_reviews.content: The latest app design is a perfect example of if it ain't broke, don't fix it. two designs ago, I was able to access my debit and credit cards with one or two clicks. now? it's buried behind multiple layers of obfuscation and annoyance. prime example of developers getting paid to make things look slick while decreasing usability. by far, the worst app design yet. this is bad.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Jack. We hear you and can certainly see how this would be useful. We'll share your feedback with our team internally and look into this.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us at 1-844-244-6363.

scraped_reviews.content: The Chime experience has always been a pretty grand one even with the customer service, they've had no problems helping me to resolve any immediate issues. The credit builder is also an amazing feature of the account that has helped me tremendously. I'd recommend it to anyone trying to start an account that will help them build a better position from where they stand currently in their financial arena and are trying to fight their way back successfully! This feature+good financial strategies=üòÅ

The credit builder feature boosts 23 points on my credit score within 3weekly payroll DD. Someone I knew had his credit score from poor to up 700 within 1 year only. Your regular everyday cost , and bills will be place on the credit builder and it will recor d as a secure credit card. I am a relatively new to Chimes, one month user, there's $20 spots me available, hasn't been use yet, and top with $40 boosts pay advance, and hasn't been use it yet either.

I love chime. It allows me to get my check 2 days earlier than the normal average person. It also allows me to overdraft my account by $200, making it a little easy to have that wiggle room in between checks without overdraft fees, it also gives me benefits to doing a loan and also provides me the way to withdraw $500 from my next check.

So much better than a brick and mortar. Easy to use, lack of overdraft fees has saved me more than once, and you earn decent interest on your savings account. You get to withdraw cash for free from any 7-11 ATM, which are everywhere. You can pay anyone online for free regardless of whether they have chime. It's pretty great. The only drawback is no physical checkbooks. They will cut a check and mail it for you, but it's not fast. The one time I had to do that it took about 3 weeks.

If I could still use CashApp I would but unfortunately I'm forced to use this app. It's fine, but overdraft and credit limit could be improved greatly. Not sure why I'm only allowed to take money every two days because Credit Limit only let's you pull out money incrementally and only if you have more then 20 dollars collected on it when it takes back all the money I used when I get paid. It should just let us receive this money all at once.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Nathan! We appreciate the review and we are sorry to hear about your recent experience. We will pass your feedback along to our team and look into this.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us in the app or at 1 (844) 244-6363 and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Customer Service is useless. Made the mistake of trying to deposit a check I didn't know I had already deposited. got locked out of Mobile Deposit option. checked to see if I could fix this. NOPE!! and trying to escalate the matter nobody knows anything. All they could say is cash the check [Take a Loss/Hit]. So? what's the point of being a financial system that cant help your every needs?
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Barry. We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been a chime user for almost 5 years and recently I've been having nothing but issue after issue between them giving me one my pay limit and then 6 hours later the drop it and take $100 away. it used to be a very well maintained banking app but recently it's definitely not worth taking the time to create an account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Tyrell! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about this. The credit limit is based on a variety of factors including direct deposit history, direct deposit amount, risk-based criteria.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us at 1 (844) 244-6363, and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE banking with Chime. This is the FIRST bank to actually help me! Let me count the ways. 1. My credit score has gone from the mid 500 range to the 700 range within 3 years. 2. They block fraudulent charges and notify me, giving me the option to accept the charge or reject it. 3. They allow overcharges without hitting back with NSF charges. This is their "Spot Me" feature. Members have the OPTION to contribute to overdraft fees or not. I have more to list but am out of room!

it's the absolute BEST!! instant funds transfers multipule accounts, a credit builder, a 0% overdraft"spot me" that you can have your friends and family "boost" you thereby upping the amount by which you may overdraft with said spot me feature, and a my pay option to let you dip into your next paycheck before you even deposit it! this card has kept me alive for the last 5 years, no lie!!

Worst bank for customer service. They outsource to the Philippines, and none of the agents can/want to help. They either provide wrong information or no information at all....aftwr over an hour on the phone. 2 of my purchases were categorized incorrectly, resulting in ineligibility for cash back. I asked it to be escalated to the IT department to be fixed and I was told there was no IT department. Are you kidding me? Im glad I only signed up for the $250 bonus. I'll be canceling immediately.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, LeAnn! We appreciate the feedback and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

We'll share your feedback with our team and look into this. In the meantime, if you give us another chance we'd love the opportunity to turn this around if you get in touch with our Member Services team again.

scraped_reviews.content: Oct 31 a charge was made while I was at work from Walmart for $193.45 with my debit having 0 balance while I was working & made no purchases that day at all! I even checked the walmart app on my purchase history & saw that there was no purchase of the day of Oct 31 or any previous charges pending. but a week before I was waiting to get paid & had hellofresh on my credit builder and it was bouncing cause I didn't have enough on the card. if this isn't resolved in a week im closing my account.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Alexander! We appreciate the review, and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

If we can help with anything, get in touch with us in the app or at 1-844-244-6363!

scraped_reviews.content: deals dont work. I activate it while on my way to buy something and it never acknowledges the deal. banking is fine but their deals options are a scam. Worse update, they only have AI assistance and the option to cancel pending transactions is not visible on either app or website. horrible app. keep your money out of this place.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, Skyler. We appreciate the review and we're sorry to hear about this. Having this kind of experience is incredibly frustrating.

In the meantime, if we can help with anything, we recommend you contact us through the app or at 1 (844) 244-6363, and we'll be able to help!

scraped_reviews.content: Not sure why my rent payments are being categorized as groceries when payments are made at Walmart Money Services. My phone bill can't build my credit unless I login to Experian to change it ( too much work!!). Overall, I'm very satisfied with the app thus far.

title: NewsBreak: Local News & Alerts
description:
Get daily news alerts & updates on current events sent straight to your phone, because a small news reader makes a big difference to communities! Keep up to date with news that impacts you & your community! Read trending headlines on live local news updates, international news, weather alerts, & more!

Small news makes a big difference! NewsBreak is your #1 local news app for current events, free live news, local weather alerts for your community. Download today to stay up to date on all things local!

Local news is different from national US news, trending headlines or global news. NewsBreak believes that local news helps bring neighborhoods together around the unique stories they share in common. Only local, small news has the unique ability to meaningfully inform the decisions we make throughout the day.

Are there any weather alerts or winter storm updates for my area? What about traffic updates? What important events are happening nearby? Stay updated with a crime map for the neighborhood & check for local weather alerts. Join NewsBreak‚Äôs growing local news community & see why over 45M people across the United States have helped make us the nation‚Äôs #1 local news app!

Remember - we don‚Äôt just do small news! Local breaking news, sports news, trending national & international news ‚Äì NewsBreak‚Äôs got it all. Get everything from sports updates to national news headlines & live stream news sent straight to your phone while coming together with your neighborhood to share interesting conversations related to local news in your area.

Join the 45M+ locals across the U.S. that trust NewsBreak as their #1 local news app!

NewsBreak Features:

Local News Highlights
‚Ä¢ Get local news, traffic, events near by, local weather alerts, news widget, & more in a curated daily briefing
‚Ä¢ Live stream news on local channels: follow local news, events, newspapers, & activities
‚Ä¢ Get local weather reports & traffic updates at a glance

Breaking News, National & Local
‚Ä¢ Both small news & breaking news, stay up to date with our current news coverage
‚Ä¢ Daily news aggregated right onto your device
‚Ä¢ Browse national news headlines & read comprehensive, in-depth stories
‚Ä¢ Use the discovery engine to discover stories from over 10,000 trusted sources

Personalized News Feed
‚Ä¢ Get the stories that matter to you with a highly personalized feed, relevant to your likes & dislikes
‚Ä¢ Get coverage on the tv news that matters most to you, including sports news, business news, tech news, health news, real estate news, science news, finance news, celebrity news, market news, & more!
‚Ä¢ Keep up with the latest coverage of headline news & events, nationally & locally!
‚Ä¢ Our news aggregator collects & delivers the news that matters to you
‚Ä¢ Get news alerts customized to your tastes to make NewsBreak your personalized news reader

Your Community News
‚Ä¢ Find local eats, small news updates, traffic alerts, deals, local shopping, & more ahead of time
‚Ä¢ Read personal & vivid stories from our local news writers & content creators
‚Ä¢ Treat us as your personal newsstand, magazine collector, news picker, blog reader, restaurant reviewer, & more
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with daily life, events near you, & neighborhood crime with the local safety map

Create Civic Value - Support the Cause
‚Ä¢ Use NewsBreak to revive the local news maker ecosystem & support small US news publishers
‚Ä¢ Increase local story volume & geographic coverage to stimulate local storytelling & community power 

Follow or Block the Trend - It‚Äôs Up to You
‚Ä¢ It‚Äôs totally cool to stay on top of some topics, or totally hate them!
‚Ä¢ NewsBreak allows you to follow what is trending, or completely block some topics you don‚Äôt appreciate
‚Ä¢ You can laugh, share, think, cry, upvote, downvote, comment, reply...
‚Ä¢ NewsBreak is a free ground that welcomes you to express emotions & opinions

Download NewsBreak today to stay informed on local news, national headlines, & world news!

Better informed, better life.

summary: Reconnect with your neighborhood! Daily news alerts for local news headlines!

scraped_reviews.content: I've had this app for years and liked it, except the lock screen notifications. I turned them off and they weren't an issue for a long time. Until last week when they randomly turned on again. I turned them off and forgot about it. But today the app waited until my phone was at 29 percent battery, and randomly turned them on again, and kept my phone open and drained the battery. If they turn on again, I'm uninstalling app forever.

This is spam. for weeks my tablet has had an odd half notification sound, with no notification. with assistance from Samsung we just found out it was this app, or more specifically the scanner within this app ignoring my notification options and somehow making audible noise from my tablet. it's right there in notification history, with notifications fully disabled. That is a risk nobody should take, that is a red flag of red flags for an app.

I hate that I can never get a full news article. Halfway through the article, the screen goes white with only the header. I also don't like the intrusive nature of this app. Even with notifications turned off, the notifications are constant and you can't get the whole article! Totally useless! The ads are excessive. And now, after last update, notifications are blocking my login screen even though notifications are blocked. Time to uninstall!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Pop-Pop Moose. We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôve had problems with our breaking news notifications. You can shut off or customize them from within the NewBreak app (click the Settings icon) or from your phone‚Äôs Settings (look for Full Screen Alerts). You can report or hide ads too - click on the 3 dots next to the ad. We hope you give us another chance.

scraped_reviews.content: I have this app placed in deep-sleep mode, I've also restricted any notifications, not allowed to use background data, and it's placed on restricted battery usage; YET, it somehow finds a way to randomly send me notifications showing some type of local news story and ask if I would like to continue to receive such notifications ü§î Something isn't legitimate about this. I like the app; nevertheless, it's on the verge of becoming obsolete on all of my devices.

You already have way too many adds littered all through the app, some almost completely indiscernable from the actual articles. There is literally NO REASON for you to be interrupting our scrolling with an add we MUST interact with in order to continue. I will close out the app EVERY TIME IT HAPPENS. I will NOT interact with these adds, you WILL NOT make any money from it and **** you for trying. If it keeps up like this I'm just going to delete the app.

I was looking for something that would report middle or give both sides of a story. I find this app has many more extremely left-leaning feeds, authors, sources. it is okay for local news, but it feels too much like a propaganda machine for anything other than that. I went and checked a number of stories and they don't line up with what's being "reported". You don't have to print a lie to tell one. You can do by omission. there's a lot of that going on with articles in this app.

There's always one problem or another with this app. The most frequent problem is that my posted comments seem to not really get posted, as if I'm the only person on the planet who can see them. Being someone who uses & posts on Newsbreak almost every day for the past couple of years, I know that it's not working right when this happens. And out of all the emails I've sent to the app developers about it, guess how many replies I've gotten....yup that's right, zero.

News Break was a great app until today: for reasons I can't explain at all, when I go off the main news feed to look at an individual article, a blank white space "descends" over the article and it disappears. Might want one to get that fixed, guys. Appendum: And I can't take the notifications, with no apparent way to turn them off. Uninstalling.

While this app, does report some news, more than half is generated by A.I. algorithms, & 99% of the articles are laced with intrusive ads, and redirect requests. Some of them have ads that consistently display over the entire page, have no way of closing it out, and the only way to get rid of them, is to close the entire app, which causes you to lose your article, and where you found it, and sometimes is impossible to find again. NOT RECOMMENDED!!! UNINSTALL!! Designed to steal information.

Good for local news and events. The drawback..., they post a lot from non-news sources. (Radio stations, social media, pod cast) Also, the app will not save your preferences. If you choose to delete or otherwise restrict certain segments, like sports, it will continue to show sports. Many of the post do not provide any more details beyond the headline content.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Mad Rick. Thanks for your feedback. We‚Äôre always adding new content, like crime maps, events and top comments. We‚Äôve even built an agent that lets you personalize your news. It will save your preferences in your own ‚ÄúNBot‚Äù channel. You can tell NBot (the blue sparkle) to restrict topics or show more of what you care about. Hope you try it out.

scraped_reviews.content: Only one problem that I have encountered. When reading a post that says "Read More", I click to a black or blank page. There are times when a couple lines are seen at top and/or at bottom, stretched out, unreadable, with the rest of the page blank or black. Not all the time but more often than I'd like because I don't get the whole story. Overall, tho, love the app.

The notifications on this app are ridiculous! I turned them off through the app and through my phone's settings and they still come through with an image that takes up my whole screen, even when my phone is on "do not disturb". I wrote into customer support about it and never heard back. I've now deleted the app after being woken up by another notification early in the morning when not feeling well and very much needing the rest. Get it together! No one needs this kind of hassle.

News Break makes it quick and easy to know what is going on locally without needing to use local station apps, which are notorious for being terrible. My only real hangup is that there isn't a widget (like Flipboard or Microsoft news) that would allow me to scroll through some of the headlines without having to click on the icon to see what's going on. Add in that feature, and I'd be using the app even more often. Regardless, it is still my favorite local news app.

Tooooo many ads interrupting what I'm reading (yes you read it right! In the middle of reading an article an ad will pop-up and when you click out of the ad the entire article is gone. good luck trying to refind it again!) Theres ads WITHIN the article (you have to read around it) And then there's pop-ups that will completely Replace the article you were reading! This is why I only gave it 2 Stars: It's got great info, but you can't get to it!

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (3/5 stars) The app itself works fine and has a clean design, but the content is a big problem. Most of the news comes from biased or unreliable sources like Fox News and others that push fake or exaggerated stories. A lot of the content is offensive, annoying, or just not worth reading. Feels more like drama and gossip than real news. Not the worst app, but definitely not the best either. Needs better news sources and more trustworthy reporting.

This app isn't the best for getting the latest news. Seems like they post articles 2 weeks after the event happens as if no one has read or seen it elsewhere. Also, don't accidentally hit the share button while trying to go back out of the article. It stays frozen on that screen. I tried to back exit, use the arrow at top, and even tried closing out of the app. Nothing works. I need to restart my phone when this happens. Very annoying. Please fix. Samsung galaxy 20 fe.

Decent news app that allows readers chat about the article, which is great. The reason I give 1 star is because it is absolutely riddled with aggressively persistent ads. I can see myself deleting the app sooner rather than later because having to chase an 'x' that's crazy small or hidden, while I'm trying to read, is less than enjoyable & don't forget the lovely ads that just pop up full screen & take over the content. The ads alone makes for a garbage fire of a read.

Do not download unless you love tons of ads popping up so fast you can't even get close to reading ANY article on there. So full of adware it's pathetic! It used to be great, now it's went downhill so bad. I would not recommend it to anyone anymore, and I'm deleting mine. It's just not worth the hassle. You spend more time trying to beat out all the adware just to read a few words that it's REALLY not worth the trouble!

I have had this app for a long time. I have recently noticed a significant decline. 5 stars....down to 2. The story either won't load at all, or mid way though reading the article starts flashing or words drag down the whole screen and your not able to finish. There are TONS of ads and notifications....I learned to deal with...but if I can't even read the news article.....whats the point.?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding this issue, we're constantly fine tuning our ad experience to improve the app for everyone. To expedite our efforts, would you kindly share a screenshot of what you are seeing along with a brief description to business-help@newsbreak.com? Appreciate your help!

scraped_reviews.content: Too many ads.??? It's crazy how many(ads) there are they cover the articles most of the time. The "X" to close is too small, so you end up clicking another ad in the process.I have to keep alerts turned off because the app sends constant spam and trash AI articles. Also, I don't know why they chose to have the articles repeated over and over again. This app used to be good, and I used it regularly to keep track of news around different cities I travel to and home, but it has gotten so bad now.

Great app EXCEPT they need to figure a better way to have advertisements on their app. I can NOT read a single article without an ad blocking what I'm reading. Over and over. When I try exiting out an ad, it took me out completely away from the article. I couldn't find it. Even worst while I was looking for it. Ads were annoyingly popping up. If money is more important than people using the app. Keep your money, but your not wasting my time. No thanks

The preview pops up. Then, when you click the drop-down to preview the notification, it opens the app. What's the point of offering the preview if the touch point is smaller than a pen tip. The drop-down works 1 in 10 times just to sucker you into thinking it won't close what you're using. Also, the story won't load 75% of the time and you have to copy the link into the browser just to read the article. Kind of pointless and should just open the browser version of it to have it work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading NewsBreak. We're sorry for the inconvenience and are actively working on this to bring you the latest reliable news. Please make sure your app is updated to the latest version available.

scraped_reviews.content: Way too many notifications every day. I've had up to 15 notifications at times. I can read the articles fine, and I've gotten use to the ads. I can't stand the ridiculous number of articles/notifications sent to me each day. Many of the articles aren't very well written, and they are all very liberal and biased. When you click on the arrow to read the preview on a notification, it won't let you minimize it again. You're forced to go in and read the article, or swipe it away. Not worth it.

Initially, both my husband and I loved this app, but it's become too cumbersome. It's slow to load articles, and most times, the articles won't load or will only partially load. We have excellent internet coverage and speed, and I have performed (multiple times) the normal troubleshooting protocols, such as deleting cache, closing/reopening the app, starting/restarting the phone, etc. - same problem. Frustrating!

scraped_reviews.userName: A Day in the Life in Hawaii
scraped_reviews.content: I LOVE this app! I was previously using "SmartNews", but it was constantly crashing. It was so frustrating, I would have to restart my phone everytime. You can't customize it or oher news apps. With this app, I can choose/filter between " for me", "local", "breaking news", " science", "tech", etc. I can change the privacy settings, change locations, change languages, change text size, etc. I cannot do any of that on my other apps. Also, I love the short videos (it's like TikTok)!

Has some interesting articles but is put together off the wall. Some articles take forever to read by the time you skip from one place to another, keep having to press "next" after each paragraph and hope it doesn't "glitch" and send you back to the beginning of the article to start all over and that's if you are lucky enough to find that article again. Usually when it "glitches " I shut it off and go on to something else entirely.

It is nice to read local news, but headlines are repeatedly filled with click bait statements that aren't even true. The ads are also intrusive in that my phone cannot easily close the app once an ad begins unless I force close the app. I don't want to be stuck on an ad when I just read a few sentences of an article and am trying to back out of the app.

I use this app all the time, at least daily. I like the abundance of local, national, and international news, I like that people can comment. What I loathe about it is that I constantly have to resign in, even multiple times a day, and every time, it signs me up for notifications and emails again. I get enough NewsBreak through the app, I don't want emails and notifications! This is so bothersome, I'm going to have to delete. Please fix automatic subscriptions & constant sign outs.

Not recommended at all! Most of the time I try to read an article or search for one that I really wanna read, it takes me somewhere else or constantly freezes. It's also causing problems on my phone. I was hoping that it was fixed, but it wasn't so I'm Uninstalling and won't be downloading again. I suggest finding another way to keep up on the news and staying away from this app if you wanna keep your phone working.

Used to love this app, but for the last several months, when I read an article, then go back out, it keeps returning to the top of the list. Annoying to have to scroll back down 20+ stories to get back where I left off. Also when I do local, it jumps back to the main list when I leave a story. For the most part, I can deal with ads. I get the necessity. But when I have to think twice about reading a story bc of the hassle when I leave it, seems to defeat the purpose, esp if you are after clicks.

This app came with my phone, I liked the setup so I started using it. But now I can't even read an article because there are so many ads. I get 15 notifications a day for articles, and only get to read the first 2 or 3 lines and then I can't see any way to finish the article. Occasionally there is a "read full story" button, but usually not.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding this issue, we're constantly fine tuning our ad experience to improve the app for everyone. To expedite our efforts, would you kindly share a screenshot of what you are seeing along with a brief description to business-help@newsbreak.com? Appreciate your help!

scraped_reviews.content: This use to be an exceptional app, but now not so much. There are way to many commercials popups - even while playing solitaire which is irritating and you loose time- Then when your trying to read an article it just disappears. I realize it's free, but let's bring it back to like a year ago. If I don't see some improvement I guess I'll just search for another news source. For me, while I'm playing my favorite game, solitaire, it's really upsetting the Newsbreak keeps flashing on screen

UPDATED: Many of the articles do not load. I thought that perhaps my wifi was the issue. But I have now had the exact same experience with about 6 different wifi locations (home, work, friends' homes, etc. ). Fix the glitches, and you get five stars. Now you've gone and made it worse. When I open the app there are sound effects as of there is an ad playing. But I can't find it, nor can I shut off the sound effects.

I've been using this app for a while. I like the assortment of articles from local to national to international. However there are so many ads it's sometimes hard to find the actual article. I also don't like that half the time most of the pictures are truncated and require finding an original article to see everything. It's lovely viewing a damaged ship when you can only see the mast because it doesn't show the whole picture. Also I get a ton of notifications - I've tried adjusting but no avail

I've had this app for quite some time. 3 different phones and several years. It used to be that when you click on an article you could read it.Lately it's been saying "slow connection, still loading". Today I tried to read 10 articles and couldn't read any. Earlier (alot this week) I can read some articles but then an ad or subscribe box will pop up, the article gets dimmed, and I have to scroll alot to close it. Fyi, My internet is not slow, everything else I try to do is fast&responsive.

Articles fail to load. I clear cache. Sometimes it helps for a few minutes, sometimes not at all. I clear data, sometimes it helps, most of the time not. I delete the app then update to the newest version and lo and behold... It doesn't help! Articles still fail to load. This app would really be nice of it even worked every once in a while!

I have used your app for some years now , and have enjoyed it , to the number of ads and the way they are interjected at every point of the story anymore , I can no longer take it . I really love the local stories but ,ad cont,ad,cont,ad,the whole page,wait ,cont,ad ad, an then another ad ! I understand ads for a free site ! No problem with that ! but now it takes so long to even get though half of a story . The ads take up somuch space of th article ,so with regret time to find another source .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback regarding this issue, we're constantly fine tuning our ad experience to improve the app for everyone. To expedite our efforts, would you kindly share a screenshot of what you are seeing along with a brief description to business-help@newsbreak.com? Appreciate your help!

scraped_reviews.content: I used to rely on Newsbreak, and used it often, now, aside from moving at a snails pace, it crashes every five minutes or so, and unless I saved the article I was reading or commenting on at the time, I won't find it again without directly searching it out. Don't know what happened, but until they fix the problem, I think I need to find an alternative.

I guess the news is good. If that news is helpful to you, I did not find it useful. I have no interest in any mail it filled my inbox up with. I spent hours sorting out my important mail, and I tried to reset and download another app to help fish through and uninstall the apps. NewsBreak kept installing, and their emails were in the hundreds every week. What a nightmare

At first, I was turned off by the ads and the celebrity focused news feed but when I clicked on the "videos" tab I found nothing but hilarious and or touching videos that I had never seen before. Even though I probably won't use this app for the news like I expected, I'll keep it for the videos. Update: it's been a while and I'm getting tired of all of the click bait style articles. I wish I could have more control over my topics and sources. I'm going to look for a different app.

WAS great, then the ads started! Initially, there were no annoying ads that unmute themselves and take over your screen. However, now I cannot read an article without them. Also, the ridiculous "slow connection" messages are blaming your data connection for their server issues. This is the perfect example how great apps never last. Self demise.

Just about ready to uninstall this app. The local news is far from being local and when you do get an article of interest, half the time the articles don't load or open and then they're gone. Plus there is the issue of blocking articles you don't want only for them to reappear again anyhow, from the same source. It doesn't matter what you do to try and get rid of garbage articles. And last but not least, too much click bait.!!!!

While I have been provided useful articles in the past that were helpful, I agree with others that there are too many ads. And, most recently, every article I pull up starts an audible ad in the background that is unrelated to anything in the article I'm viewing - the end result is that I cannot turn the audio off or stop it from playing. I'm uninterested in having to hear the same ad slogan on every article so I'm done with this app. Uninstalling.

Kind of like the quantity of local news but the notifications are overwhelming. I wish it would just send one notification and then let me scroll through all the updates after I click on it. Also,the read/unread function doesn't work well. If I read an article from a notification it does not update the list within the app. Very annoying and wastes my time clicking on articles I have already read.

This app has SO MANY ADS! This app also gives you notifications that will leave your phone on until you dismiss them. I was out and had a full battery. I checked my phone and it was down to 15 percent because of a notification that left my phone on. If I had an emergency or something, I wouldn't have been able to call anyone because of the stupid feature. This app does not care about your safety.

I like this app over the others because of the ability see and make comments. It gives me an idea of the world is reacting. Have emailed customer service about the loud commercials that suddenly pop up 10x on one page and can't be muted, waking my baby up middle of the night, but they obviously don't care. When I lived where there was limited cell service the many advertisements bogged it down so things wouldn't barely work. I get they need to sell advertising but it's overdone and obnoxious.

was amazing but now ads are taking over almost every article. Recently now aside from the 2 playing ads you have to wait to hit the skip button on some articles, now theres large ads the break up the story in almost every article that take up the whole page. enough with the damn ads already. Pretty annoying to be able to read 2 sentences at a time due to large ads. No one asked for that. It was never needed and now because of it youre tanking your own app fast.

I rate it one star for few reasons, one annoying 1 is that I literally have it on block all notifications. the app still manages a way to pop-up notifications on my phone locked screen. My phone is set not have any notifications on my locked screen. I have app set to no notifications. Everything is blocked. I will attach a picture of it saying blocked If can But still, the app finds a way to send notifications. that can't be closed Even if press X, it still pops up a article lots ads also

More ads than news. I turned notifications off but the app still sends them. They turn on AND leave ur screen ON (even if the phone was OFF) until u dismiss them, which kills your battery. Plus, once I fell asleep while reading an article and since there was an ad on the screen (that popped up after I fallen asleep) my phone's 5 min timer of inactivity did not activate as it thought I was watching 2 hours of ads. So my phone stayed on for 2 hours while I dozed off, draining my battery. How dumb.

I absolutely love this app for news local and globally. I use to be able to access the news feed a lot easier on my previous phone by just swiping to the far left home screen but after getting a new 2025 phone I no longer have the feature available but I still have notifications set to easily get onto the app. this app also has a local crime map to show recent 911 reports in your neighborhood. I absolutely lovvveeee this app!

summary: Always Better Prices

scraped_reviews.content: Many top shops with item list as [Ready Stock] don't actually have any stock. There is no quality control on the platform. Time and money wasted to browse, check out. Weeks later, no item was delivered. Payment took another week to refund. Called their unhelpful support to have them shift the blame on the "system", saying that it's build that way. This is the quality of online shopping, all software managed with no person able to assist the customer. Buying from a real shop would be less painful
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback, Gabi. It's disheartening to hear about your experience with stock availability and delays in delivery and refunds. Please reach out to our Support team via the Lazada Application for assistance. Your voice matters, and we‚Äôre committed to enhancing the shopping experience for all our users.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is becoming convoluted and a little sketchy. A task-based promo pops up where you can earn LazRewards for browsing or clicking on items for several seconds. The prize gets high, and then it disappears before you get the chance to claim it. Then you can no longer find it anywhere. It's weird and frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Marielle Ong, it's concerning to hear that the task-based promo experience feels confusing and elusive. We truly appreciate your feedback, as it helps us understand user experiences better. If you have more details to share, please reach out through the in-app support. Thank you for your insights!

scraped_reviews.content: Lazada is a reliable online shopping platform with a wide variety of products, from electronics to fashion. Prices are competitive, and there are frequent sales and vouchers. The app is easy to use, and order tracking is clear. Delivery times can vary depending on the seller, but customer service is usually responsive. It‚Äôs a convenient app for daily shopping needs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the wonderful rating! We appreciate your positive feedback on the app's reliability, variety, and ease of use. It's great to hear that you find the competitive prices and customer service beneficial for your shopping needs! Your support means a lot to us!

scraped_reviews.content: I use to order from this store, I stop doing it because it takes a while for them to deliver my orders. Don't install the App, advertising pop-ups will be installed together with the App, it's Annoying.  It is best to order your items from Amazon especially for imported items, it is cheaper and that every item will be delivered on time or earlier even if it came from the other side of the world. Please note that theri tracking system is real, not like Lazada which I think is not true, considering that even if the item had already been picked up by the local carrier as indicated, it would still take another 2 weeks for them to deliver, You'll be wondering as to who is informing you correctly. For your added information, you could pay Amazon using the Western Union outlets, that is if you don't have any credit card.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear customer, we are sorry to hear that our services have fallen short of your expectations. Your feedback has been duly noted for future improvements of our services. Please contact our customer service officer if you have any query, our customer service numbers are ¬†PH: (02) 795 8900, SG: +65 3158 7424, and MY: 03 8601 188

scraped_reviews.content: The app works fine. A bit messy UI. There were some system down lately but it's ok. The product pushing algorithm though is extremely annoying. They try to promote to you products you've already bought and products that you don't want (I have reasons - they're fake/ low quality/ no color or size I need etc.) it seems like the algorithm can't learn or just doesn't care.

Try Lazada if you want to experience the most useless and incompetent customer service and app ever. They sell fake illegal products, if you contact them customer service will waste an hour of your time and promise you will receive an email with help. No one will ever email you, they are liars and scammers, they just waste your time until you give up. I have contacted customer service so many times, wasted more hours than you can imagine and they never help, they just lie and take your money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Terima kasih atas masukan Kakak. Kami sangat menghargai pengalaman Kakak dan akan terus berupaya untuk memperbaiki layanan kami. Jika ada isu yang ingin didiskusikan, silakan hubungi tim "Support" melalui chat di Aplikasi Lazada. Kami berharap dapat melayani Kakak lebih baik di masa depan!

scraped_reviews.content: Easily the worst shopping experience in the Philippines. I have placed three orders three weeks ago. One was cancelled by the store a week later. One was delivered after over two weeks, but not to me. The third is entering the fourth week since ordering. There are much better options out there The app itself is nightmare to navigate. Pops ups, advice on what they want you to buy, a farcical rewards program where you can select products you like which are then not delivered. Will delete.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Roberto C, thank you for sharing your experience. It‚Äôs clear that your recent orders didn‚Äôt meet your expectations. Your feedback on the app‚Äôs navigation and rewards program is invaluable, and we‚Äôve escalated these concerns. We appreciate your insights and hope for better experiences ahead!

scraped_reviews.content: What kind of search you have? I was looking for neurointerface for mobile app, and tried, like, 20 different requests. The Lazada search engine returned me cosmetics, medicine - anything but what I was looking for. If you don't have the product, just tell that! No need attempting to sell me at least something - it results in exactly opposite effect!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Yurii, it seems you faced some challenges with the search function. Your feedback is truly valuable, and we‚Äôll definitely consider it as we work on improving the app. If you have any specific issues, please reach out to our Support Team in the app. Thank you for sharing, and we hope your future searches are much more satisfying!

scraped_reviews.content: LARGE amounts of fraudulent listings. 3 to 5 business days for withdrawal for a large sum of money. Error Oc03 bugged can't buy anything in the app, wasted sales and voucher. Waited for months but never fixed. Expired RM500+ coins. Customer support is absolutely useless. Keeps spamming ai. Highly unprofessional, a huge waste of time AND MONEY. Use shopee instead.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kakak, terima kasih atas masukan yang diberikan. Kami menghargai Anda berbagi pengalaman mengenai proses penarikan dan fungsi aplikasi. Silakan hubungi tim "Support" melalui chat di aplikasi Lazada untuk bantuan lebih lanjut. Kami berkomitmen untuk meningkatkan pengalaman Anda ke depannya.

scraped_reviews.content: Pop-up ads are still everywhere in the app whether I open it, search for products, or check my account to order. They've gotten more intrusive recently. Even my cart has ads now, with a countdown! So now, you guys expect me to wait before I check it? I see you're still making the user experience worse. And you haven't listened to us about how useless your vouchers are because they're not applicable on selected items. This is why I'm starting to refrain from using online shopping apps like this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: SushiRollGuy, we appreciate your feedback regarding the pop-up ads and voucher limitations. We recognize that these elements are affecting your experience, and your insights are invaluable to us. Please consider sharing more details through the in-app support, as it helps us improve. Thank you for your time!

scraped_reviews.content: The first few times I ordered from this platform, the experience is great. Parcels usually arrive 2 days later. However recently, the service is so slow. It's been a week now and my parcel has not yet arrived. I understand that there are certain factors such as the holiday and the typhoon, but my package has been in the sorting center for like 3 days. The update comes after 2-3 days. I needed that item for an event today, but now I can't use it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Trishia Fae Durango, it's disheartening to know your recent experience didn't meet your expectations. We truly value your feedback and understand how crucial timely delivery is for your events. Please reach out to our Support Team in the app for assistance. Thank you for sharing your thoughts with us!

scraped_reviews.content: I‚Äôm writing to share my frustration regarding the current login verification process. I recently received a system message asking me to verify my account using a trusted device, but I was unable to access the in-app message because I couldn‚Äôt log in and I have change my phone. This created a loop where I needed to log in to verify, but couldn‚Äôt verify without logging in.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Kdasher Chan, it seems you're experiencing a challenging situation with the login verification after changing your phone. We truly appreciate you highlighting this issue, and we‚Äôre working on improving it. If you have more details, please reach out to our support team in the app. Thank you for your valuable feedback!

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried this again after so many years and now they have a scam third party delivery service called Flash Express PH. It says that my parcel was delivered unsuccessfully due to me being hard to be contacted but I've never received any calls or text, the delivery photo is in the wrong place, and I've waited the whole in the front of my place and haven't seen anyone delivering to me. And they don't even let me call their service contact, always out of reach. Never again these 2 companies.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Teddemon, we truly appreciate you sharing your experience with the delivery service. title: The Travel Club
description:
How exciting to be looking forward to a holiday! This app provides even more possibilities for fun, experiences, inspiration and ease during your trip. You will be given access via your smartphone or tablet to all your travel information and valuable (local) information that will make your holiday even better. Simply login with your booking number and your email address and your holiday can begin.
‚Ä¢	All your travel information in one central location
‚Ä¢	An overview timeline of your holiday
‚Ä¢	All travel documents such as vouchers and tickets digitally available on your smartphone
‚Ä¢	Countdown to departure
‚Ä¢	View simple detailed information on each part of your trip, including built-in navigation
‚Ä¢	Check the weather at your holiday destination
‚Ä¢	Get inspired with interesting activities and other extras
‚Ä¢	Look at different trips, attractions and dining possibilities
‚Ä¢	Find excursions directly in the app
‚Ä¢	Get easy access to your travel agent during your holiday

DISCLAIMER
No rights may be derived from the information provided in this application. However, we strive to provide the most up to date and accurate information at all times.
