title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
Join millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you‚Äôre running errands across town or exploring new cities, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable.

Pick from a wide range of rides that the Uber app has to offer including:
- UberX: Affordable rides, All to yourself
- Electric: Eco-Friendly
- UberX Priority: Priority pickup
- UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6
- Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom
- Comfort Electric: Premium zero-emission cars
- Uber Pet: Rides for you and your pet
- Black: Luxury rides with professional drivers
- Taxi: You now have the option to request a cab or a taxi in select cities
- 2-wheels: Find a scooter to start riding today
- Premier: Luxury rides with highly-rated drivers

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival.

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable.

PRICING
We‚Äôre doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
- UberX Share: UberX Share connects you to other riders headed in the same direction.
- Group Rides: Share the journey with friends.
- Split Fare: Split the cost evenly while you‚Äôre still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off eligible delivery and pickup orders and 6% Uber Cash back on eligible rides. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. Choose from our growing eco-friendly fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles to help reduce your carbon footprint.

CARSHARE
Drive yourself with Uber Carshare. Borrow a car by the hour, day, week or longer‚Äìonly pay for the time you‚Äôve booked. Currently available in select cities.

RENT CARS AND HAVE THEM DELIVERED TO YOU
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. You can have a rental car delivered to your door at the time and location of your choice with Valet, currently available in select cities.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favorite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience and pet supplies and get them all delivered.
Uber Connect: an easy, same-day, no-contact delivery solution that allows people to send items whether it‚Äôs a care package or an item you sold online.
Transit: Say goodbye to complicated time schedules, hectic transfers, and unexpected waits while reducing your trip‚Äôs emissions.
Uber Charter: Book high-capacity group rides in vehicles seating 14-55 passengers, such as limo buses and coach buses.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.
Uber Hourly: Keep a car and driver with you for hours.
Uber Car Seat: Uber Car Seat provides one forward-facing car seat for a child who is at least 2 years old, 22 pounds, and 31 inches tall.
VoIP calling is a core feature that helps riders and drivers connect during trips, ensuring important calls are seen and not missed.
Uber is available in the following cities: Boston, DC, LA, New York, San Francisco, Vegas, Orlando, Chicago, and more. Check if Uber is available near you at https://www.uber.com/cities.
Follow us on X at https://x.com/uber
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber
Uber content/messages may be human or machine translated per device settings‚Äîaccuracy not guaranteed.
descriptionHTML:
Join millions of riders who trust Uber for their everyday travel needs. Whether you‚Äôre running errands across town or exploring new cities, getting there should be easy.

FIND THE RIDE YOU WANT
Find the perfect ride right at your fingertips! Uber is here to make your journey stress-free and enjoyable.

Pick from a wide range of rides that the Uber app has to offer including:
- UberX: Affordable rides, All to yourself
- Electric: Eco-Friendly
- UberX Priority: Priority pickup
- UberXL: Rides for groups up to 6
- Comfort: Newer cars with extra legroom
- Comfort Electric: Premium zero-emission cars
- Uber Pet: Rides for you and your pet
- Black: Luxury rides with professional drivers
- Taxi: You now have the option to request a cab or a taxi in select cities
- 2-wheels: Find a scooter to start riding today
- Premier: Luxury rides with highly-rated drivers

UPFRONT PRICING
With Uber, you no longer need to worry about hidden costs or unexpected surprises. As you enter your destination in the app, you get upfront pricing and the estimated time of arrival.

SAFETY TOGETHER
Safety is a top priority at Uber. We have established comprehensive safety features to help ensure every rider and driver feels secure and comfortable.

PRICING
We‚Äôre doing all we can to make our pricing as transparent as possible.
- UberX Share: UberX Share connects you to other riders headed in the same direction.
- Group Rides: Share the journey with friends.
- Split Fare: Split the cost evenly while you‚Äôre still on the ride.

JOIN UBER ONE FOR EXCLUSIVE PERKS
Benefit from $0 Delivery Fee and up to 10% off eligible delivery and pickup orders and 6% Uber Cash back on eligible rides. Other fees & terms apply. For more details see uber.com/uberone.

RESERVE RIDES IN ADVANCE
Need a ride at a specific time? No problem! Uber allows you to reserve rides in advance, so you can plan your day with confidence.

GO GREEN
Uber is committed to building a sustainable future for our cities. Choose from our growing eco-friendly fleet of electric and hybrid vehicles to help reduce your carbon footprint.

CARSHARE
Drive yourself with Uber Carshare. Borrow a car by the hour, day, week or longer‚Äìonly pay for the time you‚Äôve booked. Currently available in select cities.

RENT CARS AND HAVE THEM DELIVERED TO YOU
Whether you need a car today or later, the online booking experience will help you find the right vehicle for a family vacation, a weekend getaway, airport travel, and more. You can have a rental car delivered to your door at the time and location of your choice with Valet, currently available in select cities.

MORE FEATURES
Delivery: Order food from your favorite restaurants through Uber Eats. Stock up on groceries, shop pharmacy, convenience and pet supplies and get them all delivered.
Uber Connect: an easy, same-day, no-contact delivery solution that allows people to send items whether it‚Äôs a care package or an item you sold online.
Transit: Say goodbye to complicated time schedules, hectic transfers, and unexpected waits while reducing your trip‚Äôs emissions.
Uber Charter: Book high-capacity group rides in vehicles seating 14-55 passengers, such as limo buses and coach buses.
Uber for Business: Manage and track business travel, meal programs, and more on one dashboard.
Uber Hourly: Keep a car and driver with you for hours.
Uber Car Seat: Uber Car Seat provides one forward-facing car seat for a child who is at least 2 years old, 22 pounds, and 31 inches tall.
VoIP calling is a core feature that helps riders and drivers connect during trips, ensuring important calls are seen and not missed.
Uber is available in the following cities: Boston, DC, LA, New York, San Francisco, Vegas, Orlando, Chicago, and more. Check if Uber is available near you at https://www.uber.com/cities.
Follow us on X at https://x.com/uber
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber
Uber content/messages may be human or machine translated per device settings‚Äîaccuracy not guaranteed.
summary: Rideshare, taxi cabs, and more for your airport travels and everyday trips.

scraped_reviews.content: Just got a free month of Uber One, I've been ordering more than usual. The app is near unusable. It often fails to save my selections when I customize items, so more than once I've ended up paying for an item I just throw away. And Uber makes complaints really difficult. The most they offer is a $5 credit which never covers the cost of the item. I'm waiting now for them to credit back the rest of an order, which they may just never do and then I'm out $15. Unacceptable.

I couldn't find a way to say something without calling customer support. The last few times I've reserved a ride for the evening and then the ride would do something stupid like driving all the way here to just cancel or not move. I've been waiting for a hour and 10 minutes after my reserved time. This is seems to be very common, but if I just order one then and there, I can get one in 15 min with awesome drivers. I reserved rides so I can not stress about rides. and I'm stressed. Taxi > Uber

The uber drivers are not at fault for this review. I believe that the user interface for the app is terrible. There should be options to switch to a more convenient or faster path instead of changing the trip every other ride(when going to the same location). Also, the cost of the trip always increases afterwards so you can't trust the pre-determined cost. Overall, could be a lot better as an app.

Uber has gotten so much worse than they used to be. No matter what tier you select (unless you want to shell out $100+ for Uber black) the quoted time to get to your location will end up being twice as long & of course the price to get there doesn't get lowered to reflect that. Drivers will show as 4 minutes away, but then each driver you're connected to will be 15+. Plus they mark at the pick up point, even when they're half a block away, starting the "wait fee" timer that you can't dispute.

Worst customer service ever. I was only checking prices to see what it would cost on my PC, and I all of a sudden had an account which I instantly got locked out of. Trying to restore the account I clicked on the link shown on the website and got 404 not found. I tried downloading the app and got the same thing. No way I can find to communicate with them.

I had good experiences with this app until recently. The drive share feature allows you to save a few bucks, which I thought was nice. However, the ETA for the driver is way off. I had requested one, ant the ride showed up roughly 10 minutes earlier than I anticipated. I was still getting ready , when it said my ride had been canceled. I got chared and had to request another ride, so it defeated me saving the money.

WHY DO YOU INSIST ON SENDING THE DRIVER TO THE WRONG PICK UP SPOT! They seriously need to get their gps updated. I always have to message the driver where to pick me up. Because a lot of the times the pickup spot is the wrong place. sometimes the app says the driver is here when the driver is still a mile away. It says, if you want to change pickups by going to the app. But it's impossible to change the location because there's no way to tell the location on this device.

No notifications upon arrival. Lately, I've been calling for rides and when the driver arrives, I get no notification from the app. just now, a driver took off on me because I didn't see her parked there, among other cars. i ran outside after i looked at the app and waved my arms and yelled, but she took off. This has happened more than once. I used to get pop-up notifications, i think, and audible notifications. What happened? My phone was on ring.

Deceptive App - The app provides a price for your trip but then when you get CC bill there's an added "Help Fee". I tried finding an explanation but there is none. I also dislike the surge pricing. They can dynamically raise the price and you're required to pay. This should be illegal. The total price should be available before you use the service! Thankfully the drivers are nice. I'll go back to the competition which is more transparent about pricing.

over all ok, but arrival times are sometimes misleading. trying to contact customer support is like pulling teeth, lord forbid if they or the drivers make a mistake, you'll never see your money back. once had a driver claim they picked me up and delivered me. I was charged for the trip, tried customer service, only to be led around from one automated system to another.

Their service for food delivery is terrible; it's never on time, even if you schedule it in advance. Don't pay for Uber One expecting better deals. They still tried charging me $11.99 in delivery fees plus additional "service" fees. Never mind the fact that they constantly send you emails with coupons for $25 off, yet you aren't elegible unless its your first purchase ever. It's a waste of time and money.

Prices were extremely high and kept increasing after my rides kept getting canceled left and right. I'm Never using this app again. I understand when I wanted a ride it was busy, but on the flip side, the price shouldn't double after I've already made a reservation more than once and then said reservation gets canceled without rhyme or reason. Also, I don't like how you have to verify your identity for no reason. this app is a security risk, and unreliable.

Whenever you use a discount, and then you tip the driver, your discounted price is replaced by the full price plus the tip. Even though I used a discount, I still had to pay full price. Oh well, at least I could complain, oh wait. There's no service for that. I would say 0/5 stars for a ripoff company, but you have to do at least 1 star to be able to post.

They rip you off! They have the worst customer service of any large organizations that I have dealt with. I made an Eats order for pickup. After submitting, within a minute, I went back in to cancel the order because I realized I chose the wrong location. But it was too late! Literally one minute in. Cs would tell me it's too late and then just disconnect the chat session. Did it to me twice. I am done. Will not give them any more money. This isn't the first time they have refused to refund me

Why the hell is app placing orders at restaurants way across town when theres one right around the corner? Takes longer than it should for consumers and has drivers going extra distance for nothing. At a minimum, the app should specify which location the order is being placed. Furthermore, false advertising for pick up times when shopping for a ride. App says pick up in 5-7 minutes often only to order and wait 15. Then cancelation fee. Bait and switch! Somebody should sue. Freakin ridiculous!

Inaccurate, deceptive, greedy company, low quality drivers and environment. App jacks the price if you refresh, for no reason,v that comes right out of the tip. You pick one that says 3 minutes and then it accepts at 7 or 9 minutes away but you paid more for the shorter time, what gives. Drivers make wrong turns and get stuck in traffic. just not a great experience.

Placed an order with Uber eats but accidentally forgot to add a salad to the order. After trying unsuccessfully to modify the order through the app and even calling the restaurant, the restaurant told me to cancel the order and re-order through the app. Canceling the order actually charged the full price of the order which I didn't realize at the time. Customer service was not helpful in trying to undo this. Lost the full cost of the meal. Will not use this app again.

My biggest issue is simply that often the price displayed for the ride cost is wildly different from the actual price I get charged, this always happens coincidentally when I have more money in my account due to financial aid returns. A price will list as $33 before tip something then turn out to actually end up $43 ($51 after tip), it's starting to get genuinely infuriating when I'm trying to ration my money and just get to classes and back home. Just be honest about the price.

Anyone who has a 3 star or above does not regularly use Uber. They intentionally increase prices for individual customers if they think you will keep going to the same location. Their fees are ridiculous and only seem reasonable if you use them to get to very different locations and use the app very rarely. 0 stars Edit: They added a condition where the driver leaves in 2 minutes. I had a driver go to the wrong spot and then take off after the 2 minutes, then the app charged me for it.

I really don't appreciate the apps inaccurate time frame. Example, rides are ALLEDGEDLY 3 minutes away. Confirm the ride. Wait time is 15 minutes. This happens pretty normal when it shouldn't. As well as the maps for the driver is s*(t. Not the drivers at all. The Navigation map they use is a HUGE ISSUE. I've attempted to file a complaint but I guess technology doesn't want me to stand up for things not working properly.

I personally stopped using the app because they doubled their prices without announcing they would! Just wack in general. There isn't any real comprehensive breakdown of what you're paying exactly to justify the amount you are expected to pay. In short, they wanted me to pay $50 for a ride that used to cost me $25. Not because there is a lack of drivers in the area or a high volume of riders. Mind you, most of my rides are early in the morning to work. This is just sad. Will be deleting !!!

One would think a company the size of UBER would find and use top shelf programmers for something as important as their mobile app. Or at least do extensive testing on it before releasing it to the public. The program is an example of something one would expect from novice programmers. Just trying to set pickup and destination points then confirm with a payment takes many, many tries. It's a time wasting embarrassment, leaving you wondering how could they be so STUPID.

Buckle up, this is a long one... I've used Uber for a while and probably still will. on my last trip, we made a reservation about a month in advance. The driver arrived, promptly sped past the pickup location, and canceled our trip. We submitted for a new trip. this one $20 more expensive. Same driver picked up the trip. Since Uber doesn't have a phone number, we tried fixing this through the app, which told us the trip price never changed. We have emails to the contrary.

Well below average user experience. This app is simply not up to par for being the biggest player in their space. They intentionally make it impossible to let you contact someone by phone or by message. not to mention the driver arrival times are so inconsistent and unreliable. I'm also flabbergasted by how long it takes to match you to a driver when you're somewhere with a lot of drivers like the airport I'm moving to Lyft.

Promo code that THEY sent me an email for did not work. It waits til the last moment of placing an order to tell me there's an error with the promotion. Maybe if they valued customer time they could've told me the offer didn't apply to me in the first place and not filled my email with garbage. the account I used follows the terms of the promotion. Disappointed there is no customer service on this issue. I don't recommend the app for ease of use or if you value your time.

Ubers pricing is ridiculous, especially since I know that they aren't paying the drivers enough, I used to pay 7-10 dollars for a 7 minute trip to work, but now it's more than double for the same trip, there is absolutely no reason they should be charging 17-20$ for a 7 minute trip, it's absolutely outrageous and predatory, my advice, find a cheaper alternative.

i booked a ride, then immediately realized i needed an XL. I messaged the driver who told me to cancel the ride. Uber charged me a $5.50 cancellation fee. I appealed the fee, and Uber's automated system granted me a voucher instead of a refund. and the voucher was only good for 7 days! I spent an hour trying to figure out how to extend the voucher, but the app just sent me around in circles, and Uber has no human customer support. I had no choice but to let the voucher expire and lose the fee.

Something seems kinda odd about price calculations lately. It's now been consistently 3 times cheaper just to have everything delivered to my door than it is to utilize this service with a driver within a couple miles, even during what shouldn't be peak/busy periods of the day. Guess it's time to start carrying a little cash and alternating between uber and using out the local taxi cab service again. pfft. guess I'm walking more and more... and your app fights me when I try to zoom in/out. BAD.

As of late its been problem after problem.Over the past 2-3mo its been issues.This week alone my payment method has been declining which ive had the money in my account for the ride. Same thing again today and was told to adjust the tip but it only added more to the initial tip and I had to pay that extra amount because I need to be able to get to work. Being charged nearly a week later for a ride that was paid for with an entirely different card The list keeps growing and its very disappointing

Please please actually fix things we report wrong with the app, like the map routes and addresses. It's been a living nightmare trying to get home late at night every shift at work. My address is the wrong city and it makes drivers come from WAY farther away than necessary. It's ridiculous. I've reported this issue and one with the map, never fixed! Please fix them!!

Business went from sugar to sh. The Eats side is trash. Overpriced, gets it wrong half the time, then no support aspect (just an empty chat window where no one responds). If there is an auto fix, it's just an uber credit on the food you're missing, not the premium, the tip, the fees, just the item itself, then you never see it on your account later. Want to chat with an assistant? No problem, just hit the help button and talk to yourself. Uninstalled.

I use Uber to commute to work. I started noticing that they will occasionally up the price on a trip that I have already accepted after the fact and recently they charged 2 different accounts for the $9.99 Uber one charge after paying for it for months. they said that I have another Uber account on a different email. the email they are talking about I no longer use and haven't used it in over a year so it appears that they are just looking for reasons to take more $$. Watch your charges!!

I dislike that it's almost impossible to contact a human for customer service and even when you contact them there is no way (according to the rep I finally spoke to) to remove alcohol ads or listings from your profile. Because of these reasons I'm deleting my account and uninstalling. This should allow you to block certain restaurants but it doesn't. Also, because they have deals with certain companies, specific food items will be blocked from store orders that you can get on other apps. Weird.

not so much about the app, but the reservation system is awful. reserved 2 days ahead because needed a trip in a non common area. told the day before that a pain was assigned with name and picture. 30 minutes before the time, the name disappears and only 10 minutes sheet the expected pick up a message saying "Sorry, we can't pick you up" but if i had cancelled, I would have to pay 65 dollars. then I search in Uber and I get a person right there, 15 minutes late to the airport, but still on time

its kinda convenient. but the worst part of the whole this isn't the drives, its the company! they dont want to deal with you so all their customer service options are AI generated. Just today my doctor told me to go to an urgent care. she named a few and I found the one that was closest to me on the Uber app. so I get a ride there and it turns out that its permanently closed! goggle maps new it was permanently closed. but the Uber app didn't. $18.58 plus $4 tip for nothing!

The map is kind of messed up. When I reserve a ride back home, it's been showing my pickup as in the back of the building. I ended up missing a ride the other day because of it and was charged and when I went to look for customer support, I accidentally pressed a tip for a ride I didn't get. I will give more stars when this gets fixed. When I've been picked up, the drivers have been great.

Long time user. [excited] App to center focus on where I need to move to, instead of the route of the driver to pick me up is infuriating. mildly better, but not really. Please fix. New issue is the default tip buttons. I take Uber every day back and forth to work. I tip $1 each way, as it's a short ride, and that's what I can afford 2x a day over the going rate. Why do the quick press buttons all of a sudden default to $2? Inconvenient, and I can't afford

I will never use this app again. I called a ride because I'm with a mobility-impaired person and we needed a ride to the bus stop because he can't make it there by ft. Said driver arrived and I couldn't find him anywhere. Tried to call and message him through the app and it wouldn't even allow it. I got charged for a cancellation fee for no show. And now app isn't working!! Reporting to attorney general also violated ADA! I'm informing my bank as well!

Apart from paying more than double the trip's worth to get a driver who won't even turn their AC on in the middle of summer. I've disputed cancellation fees before and it worked like a charm. Now, I'm being forced to pay 130 pounds as "outstanding balance" from a trip that showed 370 and I paid 400. When the trip ended, I got an email saying it's 243 but I disregarded it, 2 hours later it says that I only paid the 243 and I gotta pay the rest. No answer for 2 days, never using your app again!!

A driver drove past me, started the meter without picking me up, and then stopped it shortly after. I reached out to customer support for a refund because I never got into the car. They refused to do anything at all to change this outcome. It appeared as if they didn't even understand. I would skip them and go to a different ride sharing app. Awful customer service.

Horrible delivery service, no customer service, got charged for an order i didnt even make then cancelled it literally 3 minutes after order was placed when i noticed the transaction. They will take your card information then use it apparently, then not give you a refund for a purchase you never made. Did absolutely everything right called the store to cancel it, called my bank, and then called uber which took 30 minutes of digging just to be able to call someone just for me to email them. nasty

I have been using Uber for a number of years and typically don't have issues with the exception of the driver here and there who ignores the Comfort requests. Lately, however, I have been scheduling my rides and the driver will come crazy early (an hour or so) then demand to know when I'm going to be out then cancel. I can't even respond to them because the app won't show messages to me because the driver is too early even by the app's standard. I only see a piece of the message. Huge Prob!!

The Uber app works properly and well. We tested it in England, Spain, France, and Brazil. Also the Uber customer service, which we had to contact once or twice is excellent, quick, and very customer centered. Maybe I am doing something wrong but what I miss is that on arrival the final charged price is clearly shown to me. Because once or twice the final price was higher than at the moment of booking and I just saw it after leaving the car and after tipping. Hence no chance to ask the driver.

UPDATE: I'm removing my 5 star review because Uber just charged me $2.00 for a tip I DID NOT AUTHORIZE. I just left the driver & tried to give a tip (more than what they charged) on the app, & Uber said "you already tipped this driver $2.00". That is called THEFT. This happened once before in 2025 & is not acceptable. Always get your receipts & check what Uber has charged you before you tip. Very sad because drivers are usually very good & arrive within 5 minutes after you order a ride online.

The last 2 times I've placed an order for Eats it wouldn't go through and it also wouldn't let me use the saved payment methods. I had to delete the payment method, uninstall the app, reinstall, and then manually enter my card at checkout. I plan to cancel my Uber One and use other apps because it takes me 10 minutes to place an order. The ride share also has started some shady things like forcing you longer wait times while offering you a "faster" experience if you pay more money for priority

Major problems with this app is once you book, canceling the trip is a huge challenge, app will keep circling around two options and won't cancel. Second is there no easy way to contact customer support. You have to go through multiple pages and still won't get connected. Safety is another issue. Overall it seems Uber team built the app and then forgot to improve it.

Really unhappy with the Uber Auto service these days. I‚Äôve tried booking multiple times, waited for more than an hour, and still no auto driver accepts the ride unless I add an extra tip. It feels like they are ignoring normal bookings. What‚Äôs the point of using the app if I have to struggle every single time? This has become a frustrating and disappointing experience. Uber seriously needs to look into this issue and take action

Great ride and cab sharing platform . edit : it used to be it has become the voice service in terms of customer service. next time you have a problem with the right see if you can get a customer service rep. or if you got extra charge see if you could find the option in the support menu. the great service has died

While in a ride, I was unable to add a stop for a return trip. Uber has this feature enabled, but I constantly got the "Unable to update the destination for this trip." Yes, I was "adding a stop," not changing a destination already in progress. Uber is less expensive than Lyft, but takes higher % of fare. So tip your driver more than you would with Lyft.

all of a sudden, I cannot use the map, the fares never load, so I cannot book an Uber, which defeats the purpose. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling it, still nothing. asks me to set up passkey, but the button doesn't allow me to click it. I can also no longer follow trips my husband sends to me. overall, I can't do anything. and the help tab never loads either

title: Wikiloc - Trails of the World
description: The Outdoors Community App. Wikiloc is the go-to outdoor navigation application for hiking, cycling, and over 80 other outdoor activities with millions of members worldwide. Find your favorite trails among authentic routes created by the community, record your own and share it, easily transfer it to your GPS device, and more features to enjoy nature whenever you want. Engage in outdoor sports: Choose from 50 million hiking, trekking, biking (MTB, road cycling, gravel), trail running, mountaineering, climbing, kayaking, skiing, and up to 80 different types of activities. Authentic nature trails: Wikiloc routes have been recorded with GPS and created by community members ‚Äî nature and outdoor sports enthusiasts like you. Send routes to your GPS or smartwatch: Enjoy the experience from your wrist or mobile. Download Wikiloc routes directly to your Wear OS, Garmin, Suunto or COROSsports watch or bike computer. Available for devices like Garmin Forerunner, Fenix, Epix, Edge, and many more. You can also record and follow routes on a map from your Samsung Galaxy Watch, Pixel Watch, Fossil, Oneplus, Xiaomi, or TicWatch (minimum Wear OS 3 version). Outdoor Navigation: stay on track: ‚úÖ Turn your mobile phone or smartwatch into a GPS navigator. Your smartphone will guide you with a direction indicator and sound alerts to notify you if you stray off the path during navigation. ‚úÖ Live GPS route tracking. Share your real-time location with family and friends while you're on the route, so they know where you are at all times. ‚úÖ Offline GPS navigation through free topographic maps worldwide for use without coverage or data. Ideal for when you're in the mountains or traveling without an internet connection or with a low battery. Official routes for all audiences üèîÔ∏èü•æ‚ôø Explore free GPS walking routes through national parks (including routes adapted for reduced mobility and visual impairment), trekking on mountain trails, routes by waterfalls, and more in the largest hiking and cycling community (or bike trails) around you. Follow local iconic routes on foot or climb the most famous mountain passes. Become part of the community where millions of nature, travel, and sports lovers share their adventures, from the most popular hike to the most remote trekking expedition on the planet. Find the perfect route for your next adventure, through Premium features such as: ‚úÖ Route Planner: Plan your next adventure easily. Simply choose the places you want to pass through and Wikiloc will create a route prioritizing the most popular stretches of trails from other community members. ‚úÖ 3D Maps: Explore trails with more depth and detail. Without leaving home, discover the terrain relief, evaluate elevation changes, and take a look at the panoramic views that await you along the way. ‚úÖ Advanced search filters: by elevation gain, distance, difficulty, and season (winter/summer). ‚úÖ Search by passing area: find routes that pass through the places of interest you choose and plan your ideal itinerary. ‚úÖ Weather forecast for a perfect outing. Create and share your adventures Record your own outdoor routes on a map, add waypoints, take photos of the landscapes along the itinerary, and upload them to your Wikiloc account from your mobile phone. Share your adventures with friends, family, and community followers. Commitment to the planet With Wikiloc Premium, you not only help us continue to improve Wikiloc, but you also contribute to protecting the Earth, as 1% of your purchase goes directly to 1% for the Planet, a global network of companies, nonprofit organizations, and individuals working together for a healthy planet.f

Find your favorite trails among authentic routes created by the community, record your own and share it, easily transfer it to your GPS device, and more features to enjoy nature whenever you want.

Engage in outdoor sports:
Choose from 50 million hiking, trekking, biking (MTB, road cycling, gravel), trail running, mountaineering, climbing, kayaking, skiing, and up to 80 different types of activities.

Follow local iconic routes on foot or climb the most famous mountain passes. Become part of the community where millions of nature, travel, and sports lovers share their adventures, from the most popular hike to the most remote trekking expedition on the planet.

Find the perfect route for your next adventure, through Premium features such as:

‚úÖ Weather forecast for a perfect outing.

Create and share your adventures
Record your own outdoor routes on a map, add waypoints, take photos of the landscapes along the itinerary, and upload them to your Wikiloc account from your mobile phone. Share your adventures with friends, family, and community followers.

Commitment to the planet
With Wikiloc Premium, you not only help us continue to improve Wikiloc, but you also contribute to protecting the Earth, as 1% of your purchase goes directly to 1% for the Planet, a global network of companies, nonprofit organizations, and individuals working together for a healthy planet.f
summary: Discover millions of trails for hiking, biking, trekking, GPS navigation routes

scraped_reviews.content: I tried the wear os version this morning for mountain biking. For the moment, it works with limited features and I guess it with evolve rapidly in the right direction. The map appears only in satelite view, I wanted to use it to do exploration of trails while mountaing biking but could not as the satelite view does not show trails, I guess it is no use either when hiking except to follow existing tracks. Also, too bad one cannot zoom/dezoom with double fingers.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for the feedback. In the latest version, you can switch the map to Terrain, OSM, etc. from the app's settings. Regarding the zoom feature, you can zoom in or out by first tapping on the map (you will see some arrows) and then using your fingers. Zooming also works with your watch's digital crown, if it has one. Cheers!

scraped_reviews.content: Once great, now ... meh. A couple of years ago, it was easy to find trails and just get started hiking.  I contributed quite a few myself.  I took a break from using the app and now I discovered that I have to pay to get gps tracking on trails.  I guess Wikiloc had to choose some kind of revenue model.  I just wish it wasn't one that drew me the app in the first place.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, thanks for your comment! You can download all trails from the web for free. You can also download offline maps, follow your own trails and ORG profiles' trails for free from the App. The small contribution is for the technologic infrastructure and is optional.
More info: https://help.wikiloc.com/article/582-free-app-what-can-do

scraped_reviews.content: An application that is very slow in practice, and is really useless in sensitive situations. That is, if you went on a route where you wanted to use the experiences recorded in this app, you can't! Because you have to pay in advance! In fact, it exploits human freedom and health in a sensitive situation! Even when you go on a route yourself and save it, after a few hours you see that it wasn't saved because the application slows down at the end of the route!

Fantastic app, you can select lots of different activities and choose your area with downloadable offline maps in case you lose signal. You can also upload your hikes or drives into the app for other users. One problem however on the 4x4 off road filter is that many users have uploaded drives on normal roads and there needs to be some curating of the content because if you are searching for off road tracks, you don't want to see someone's drive who stayed on tarmac.

First half of the walk was wonderful but in the second half the "trail" disappeared and was blocked by three barbed wire fences which we had to climb with much difficulty. The last part of the trail guide is completely useless. Maybe the person who did it used a drone instead of walking it. Unless you are happy to stop the walk halfway and go back, or have strong wire cutters, don't go on this walk.

You have to have the app running with the screen turned on. Otherwise the app stops tracking your route. I've tried every possible workaround and none of them solves this problem, so the app is pretty much useless on my phone.

great app, but I don't understand why the 'plan trail' option doesn't support boat trips. I use the app for kayaking, for which it is excellent, but not being able to plan a kayak trip like you can for hiking is quite frustrating.
overall great routes and services. would love to see a better UI and UX though. at times it's really hard to navigate the app.

Difficult to navigate app and website. if you sesrch for a trail in the app or online no result shows up. But if you Google search "Wikiloc and ______ trail", Google can find it on their site mysteriously. Forget about contacting them in any way. Not user friendly.

I have been a premium member now for some years, and with each update, I am awaiting to see the addition in the settings the ability to disable/enable the process of making any route you record, automatically being made PUBLIC. At the moment, the only way to stop this is by manually entering the PRIVACY menu each time for every route you save. It's frustrating to do after a long ride. As we pay for the service of this app, then as a Premium feature, this really should be added!

The app didn't have permission to use my photos or posted photos of my children without their or mine permission on Wikiloc. There is no help email to remove them. I say it again. this app does not have permission to post or use my photos or access my photos or post photos of my kids. but it goes around my permissions. I'm currently trying to find out how to remove them with no luck.
Most reliable, intuitive and accurate App I have found. I hike in very remote areas and Wikiloc is the only App that shows all trails, however rough they may be.
Really good app for hiking trails, works well with Garmin and prevented me from taking the wrong trail several times.
doesn't apply filter to map.I want to plan a dual sport route and the map defaults to hiking, default is set to dual sport motorcycle. only gives me 4 options on map, and that's not one of them!
AllTrails wannabe app. Clunky, inefficient interface. There are many more trails that show on other apps but not this one.
The app is great for discovering routes. However it does not appear to be possible to load a .gpx of a route via the app.

Pros. Many trails recorded by other people. Lots of photos and reviews. Both OSM and satellite layers available. Cons. It's extremely hard to record or follow a track. The app crashes continuously, the zoom is super slow, the only downloadable layer is poor, and I need to download the whole country (1GB). While recording, the app shows the correct dot but often fails to record the track. DON'T use this app as your primary navigation app. It crashes a lot.

I live near the Alps and purchased the premium plan to find routes quickly and easily when I'm there. What you find when using Wikiloc is that 99% of the routes are rubbish. Everyone uploads whatever they want, and no one reviews anything. It's full of junk that prevents you from finding quality routes. I ended up stopping using it.

WearOS: great that someone developed an app that can navigate hikes by following a line on a map, its rare to find. Have experienced 3 issues though: 1) planning of routes doesnt see sidewalks as a usable path - only marked pathways 2)I was navigating on my wear os watch - i kept getting message "you are following a trail"on watch screen every time i activate screen. 3)watch map is laggy and GPS location is sometimes not updated frequently enough selection and map datail level is best i found

I'm using a Samsung Watch 6 Classic running Wear OS5. ‚Ä¢I love that I can see the map and navigate with it with my phone in the bag and (I think) offline. I haven't found other apps that show the map on my watch. ‚Ä¢Watch-only navigation is so key! I uploaded a GPX ‚Ä¢Unfortunately, the map glitched several times when navigating and this lost the map view. I think this would have not happened if I had 4G switched on on my phone but have not tested it. ‚Ä¢Please also add verbal navigation

I find this app very difficult to use. You tell it to start navigating a trail and it just shows you a bird's eye view of the whole route with a bunch of dots that are all very close together. Nothing about turning left or right here or there. I'm sure there's a way to get it to do that, but I couldn't find it.

what problem does this app solve? it seems to be designed with the following use case in mind: you're traveling with somebody you don't like, staying in a hotel, and you want to get away from him or her for a few days. you search for 'hikes near me' and look for something appealing. for that it would work well, as long as you use a real trail app to do the hiking. wikiloc sucks so bad for actually using on your phone while you are hiking. drains your battery. almost unusable.
Yet another wretched app requiring sign up. Why? Immediate uninstall and good riddance.
love wikiloc and was premium for years, now went to use and not premium, but to be premium price is double, 9.99 ‚Ç¨ to 19,99. why?? why dud i stop being premium?
only used the App twice but very impressed so far, easy to navigate the trails.

Good app, but I never, ever subscribe to apps where the premium version fee is automatically set to 'recurring' by default. It's so unecessary and too often, the promises that 'you are in control' and 'you can easily cancel anytime' is not met by reality. Just do the right thing; default premium accounts to 'not recurring' and I'd happily pay to upgrade.

Wikiloc tricks you into a premium subscription. I have an active one that I cannot even cancel in the app as described. It does not offer the features included in premium, but charges for it. Furthermore, the subscription cannot be cancelled on the play store directly which every well behaving app should offer. We will see how it goes. I don't remember giving them my CC data (but they might use the data from Garmin). unsubscribe, delete account ...
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We welcome constructive feedback, but this review is just NOT TRUE.

We've been online for 17 years, serving customers since 2006.
Wikiloc prominently displays $9.99/year pricing inside the app, with a free 14-day trial, cancelable anytime at no cost. We never see your credit card data, Play Store handles payments for us. We give refunds if needed.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app since 2017. Great app for tracking and recording trails. Even in no data areas, it still saves on GPS and overlaps the map when connected. Also very useful for keeping you on track to avoid getting lost. I also like to save the trails as we walk in remote areas where no trails are saved so far. Also, it is an essential bit of kit for safety and avoid getting lost. It's good to share. Excellent and essential.

Good but could be better. I think the guide triangle is stupid, as it has three points so you never know which one is the one that you should follow. Also, offline maps only has one option of what kind of map, even for premium members, you should be able to choose any type of offline map, street, topographic etc, depending on your environment. Not sure if I'll renew once my subscription is over, depends on what improvements are made.

This is a good, attractive and easy to use trail-nav app. Despite that I'm still rating it with just three stars, for its apparent lack of any meaningful statistics-keeping. Any outdoorsy person I know, likes to keep track of total time, kilometers, altitudes, etc., of trails hiked, mountains climbed, routes biked, etc. Most of them (us?) are practically obsessed by this and spend considerable time going over and over this data - and I sorely miss that here (unless, I'm missing something?).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, you can see some aggregated stats by sport and time in your web profile, we will improve this in the future, add more detailed stats and to the mobile app as well.

scraped_reviews.content: I use it for discovering trails (record trails) and the GPS is very accurate considering it's used on your mobile device. You have a lot of options to set waypoints, add pictures and stuff. Basically you can build from scratch an itinerary for others to follow or for your own. Hands down, it's one of the best outdoor apps out there! Also you can download your country's offline map that works great when you're not covered by GSM signal.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your thorough review!

scraped_reviews.content: I am very tired of Wikiloc. Its default assumption is that you always want to record your walk. So when you click on "Navigate Trail" you automatically start recording and your battery starts to run down. And there is no easy way to stop the recording without coming out of the walk and starting all over again! Most people do not wish to record their walk: they wish to do somebody else's with real time navigation so that they can see they are on the route and have not strayed off it!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Glenn, thanks for the feedback. In our tests, on a mid-range Xiaomi Redmi phone, recording a 3h trail uses less than 10% of battery in areas with good GPS reception. We have improved the battery usage of the app a lot in the past few months and continue working hard on this quality area! Good thoughts on the UX of the app, thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Good hiking app. However, it requires a subscription, which doesn't make sense if you only ever use it on vacations, and doesn't seem honest considering the hiking tracks are contributed by the community. Plus, it drains the battery like mad (25% per hour), leaving you disconnected from civilization when you're out in the wild, unless you brought a power bank.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi, thanks for your comment! You can download all trails from the web for free. You can also download offline maps, follow your own trails and ORG profiles' trails for free from the App. The small contribution is for the technologic infrastructure and is optional.
More info: https://help.wikiloc.com/article/582-free-app-what-can-do

scraped_reviews.content: Free version is a pain to use. Paid version is kinda ok but not stable enough. I tried tracking two long hikes and both times it lost the GPS signal and stopped the log. I use other tracking and navigation apps for different sports without issue. Even if the track goes their smoothing algorithm is useless and counts the little jumps as elevation gain. This is common issue, there are tons of saved routes which shows many times more elevation gain than in reality in their database. But it's cheap.

Great app! Please improve trail search ‚Äî most tracks are daily routines. Add filters or a ‚Äúbest for weekend‚Äù mode. A heatmap view would help find popular routes. No way to trim a recording if left running, and no in-app feedback option. Please also support more GPS devices like iGPSPORT, Wahoo, GeoID ‚Äî not just Garmin. Thanks!

Very useful app that allows you to follow hiking tracks and save your progress. The free version doesn't include the option to see where exactly you are in the path but it offers enough features for being useful, by comparing your saved progress with the recommended path you can easily tell if you got lost somewhere along the way. The best hiking app I've used so far.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks a lot for your kind review! We built Wikiloc for people like you! üòä

scraped_reviews.content: If only this was more like Wikipedia but for trails‚Ä¶ Far too many features are locked behind a pay wall for this app to be useful to me without Premium, and nothing here is worth yet another recurring charge for me ü§∑

It appeared to work initially, but froze and became unresponsive despite relaunching it several times. It them became very frustrating trying to find my way round it's interface. As a result I have decided to go back to the good old ordinance survey map for peace of mind. Maybe in an other few years will they be able to embrace GPS data in a more user friendly way, but if you value your relationship with your partner then leave this technology at home. Update 4 years on...tried again to use this app, but it still only works for 200mts and then stops recording your path.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! We have been down some minutes for technical maintenance. We are fully open again, sorry for the inconvenience. If you have any problem please contact us at our support email.

scraped_reviews.content: No landscape orientation on Android. How hard it could be to implement it? It's like a joke.
excellent app. but Persian/Farsi search has problem. please check this language.

Great app for hiking. Trails uploaded (and tested) by other hikers. 3d viewer of the trail. Other hikers' estimate of trail difficulty tends to be optimistic. Used it in Albanian alps ‚Äì many good trails!

Quite a tough walk. There are some very steep sections. when we did it (end of June) it was very boggy as well. The trail wasn't always easy to see or follow. Having said all that the amazing views made the struggle well worth it!

The first and probably the best hiking app. I've just added a Google pixel watch into the mix and I would say that it would be appreciated if somewhere there were some instructions as to how to use this. It took me a long time to discover how to change the map background. Sometimes there is no map, only the trail, or it can take up to 30 minutes for the trail to appear on the watch. Recording the trail can be very hit and miss. The last three trails have failed to record.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback! Our Wear OS app relies on your phone's GPS, so disable battery optimization on your phone (global and app-specific). Pixel Watch tips: 1. Zoom with the watch crown. 2. Change maps in Wear OS app settings. 3. Tap the map to activate panning. Check this guide: https://help.wikiloc.com/article/842-smartphone-app-wear-os-google

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app since March, and initially it seemed great at first, but lately it won't record any routes. Says it's recording, but when looking at the stats, they all read zero. I've had this issue on two different phones, sometimes get a message at the top saying "low GPS". I have no idea why this should be. Used in different areas of the country, with clear view of the sky, so why a GPS fix can't be obtained I don't know. I have to say, it's brilliant when it does work.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, if you see "low GPS" then your signal definitely isn't good. However, if there's no "low gps" notice, then the recording should work. Do you still have this problem? If so, please send us this review by email so that we can follow up. Our email is support@wikiloc.com.

scraped_reviews.content: Very good for Spain. I have been a subscriber for 3 years and I find it very helpful.

Great app. I use it a lot, to find saved trails and expecially when i go exploring for new trails, in case you get lost or the road ends, you can find it easily by going back following the same path wich is saved whether you have network or not. Ps: To WikiLoc: this is a big comunity and I thank you for this platform. I would suggest is adding the option of private messaging between profiles. Maybe adding also groups as well.

Wikiloc used to be my very favourite trekking app, and I recommended it to everyone. Now, apparently, I have to be premium to follow a trail?? And I cannit search anything! I also looked up the ORG (I suggested this for work, I'm an adventure tour leader) and they ask for 120 or more per year????! Bye bye wikiloc :'( time to try and adapt to some other app! Shame, I really like loved it! Last love was in October 2018. New year, new app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The following feature works the same. To follow other users trails from the app you needed the Navigation Pack, which has evolved to Wikiloc Premium (new features). You can always follow trails from the ORG accounts for free and of course your own trails. You can also download all Wikiloc tracks from the web for free and use your own GPS.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using the app for more than 10 year. I like it. I would like to ask for two things: ‚Äî Allow to choose the default visibility (I would like it to be always private), otherwise my friends get notifications all the time about tracks I upload to be followed. ‚Äî Allow to create custom tracks, like you can do with Komoot or swisstopo. Thank you for the good work!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, you can choose the default visibility for the tracks that are synced from your smartwatch in your web profile's settings. For the rest of the trails uploaded from the app, it takes just 2 clicks to change the visibility when you save the trail. Thanks for the feedback on the custom tracks!

scraped_reviews.content: Lots of problems with this app. It always stays on keep recording, I have to do the force stop every time. The GPS doesn't work right, on the phone or tablet doesn't tell you where you are in the map, having one in paper will do the same work. Plus the trial are not verified, so everyone can put a 4x4 trial and you end up looking for something it doesn't exist....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, please contact support@wikiloc.com so that we can troubleshoot the problem with you. Thanks!

scraped_reviews.content: Such a clickbait app, you don't get any useful tools unless you buy the premium version. For the free version all it does is give you a minimalist hint of the trail, the satellite photo they use isn't even that good. You can get the same information from Google search for free

title: Business Game
description:
Relive one of the most iconic board game series of all time, the classic Business game. Perhaps the best-known of all modern board games, Business is the game of buying and selling real estate. Snap up as many squares of land, utilities and railroads.

Time for Business fun with Friends and Family!!
 
The objective of the game is to be the last player remaining with any money.

Wheel and deal as you build your fortune playing an exciting game of Business online. Buy up whole neighborhoods, charge rent, and watch your empire grow. It's all about making deals and making money. But don't land in Jail! 

You better keep an eye on your money, because you never know when the dice will land you with a massive rent bill to pay.

Business is a great game for 2 - 6 players. It is a board game where players roll two six-sided dice to move around the game board, buying and trading properties, and develop them with houses and hotels. Players collect rent from their opponents, with the goal being to drive them into bankruptcy. Money can also be gained or lost through Chance and Community Chest cards, and tax squares; players can end up in jail, which they cannot move from until they have met one of several conditions. There are other places on the board which can not be bought, but instead require the player to draw a card and perform the action on the card, pay taxes, collect income, or even go to jail.

Play with your Facebook friends, against the computer, against your friends in Local Multiplayer or with millions of Business players around the world in Online Multiplayer Mode.

You can also create Private Rooms and invite your friends to play in Play with Friends Mode.

Business is the fast-dealing property trading game that your will have the whole family buying, selling and having a blast!
Business! There‚Äôs no better board game you can play with your friends and/or family when you want to spend a good few hours locked in a bitter class struggle until one person eventually emerges as both tycoon and victor ‚Äì and thus, capitalism! 
¬†
Pass Go, take a Chance card, and you might just build the property of your dreams‚Ä¶or you might end up in Jail! Whatever happens, it's fun all the way to the top! 
So why not make it a reality by playing this game and reliving your childhood days?
Download Business Family Dice Game for free today!
¬†
‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ Business Features‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ‚óÜ

‚úî Create Private Room and Invite Friends and Family
‚úî Play with players across the world
‚úî 2, 3,4,5 or 6 Player Mode 
‚úî Play with Local Multiplayer
 
Please don't forget to Rate and Review Business, we aim to make it one of the best board games out there.
 
Any suggestions? We always love to hear from you for making this game better.
 
Enjoy playing Business!!

summary: Business is the classical Real Estate board game based in India. Play Today!

scraped_reviews.content: A very lightweight and interactive version of Monopoly, just with Indian place names and currency. I play offline, so I don't get ads, and the play is pretty smooth. Not sure why it crashes and glitches for other people. Sometimes I feel very lucky when playing as everything goes my way, other times I'm destroyed easy, and sometimes it's a long balanced challenge. Doesn't feel too rigged, but sometimes more deliberate than other monopoly apps.

The game works well. The CPU is generally "easy", when playing online other people can exploit this. But, I'm giving a positive review because not only the app works, but it is one of the few "Businessüòâ" apps out there. You can still play offline or open a private room and play online with friends. I would suggest better match making, so people may avoid playing with a bot that eventually ends getting exploited by one of the players.

I just had a very bitter experience using this app. After amassing so much land and strategizing brutally to gain dominance and win the game. I was suddenly taken out of the game and couldn't join back in, that is very bad. I play with my friends and each time we go out of the app or time out 3times I can't join back in. please fix this glitch, even when an ai steps in to play, there should be a possibility to re-enter the room anytime and join the game, because it takes so much time to build

Bots in Multiplayer mode. i faced this too. They don't bid above mentioned prices of cities. But you can defeat them easily. Here is my trick. when you go to any City go for auction. let the bots bid 1rupee less than Price of City. Once they buy the Place, you trade them with exactly 60% of marked price on board (120 rs for a station of 200 rs) they will sell it to you, unless they haven't purchased atleast 2 out of 3 places of same color. Have Fun and Get the winning trophy.

The game has too many issues: frequent lag and random deaths, useless friend feature (no replay option), jail chances don‚Äôt work properly and still cut money, constant network errors, auto moves with unfair property buys, rent not credited, random Chest/Chance rules, and it mostly feels like playing with bots.

Glitches while trading when the time runs out the trade and show board button makes the screen freeze and had to leave the room. once left it won't rejoin me using the same code. Gets sort of partial when the computer is playing even during multiplayer when a player is winning..

super game. but always stuck in playing time. sometimes game was crashed. fix the problem. worst game play experience. always show check your network connection and try again later. but ads running smoothly. why ???

I have installed the game on this device. But for some reason the game is glitching. It is flickering. I already have the game on another device (using it for 2 weeks), there it is fine, no issue. Please fix this.

I have search many places for "Monopoly" game, that we used to play in childhood. never found any version (not even any bad ones) then I realise, I should search for different name, and here I am. The part I loved most 1. play with computer 2. one device multiple player 3. online with unknown player 4. online with private player thank you for bringing back my child memories.
poor, it fluctuates only on realme devices, like there is stuttering , i have screen recorded it, fix for realme devices, i have tried in realme note 60 and realme 12+

Too many glitches during animation.I always win, just don't buy what you land in, let computer but then you buy from computer , e.g Train stations will cost you 115 instead of 200. Buy one plot on each colour and dont sell until you have developed your property. Best plots to develop are the Orange, light blue, red since they always have high traffic. Buy all train stations , its the easiest way to win. buy property cheaply from a player who is almost running bankrupt.

decent game played one game uninstalled after it gave me 200 and took it back 3x in a row. Felt like a punishment for not trading with the computer. hahaha I will probably redownload when I am no longer mad. Love the variety of characters to choose from.üòÅ

the concept of the auction is not a bad idea but it shouldn't be forced, this literally forces the bot to basically buy everything cause it nor the player can't cancel the perchase of a place amd that in itself doesn't make sense, it's like you forcing the player and or the bot to buy a property

The game is quite easy after you figure out the logistics. First AI will sell you property at about 75% of original price. So don't buy anything you land on. Let the CPU buy it and buy it back for cheaper. Get 1 property of each color to block building. Trains are a great source of income if you have 3 or 4. If other players are low on cash you can get property for very cheap in the bidding process. Happy gaming.

Best business ( indian monopoly) game. there is no other game this amazing. i would have given 5 stars. BUT THE PROBLEM . The game is having a low crowd too much bots . HELLO GAME MAKERS IF YOU ARE READING PLEASE DONT WORRY ABOUT MATCHMAKING TIME LET IT TAKE MORE TIME TILL REAL PLAYERS MATCHUP WE CAN WAIT FOR A GOOD GAME. and SECOND REMOVE 3P and 5P Mode so the crowd can concentrate at 2P 4P 6P matches. try it and thank me later üòâ
The interface is so poor and the sound is irritating too, the pawns moving like those are stuck somewhere else.. zigzag shakey movements are very worst

totally rigged game, developers must be punished for making such game, everytime the computer wins, and I am the who lands in jail or end up giving money, even though I have enough property the computer gets saved everytime, the worst business game ever made.

Worst experience of the game in the Android. Provide a smooth game experience. Once I get a network issue, its impossible to connect again. App crashes a lot. The game is good but the application is worst.
absolutely stupid game. I know it's a dice game but if you want someone to play your game, you have to make them win sometimes as well. your game has always favored my opponent so I am uninstalling
Worst Game ever. Even online you will be playing with a computer only and it will make sure you lose the game. Biased game. Please don't download itüôã.
I am not able to create room because is show this message "Something went wrong! Check your network connection and try again" Please resolve this issue ASAP.

Played one game against computer, and it felt like it was deliberately rigged against me. Just opened it to try again and it's now really glitchy to the point that it's unplayable. Pop ups are flicking badly, the screen freezes so you don't know what you've rolled or landed on until it catches up. Lastly, once you've fixed the glitching, please add an option to turn off the automatic bidding on propties you don't want to buy or don't have enough money to buy.
This game on Samsung A36 mobile its Lacking and it stucks and cannot be played as it keeps lagging. Please resolve the issue asap. Thanks in Advance.
music and speaker buttons don't work to stop the background music while playing the game, that irritates a lot

Game is good but a little disturbance in internet and you will lose your hours of play . Very irritating when playing with friends . If a call come in between you will loose your game . There should be a code through which u can join again or it should be like ludo star 2 . Also AI is so dumb. If you ask all his 3 color properties at just a little higher price it will sell it to you . Even helps in making other players all 3 color.

This game is good...but there is lot of connection issues..you guyzz have to fix this issue. You automatically get out of the game instead of using a high speed internet..this becomes irritating. We doieven get a chance to play, and a dialogue box pops up saying- you missed your turn and you are out of the room. please fix this bug.
You should be able to morgage before the property goes to bid, and you should be able to morgage during bids.

I haven't been able to complete a single online game... Every time I have been taken out of the room... Everything is going good and suddenly I am out... Same thing happens while playing with my friends... Only the computer mode works fine but I don't want to play with the computer... It is just dumb... Gives away tickets at 75% of the original price... And keeps asking me for tickets at prices lower than at what I bought them.. why would I give away when I am at a strong position in the game..

This game is very good. It even works for multiplayer. But it has some areas which need to be improved. 1. The game only works in portrait mode , it would be great if it supports landscape view for better gaming experience. 2. The network error message with loading indicator arises randomly even though the network speed is good. It kills the gameing experience especially when we are bidding for a place.. And sometimes the opponent can able to play with negative amount and i bankrupted automatic

I liked the game but few improvements needed. 1. It utilizes half the screen, it would be good if it's full screen with auto rotate support. 2. Looks like user base is less, so most of the time we get AI as a player, the logic of AI can be further improved to make it tougher. For example, it takes into account 3 amounts ( AI's amount, opposition amount and the price of asset) before going for buy or auction. If opposition has less amount that the base price of asset, it should go for auction.

Overall performance of this game is great. The game needs lots of improvement especially in playing against computer. Computer players needs different level of difficulty. Unable to exit from the bid. Unable avoid buying or bidding. Needs to increase the rate of places. Needs to increase the price of building house after completing each house. Needs the ability to lend loans to other players. Computer needs to be smart enough to not trade their best cards for lower price than the bought price

I love the game... Always playing it especially now. But one major issue that is annoying is the fact that me or my friends get kicked out of the game for no reason saying we timed out... And it's very annoying... And cannot even join back into the game. In some games if we leave atleast we are able to join back. But here the ai takes over and it is very annoying. Please find a fix
this game is good but it not working properly irritate because game developer is not developed good game

The algorithm of the game is very partial to one player when playing 2 players, worst algorithm game i would say, feels like they just wanted to create something and ended up on this, it's more frustrating for players rather than enjoyable, as the game favours one player, so basically it tends to become boring eventually for both, as just one keeps on getting positive side, recommended not to download or allow your children to play, unless you want them to feel depressed and frustrating.
worst experience ever, it'll keep sending you in jail, when you'll play with computer, or will send you to the boxes with income tax, even in chance box, they'll always give cards of negative balance

I really love this game, but there‚Äôs one thing that‚Äôs a bit frustrating: the bots. Would it be possible to add an extra button that lets us wait a bit longer to match with real players, so we can avoid playing with bots and have a batter experience

Everything is controlled through bugs in this game so only 50% will be on your controll. Some matches are taken too long so that the owners or company get maximum profit out of it .It has too many adds and in multiplayer mode you can't rejoin again if the connections breaks, sometimes it shows room no longer exists , and the worst part it is built in such a way to retain the existing users .

The level of glitching made this game unplayable. I went into a game against the computer, and after my first role, the game had awful graphical glitches. The whole screen looks like a bad trip as pieces glitch as they move across the board, and buying property causes the whole screen to flash uncontrollably for several seconds. I almost feel like this game needs an epilepsy warning. I honestly couldn't take it after just a few minutes
if you like being depressed, this is the game for you. Computer always wins throwing exact dice numbers to win every time

Do not play this game. It only has bots even in multiplayer. When a card goes for auction, they won't bid for it when it goes above the cost price. And the bots usually win, and always have like 600‚Çπ more than every player. And whenever you pass go, there is a 70% chance that you will land on income tax right after that, and you have to pay the same amount as you get after passing go. Just don't play this game, play the one made by Hasbro.

Would like to give a good review because its just generically decent --- but it has 2 major flaws that aren't redeemable 1. AI is absolutely garbage. They will just let you buy property to complete your set and they will accept nearly 50% the cost. 2. Multi-player is fake. You typically get 1 real player and 2 bots. The game is decided by who gets to go after the bots. Id rather wait like 2 minutes for real people than have a 20 second wait time and get only 1 other player...

Basic Business game with all the features! Perfect to enjoy alone or with friends! Try to introduce customised settings. As in changeable starting amount, banking rules etc! Also try to introduce rush play! Where certain number of cards are already bought by players at start of the game! This rush play feature will be helpful as sometimes players only have a little time and playing a normal game takes too long to complete!

At first, the game was fine.. it was fun playing it and it was perfect time buster but after few days of playing it, it disappointed me.. i was thrown out of online game (stating weak internet as reason) even though nothing was wrong with my internet, i request developers to improve in-game mechanics. Thanks for reading!!

I like this game to play with family. I want one feature to be added to this: in 'pass n play' option a feature to add remote players, that is, say, if 4 people are playing in pass and play option, other family members should be able to connect to that game in remote way ( to join remotely to that room)

All over the gameis good , but the problem is that some players when they arrive on a certain land which they cannot afford to buy (but their opponent can buy via auction) donot select option of auction and they just standbyfor their time out . Do something about this issue , eg. If a player times out then the land should should automatically be own by the opponent (if game is 2 player) or it should be auctioned between other players(for 2+ players game).

I enjoy paying this game, very well done I have some suggestions though 1. The fine for being sent to prison should be 50 and not 100. 2. After missing 3 turns and not getting the double, there should be no charge to continue the game and being released from prison. 3. When Trading the value of the offer must be much bigger, so I can see it clearly 4. During auction and I prese the button to view the table, it needs to be bright and clearly visible.

More bugs. 1) after paid off I can roll the die every time 2) I can build with zero amount when we trade and build at the same time 3) when I click done for two times then next player can't play and if I click done for three times then next two players can't play. 4) we can wait untill the time is out to not to buy the place for someone. 5) all these are seen in user's phone only but for the opponents it shows correct

The game is good, at first you lose many times but after mastering it, I won too many times and got bored and deleted it. The key is to out live your opponent. Just ensure you have at least 3 stations if not all, then have buy all utility companies and then now you can build on your land. Your rent will always be more hence making more money.

There are few things i would like to suggest: 1. when trade dialog box appears, give us the option to show board. 2. give some cut off time for disconnected players. 3. nerf mumbai a little if possible. 4. set limit on no. of turns a property can be kept mortgaged. 5. finally, try to add like voice call option. this game is really fun to play with friends, playing with voice will make it better.

Server of this game malfunctioned I have suddenly became bankrupt with having more than Rs 1000. Also one of the player is able to play with negative credit. My player was going any where without doing anything. I have lost an almost won match. Developers need to check the multiplayer server online server.

title: TikTok - Videos, Shop & LIVE
description:
TikTok is THE destination for mobile videos. On TikTok, short-form videos are exciting, spontaneous, and genuine. Whether you‚Äôre a sports fanatic, a pet enthusiast, or just looking for a laugh, there‚Äôs something for everyone on TikTok. All you have to do is watch, engage with what you like, skip what you don‚Äôt, and you‚Äôll find an endless stream of short videos that feel personalized just for you. From your morning coffee to your afternoon errands, TikTok has the videos that are guaranteed to make your day.

We make it easy for you to discover and create your own original videos by providing easy-to-use tools to view and capture your daily moments. Take your videos to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. 

‚ñ† Watch endless amount of videos customized specifically for you
A personalized video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.
 
‚ñ† Explore videos, just one scroll away
Watch all types of videos, from Comedy, Gaming, DIY, Food, Sports, Memes, and Pets, to Oddly Satisfying, ASMR, and everything in between.
 
‚ñ† Pause recording multiple times in one video
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. Shoot as many times as you need.
 
‚ñ† Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators
Millions of creators are on TikTok showcasing their incredible skills and everyday life. Let yourself be inspired.

‚ñ† Add your favorite music or sound to your videos for free
Easily edit your videos with millions of free music clips and sounds. We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, Edm, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

‚ñ† Express yourself with creative effects
Unlock tons of filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.

‚ñ† Edit your own videos 
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.

‚ñ† Discover and Shop with TikTok Shop
Explore trending products, exclusive deals, and seamless shopping experiences inspired by creators and brands you love‚Äîall in one place. Shop right from shoptab, videos or LIVEs without leaving the app, track your orders with ease, and enjoy a safe, secure shopping and transaction process.

‚ñ† Terms of Service
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

‚ñ† Privacy Policy
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

Any feedback? Contact us at feedback@tiktok.com or tweet us @tiktok_us
