summary: Join your friends and discover videos you love, only on TikTok

scraped_reviews.content: TikTok has changed. The algorithm is LAME. I see way more ads in the feed now too. If you watch one video for half a second too long, all of a sudden there are a bunch of it in the feed, but I barely see the other stuff that I actually WANT to see. The changes are horrible. *** update as of 5/22. It got better for a short time, but now it sucks again. Ads ads ads ads ads blah blah blah. This is ridiculous. Get your algorithm straight.

I dont know if it's just me, but the app has been so laggy and glitchy for weeks now. Sometimes, it'll crash and exit me out, and other times, it'll just lag so much that I dont even wanna bother with it anymore. But today, it said there's a bug in the app, and to clear the cache, I have 0 cache on tiktok, and then they said it was a problem with the app itself..

i think most of the problems of tiktok come from its community. but the app itself (for the most part) is really well-developed. i do notice bugs occasionally but it's not nearly as bad as other apps. the pushing of lives and shop items, however, is EXCESSIVE. i'll get 15 livestreams in a row, ads are like every 2 videos and there needs to be better moderation of deceptive advertising too.

I normally love this app and its creators, and I had several subscriptions.However, since they started the super fan, I cannot afford them. i keep trying to cancel them. And stop the auto renewal, but I still keep getting a charge for $8.63 and I cannot find what it's for. My card keeps declining it and Every time I put money on my card so I can use it to pay a bill tiktok takes it. Leaving me short on my bills. When you go to the part that has your subscriptions, it is covered by superfan.

I'm so tired of the music from an ad continuously playing after I close the app. I end up having to force stop it. now today I didn't even have the app open and music just started blasting from my phone. I force stopped the app and wouldn't you know the music stopped. which is what I have to do every single time it get stuck like that. make it stop!

the app itself is okay, but the "You're adding favorites too fast!" Think is absolutely unbearable. It never lasts the same amount of time, and even when it goes away, it comes back after five or so videos. it'd be better just to remove the "feature" altogether because there is no reason that I'd have to wait 3 days just to add a favorite. the feedback doesn't help either because there is no way to get rid of it after you have it.

I am so sick of TT getting stuck on a video and despite moving onto another video and closing the app the sound continues to play! I can close the app and lock my phone and the sound will continue to play. If I reopen the app new videos will be playing but the sound continues to play overlapped. Also, the "more" button in the comments is in a terrible location as well as the "find similar". Please fix these issues.

It's GREAT but it's been lagging a lot, it won't even let me play tiktoks, it's like it's paused, and it also won't let me hear the audio the vid is playing. PLS fix this soon (EDIT) IT'S WORKING AGAIN!! I'm guessing it was just a bug, but it's working again, so that's all that matters!!

This is ridiculous! This app doesn't even utilise the coins properly. If you're a gifter, you would have noticed that the price for 700 coins was ¬£8.99. The very next day, they reduced the price and the amount of coins to 360 for just ¬£8.09. It seems like they just want to make a quick profit off me. I'm paying attention; I've been closely monitoring all the prices on your page.

For a month now, maybe a little longer, I haven't been able to use this app. I open it, it acts like it's going to show me a video, quickly puts another one on instead, and then crashes altogether. I have done everything the developers suggested, numerous times. Nothing has helped and I get a generic response when I email support. I was able to use tiktok lite for a few weeks but as of this morning I can no longer use it, either. It says my region is restricted all of a sudden. Frustrating.

It wouldn't let me put in a nickname because my editing was "too fast." Edit: When I was changing my profile picture, the minimum image size is 250x250, but when I try putting in a 250x250 image, the app says that the image size is too small. Edit: i reinstalled the app just to get flipped off by the username part saying "connect to the internet and try again" even though I have fast, running internet connected to my phone. Fix your app!

The guidelines. I was permanently banned without ever receiving a reason or a warning. it might've been because of an art drop I posted, and one of the characters I posted had a bit of her chest showing (she was fully clothed w no actual bits shown). I wasn't given a reason or a warning beforehand so I could have a chance to take down the photo. And now I can't even make a new account. But I'm just annoyed because people have posted even worse things, and they're still on the app.

It's been a great app! I have so many recipes I've saved, I've learned a lot from the different accounts on TikTok. However, in the last month or so, there have been really odd glitches, mainly tied to ads for a jewelry company, moderngents. It makes the app freeze, whatever sound was playing in the previous video now won't stop, even when the app is closed/force closed. I've had to reinstall TikTok at least three times in the last 2-3 weeks and it's still glitching from this ad.

My main complaint has been, and still is, is that the quality of videos or photos go down a ridiculous amount when posted! I like to post my art, and the fact that it looks so horrible once posted is extremely disappointing. The ads are also getting a little ridiculous, but whatever, I can deal with that. I'd just like my photos and videos to have the same quality they're created with when they're posted.

Lately (the whole June), I was experiencing some glitches. For example, i'm searching for a video in the "search", watch different videos, and the audio is being taken from there and played multiple times, even if i exit the app and delete this fold. All I have to do is restart the phone at this point. It happened already 5 times. Please do something about it.

Would love to give a higher rating if the app can stop crashing on itself every time I try to open it, recently. I restart my phone and the issue persists. Only thing that actually fixes the problem (temporarily) is to uninstall and redownload the app. It's not constant, either. Update: It's been over 2 months and the app STILL crashes when I try to open it. TikTok is garbage. Don't bother installing this trash until they actually decide to fix it.

I don't know what is happening but TikTok will not let me like anything. Every time I try liking a video or a post, it takes my like away and tells me "You're tapping too fast. Take a break!" And I've been off my phone for hours and it will say that. I've tried everything from deleting and reinstalling, to clearing cache but nothing is working.

the app itself is whatever- it's gone down a bit in quality with the fyp but the new AI bot (tiktok tako) is so unnecessary and annoying where I can't stand it. It's right where I put my thumb to scroll sometimes and I am constantly accidentally clicking on it, plus there's no way to get rid of it while you're watching videos. I don't see any use of the bot either, its just another way to add unneeded ai in the app. please just make an option to hide it at least on the front page.

Please have the option to block ourselves from accidentally sharing videos to others when we hold down on a video!!!!! The privacy settings have changed, blocking direct messages in the privacy settings is now gone as of June, and I can no longer prevent accidentally sharing tiktoks from happening. Had a few months of not doing this until June update. Awful feature.

app has become extremely laggy all of a sudden. the side menu for like, comment share etc doesn't show most of the time. and if it does show it doesn't work - pressing the buttons does nothing. no liking, no commenting. if I delete cache, uninstall, restart and reinstall Tiktok it works perfectly for the first use. but any time I reopen it after that it goes back to being weird.

MOST INFURIATING APP! It randomly started wanting me to verify my e-mail (no e-mails have shown up) and won't let me use the app until I do...I tried using my phone number, but it says that number is already in use. It's MY freaking number! I was using an account for crafting and made a second one to do history stuff...deleted that account hoping it would help and it only did for a minute. WORST APP EVER! DO NOT USE!

Waste of an App. Account made over a month ago and still cannot follow accounts or like any content. The algorithm is supposed to be good, especially for small businesses and streamers, but it's not possible to use. I've tried multiple different things including clearing cache and storage, logging out and in, deleting the app, signing in on another device etc. Nothing works. Never had an issue like this with any other app.

hi, so i have a complaint to make. I got a new phone (and maybe it's because of that!) but now whenever i try to film a video the playback speeds up the first second, then immediately slows it down and only after that it goes back to it's normal speed. When i upload the video it cuts off some part from the end of the vid. Honestly it's annoying and i hope it's fixable. Thanks you kiss kiss

On the tablet, my comments keep going to older random videos I watched in the last 10 mins, not the video I actually commented under. It may also just say "Couldn't post a comment". In addition, the activity centre just went missing today, so when my comment goes somewhere random, I can't even find where. Me saying "That's so funny" could end up on a terminally I'll person's video.

TikTok has started making my phone unusable, and until it's fixed, I'm not reinstalling. My phone would start heating up like CRAZY, and everything would become slow and unresponsive, INCLUDING the built-in Samsung keyboard and settings app. It took restarting in safe mode and manually force stopping TikTok to get my phone in a usable state, and the problems only started up again as soon as I tried using the app; taking forever to load. Tried to redownload it, and the overheating started again.

For the last 1-2 weeks, my FYP has been acting up, showing me videos in languages that I cannot understand (most often Russian, Arabic, and Spanish). I have done nothing to change my algorithm. It's gotten to be around 6 out of every 10 videos will be this way. Hitting "Not Interested" does nothing to help and Support has been a total joke and useless - even when I do everything they say to the letter. I don't mind videos in other languages, but not to the point where I can't watch anything.

This app has become borderline unusable over the last week. Constant freezing in videos, constant freezing between videos, insane lag on everything, and I am now always getting "this app isn't responding, close or wait" errors, and if you click "wait" the error comes back one second later. Idk what's going on but it keeps getting worse every single day.

Perfect until I could no longer follow people. Have used this app for years and loved it - then one day I just couldn't follow any accounts at all. Tried everything recommended but nothing worked - send 2 tickets to the support team but never heard anything back and it's been months. Tried to make a brand new account and the issue was still happening! On a brand new account. No one is getting back to me, still can't follow anyone so really disappointed with the service.

for some reason while I'm watching videos in my "following," the app pulls down the stories/lives tab at the top. when i try to swipe the tab away, it will refresh my page. "following" always gets a glitch where no video plays, only sound, as well. stop trying to bully me into using the FYP, TikTok! I'm not interested!

Update Oct. 10: captions not working and unable to adjust clips. I've basically stopped posting bc this app is so awful to use. The entire point is to make/edit videos & you literally can not. As of today I am no longer able to edit or save changes in the app. It's insane. I have spent all morning trying to make a 90 second video. Cleared cache, restarted, etc etc this is incredibly frustrating.

They should have the option to block certain sounds because no matter how many times I click that I'm not interested in videos with the sound, I still get videos with the same sound constantly. It's incredibly frustrating. If I hear Anxiety by Doechii again, after clicking not interested on the sound for the 30th time, I'm gonna crash out.

Keeps making me follow random people. I only followed about 60 or so accounts but every time I open the app there are an additional 100-200 people I never followed and have never seen before. Absolutely ridiculous. Truly stupid if you think that is a good feature to have on an algorithm-based app. Do not download this because it will only frustrate you.

App is super buggy right now. Constantly locks up while scrolling, and then keeps looping audio even after you kill the app. Sometimes it'll even start playing the audio again after it's stopped and you've closed the app. Get the, 'this app is taking a long time' prompt often. Borderline unusable. No one is going to have to ban TT is this keeps up, because it actively punishes you for watching.

It's a very good app and most of it is perfect. But sometimes it logs you out of all your accounts and you need to log back in each one. And another thing is sometimes comment don't show up in your notifications. e.g someone replies to your comment but it doesn't appear in your notifications

So many issues with this app. Videos won't load, making me force close the app. Once I reopen it works again for awhile. Also I'll switch videos or even foce close the app and it will continue playing the noise from the video. Have had to restart phone to stop. It's not a network or Internet issue, full wifi or cell signal and it still does these things.

Usually happy with it but have lost auto-generated captions on videos. I would rely on it to watch. I deleted and reinstalled the app and still missing. I asked for a support in the app and there hasn't been a reply as yet. Update: Months later and still nothing has changed. Seems to only be Google Pixels effected.

Overall good, some constant issues with loading. Sometimes the comment section won't load at all and sometimes opening a comment thread would load forever and then not load. It's also annoying how you can't block certain sounds, I hate hearing Love You So and not having a complete option to block it. Simply putting "not interested" in the video with the sound is not enough tiktok.

Direct issues: - Randomly deciding that I don't have internet despite loading new videos and letting me read comments, so I can't like, fave or share things until closing the app or manually disconnecting and reconnecting to the net. positive: Much better algorithm and more things I actually want on my fyp. negative: I really don't want to see lives, they don't engage me and make me more inclined to close the app when I see several in a row.

I'm having a similar issue then other users where videos and live streams glitch and lag. It's actually frustrating and then to get inundated with ads of TikTok shop products and apps for minute long storys that you end up having to spend money to continue. I sometimes get repeat ads as well and no matter how much I report that it's repetitive or not relevant I still end up getting the ad again.

There's serious issues since this last update. So far, there is no resolution. The comment filter page comes up blank as well as the support page. The only way I can get into it is uninstalling and reinstalling the app. It's a 1 time deal, too! I literally have to do this every time to see the pages. Then they vanish again. I have to repeat this every time. It's really annoying that it's not being addressed. In addition, the activity page is totally blank as well.

Don't know if it's just me but every time I open the app it crashes now! I can't even watch the first video that pops up, I get halfway, and then it kicks me out!!! I've tried fixing it, thinking that maybe it's my phone and storage, but the more reviews I see, the more I've realized that it's just the app in general! It's working horribly! Hoping y'all fix this, but I don't even know if y'all check y'alls reviews at all. If you do, please fix this! It used to be a really cool app to use.

insanely frustrated right now. half the time I use the app I can't like/repost videos because I'm not connected to wifi, even though I am connected. I keep the app updated and tried to restart the app/my phone and still can't repost??? I shouldn't have to constantly uninstall and reinstall/log out and log back into your app just to make the basic features functional üôÑ

I really like it but my sister and I keep having problems where the app won't open. I've tried opening it from the app store, Google, from links, I've cleared cache and restarted my phone, and the only way to get it to work is by uninstalling which is a pain because I have to log in again and I lose all of my drafts every time. It happens after every update and now I have to uninstall and install again üòï

(Edit) Things have gotten much better now on my FYP. It's starting to look like as it was back in 2021 with things I actually like. Occasionally, it shows others minor inconveniences like those from other countries, or even weird trends but it's bearable. After tapping on not interested, those types of clips rarely shows up. So good on ya
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey there! Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We're glad you're enjoying your experience!

scraped_reviews.content: Layout is confusing, TikTok shop is annoying and lags the entire app, and the content flagging system is ridiculous in DMs. I can't send hardly anything (even things like "Great video!") without it being flagged. Slideshows straight up don't load half of the time. Customer support is garbage. Editor is laggy. This app used to be decent, but it's really declined in the last few months.

I don't know how tiktok does it but the algorithm it creates for me specifically is the best thing. Instagram sucks, I stopped using it back in 2020 when I started noticing a bunch of scamy things on there, and facebook also sucks. Both of these apps are very close minded only allowing you to see minimal content and it doesn't connect you to current events. While tiktok on the other hand updates almost immediately with current events all over the world. Such an amazing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the amazing review! We love hearing about your experience and appreciate you taking the time to review us!

scraped_reviews.content: good content, ridiculous interface. add a mute button. make the "more" caption option actually clickable. fast forward depends on a micro millimetre or you just end up with the menu in your face. as an epileptic, I do appreciate the "restrict flash content" option. only reason I'm adding an extra star to this review.

More and more, this app has just become filled with hate-speech of all kinds. Racism, trans phobia, homophobia, ableism, etc. There's absolutely no moderation or control, and it's an embarrassment to any modern social media. I've seen people inciting violence, spreading misinformation, using slurs, attacking cultures and ethnicities, and more. If there's no improvement, I can't imagine I'll be using this app much longer, and I couldn't recommend it to anyone.

Being released for so long I was amazed how bad it was. The auto mute videos doesn't always work. There is no option to disable auto play, the majority of videos were trash so I really don't need to see them automatically playing. The privacy settings by default are super week and you need to spend time setting it up. It constantly wants your phone number to sell your details. Overall not something I'll spend that long using. Huge amount of scam or illegal material all over the app.

It's GREAT but it's been lagging a lot, it won't even let me play tiktoks, it's like it's paused, and it also won't let me hear the audio the vid is playing. PLS fix this soon (EDIT) IT'S WORKING AGAIN!! I'm guessing it was just a bug, but it's working again, so that's all that matters!

title: DANA Indonesia Digital Wallet
description:
It‚Äôs time to skip the hassle of any transactions with DANA. Proven #BukanDompetBiasa, DANA enables you to navigate the modern world of cashless and card-less transactions with safe & secure. Making it easier for you to transact, from scanning QRIS, sending money to bank accounts such as BCA, BRI, BNI, mandiri & more, to topping up e-wallet balance like GoPay, OVO & ShopeePay balance, as well as saving your bank cards in the app & use the saved bank cards for any transactions.

Free DANA Balance Top Up
No more worrying about admin fees when you want to top up your DANA Balance. Every penny you top up goes straight into your balance. No hidden fees, no surprises.

Send Money Without Admin Fees
Let‚Äôs make money transfers a breeze! You can send money to other users or BCA, BRI, BNI, mandiri & other bank accounts within seconds with 0 admin fees. Skip the hassle of changing apps, you can do it all in DANA! 

Scan QRIS Easily at Any Merchants
Make your QRIS transactions easier & more secure by scanning the QRIS with DANA at your favourite merchants. You can choose to pay your QRIS transaction either with your DANA Balance or your bank cards in the app. It's time for secure & hassle-free QRIS transactions.

Pay with Bank Cards 
Say goodbye to the hassle of carrying a bulky wallet! Save your bank cards to the app and embrace a world of effortless & secure transactions by using the saved bank cards for easier payment. 

Easier Mobile Recharge Purchases & Bill Payments
With DANA, you‚Äôre always in control of your communication needs & bill payments. Choose a wide range of mobile service providers with secured and make bill payments faster & easier with just the tap of your finger.

Top Up e-Wallet Balance with Minimal Fees
Top up your other e-wallet balance such as GoPay, OVO & ShopeePay with the lowest admin fee. You can save more while enjoying the convenience of an e-wallet with safe & secure. 

Safer Transaction with DANA Protection 
Transact worry-free with DANA‚Äôs layered security: Secure verification process, 24/7 DANA Customer Care & 100% money-back guarantee. DANA is also supervised by Bank Indonesia and Kominfo.

Check Out the Latest Information
Follow DANA‚Äôs social media to find out more about the latest features & promotions: Instagram (@dana.id), Twitter (@danawallet) & Facebook (DANA Indonesia).

scraped_reviews.content: Very disappointing. I intended to report and request a solution for a transaction I did not make to customer service, but after a month there has been no solution. Let alone a solution‚Äîthere hasn‚Äôt even been any processing. I have emailed repeatedly and sent messages via Instagram and X DMs, but the response has been extremely slow.

Don't worry, our team is ready to assist you further. Every DANA transaction is protected by DANA Protection with a 100% money-back guarantee if the T&C are met. Thanks-FD-

Regarding the issue when accessing the A+ Rewards feature in the DANA app, please try closing and reopening the DANA app, and clearing the cache in your phone's settings to make the app more stable. However, if the issue persists, please contact DIANA on the Me menu in the DANA app.Thx-AR-

scraped_reviews.content: lately this app has been hogging all my battery usage and has been increasing the temperature of my phone

TERRIBLE! this is unacceptable! I made a transfer, and my balance has been deducted. The transaction is marked as successful, but the funds did not reach the account. I've already complained through diana, instagram, the call center, and email, but there has been no response. Now, my account has suddenly logged out, and I can‚Äôt log back in! I‚Äôm extremely disappointed. What is going on?!

Just made a new account and transfer my money from the bank to this untrusty app then few minutes later someone got access to my account and took 16 ribu. How come this app so trustable? Not even close. Diana isn't helping, cant even communicate to the CS. Very disappointing creation of an app. Do better, Dana. You lost one trust today.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sis, we apologize for the inconvenience. Regarding your missing balance complaint, if you've already filed a report, please share your report number via DM/Inbox on our official social media accounts: Instagram: @dana.id (Blue Tick) Twitter/X: @danawallet (Gold Tick) Facebook: @DANA (Blue Tick) We'll help you through to the end. Thx -IR-

scraped_reviews.content: I couldn't use the app after updating. Hence I uninstalled from Play Store then reinstalled from Vivo Store. Yet it still crash! Please fix it~ I need this app badly. Thank you. EDIT: reinstalled again from Play Store. Can log in up until the front page, the FORCED CLOSE. I still can do nothing! ANOTHER EDIT: gave another star because you responded. Anyway my connection is superb cause I'm using Halo. Still forced close on the front page, but other pages were totally fine. Weird!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Kiki, we understand your concern. Regarding the issue of not being able to download the DANA app, to ensure a smoother download, please ensure your internet connection is stable, your phone has sufficient storage, and your phone supports the DANA app. Then, restart your phone. After that, re-download the DANA app from the Play Store. Thanks -IK-

scraped_reviews.content: Been using the app for a while & it went just fine, until last week when I stopped receiving cashback for all my transactions. I raised the issue to CS thru email & call center, they said that I've violated the T&C by logging in other device, tho I never did that. I asked them the details of this, but they couldn't. And the only solution they offered is for me to make more transactions thru DANA so the system will automatically detect that my acc is eligible for the promo. I mean...?!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Levina, thank you for reaching us. We like to inform you, right now you issue are still handling by our related team. Please to keep wait and all the update will be inform by email. Thanks -GA-

scraped_reviews.content: TERRIBLE! I've spent 30 minute to do a simple payment to my friend, and in the end it just displays "unknown system error"! Yeah, if you developers don't know the error, how about us? Please fix that problem. The application was so sluggish. To be honest, I run this app on an android flagship phone. The super ultra slow UI is just unacceptable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi There, kindly send the detail of your issues to our e-mail at help@dana.id. Don't forget to provide us your phone number registered in DANA app as well as the screenshot of your transaction. Tks -ST-

scraped_reviews.content: Hi! im from malaysia.. i want to verify my account but cannot its say coming soon/upcoming feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Ghostmane, we apologize for the issue with your DANA account verification. For further assistance, please send us the notification details via the gold-checked Twitter DM (X) or our official Facebook Inbox (blue-checked). Thanks -NA-

scraped_reviews.content: too much trouble üòµ‚Äçüí´ update 22 August 2025 : Overall good app, transactions are smooth so I give 4 stars. But please fix the token number display ‚Äî when I use MiSans font on my Xiaomi device, the numbers are cut off and hard to read. Hope this can be improved
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Mohon maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Terkait keluhan dan saran, kamu dapat menghubungi DIANA (asisten digital DANA) melalui halaman 'History/Riwayat' atau 'Me/Saya' pada aplikasi DANA. Selain itu, kamu juga dapat menghubungi Customer Care kami melalui email help@dana.id atau Call Center 1500445.
DANA senantiasa membantu pengguna setia kami. Semog...

scraped_reviews.content: i take back what i said. well, ui is still nice. but what the hell with the topup fee? i still use this app cause no top up fee (yes, I'm that petty) i know about the fee if we top up under 50k. but now suddenly there's a fee for above 50k? what... the.. hell......... and you guys need to update that description in"about this app". you still say "no top up fee" (again, i am that petty, i don't care). you're just basically lying to people if you say that. top up using livin mandiri
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. Regarding top-up fees, we would like to inform you that an admin fee of Rp 1,500 will be charged if you top up repeatedly. If you wish to avoid the admin fee, please use a bank card saved in DANA for top-ups. Thanks -VP-

title: The Guardian - US & World News
description:
Get fearless, independent journalism from the United States and the world with the Guardian app. Never miss breaking news, dive into diverse opinion pieces, and follow stories minute-by-minute with our dynamic live blogs - from world news and politics to business and sport. Get the following app exclusive features:
Your news, your way: A redesigned My Guardian tab allows you to follow topics that matter to you.

Your news, now hands-free:  All our award-winning podcasts are available via a dedicated podcast tab, allowing easier discovery via our new in-app audio player. You can also listen to all articles via a new enhanced text-to-speech facility. 

Upgrade your downtime with Guardian puzzles: A hub featuring our most popular games, including On the ball, Film reveal, Word wheel, Wordiply and Sudoku.  

The Guardian news app is free to download and offers you a beautiful, intuitive mobile experience ‚Äì so you can read, watch and listen to our independent reporting whenever and wherever it suits you.

Readers have a limited number of articles, which refreshes on a regular basis. If you‚Äôre a regular reader, you might consider subscribing. Subscribing gives you full access to Guardian articles in our app, so you can read quality, international journalism with no restrictions.

And, when you subscribe, you‚Äôll unlock:

Unlimited reading in the app, with no subscription messages
Ad-free reading, for an uninterrupted experience
Offline reading ‚Äì download articles to explore on the go

What‚Äôs more, subscribing to our news app is a great way to show your support for fearless, independent Guardian journalism. As a reader-funded news organisation, we rely on your funding to power our future. Thank you.

All content in the Guardian app is copyright Guardian News & Media 2025. All rights reserved.

Our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply when accessing content via the Guardian app.

Privacy Policy: http://www.theguardian.com/help/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: http://www.theguardian.com/help/terms-of-service

If you subscribe to the Guardian app, our subscription terms will also apply https://www.theguardian.com/info/2023/feb/24/the-guardian-news-app-terms-conditions. Your subscription will auto renew and you will be charged before the next renewal date unless you cancel.

summary: Independent global news, opinion and analysis, sport, podcasts and puzzles

scraped_reviews.content: Mind you, the app gets three stars, while The Guardian itself deserves five. That said, I'm a monthly subscriber, yet the app imposes a limit on the number of articles I can read. I never bump up against a limit when using a browser, so I'm uninstalling the app and going back to the browser. I never could see what the advantages of the app are supposed to be. It's slick-looking, but that's about it.

I like most of the app. I wish "Listen" could choose voices. I vastly prefer British voices. Big annoyance - the app doesn't stay open like other apps. When (in Android) I click the lower-left corner button to show all open apps, The Guardian app doesn't show up. So I always have to go back to the app shortcut every time I want to switch between apps and get back to it. If I'm in the middle of an article and I flip portrait to landscape accidentally, it puts me back to the top or the article.

Not better than web. The interface is fine, but I can't open articles in new tabs, and signing in is a little clunky. I'll just use the web version, which is already pretty nice in mobile. (Similar for the daily version; I can't really tell what the benefit would be, and sign in didn't sync between them so I'd have to find and enter my digital subscriber ID again.) Plus, I'm always annoyed by a prompt to review (though I appreciated the explicit questions about notifications when setting up).

The content is mostly good. Some of the opinion pieces are very suspect though. $10 per month is not worth it though. Time to move on after the pay wall... Ads not enough anymore? As much as you can opt out of tracking, the trackers are still there. I'm not sure how that works. Stick to the browser if you want to read news and protect yourself from the trackers through your browser.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. The move to a metered app is an evolution of our long-standing approach to having a paid-for version of our news app, alongside provision of free access. Guardian journalism will remain entirely free and open to all on the web, regardless of readers‚Äô ability to pay.

scraped_reviews.content: Update--everything was fine until I logged in. Now, when I open the app, it freezes and I have to force quit I very often get news before I hear it in the U. S. Media. I love the in depth stories that The Guardian provides. The app is good but has some odd issues. It doesn't always keep me signed in, even when I don't sign out. Also, I get story emails and it doesn't give me an option to open them in the app. The listings in my categories are often less than on the website

The app doesn't get in the way of reading the news, and in fact makes it quite convenient to do so. Smooth, quick. Plus, the Guardian is a really good paper, one that not only reports on a lot of events but also very significantly keeps What Happened in one article and What I Think About It in a separate one. Recipes and other human-interest pieces are generally very interesting and well written, and provide links for further research and primary sources (e.g. Lancet) where applicable.

Well ever since the AP's app shot itself in both feet, I've been using the Guardian's and so far mostly everything seems fine with the transition. One very annoying thing though is in the main list of articles, there'll be something in a headline that is nowhere to be found in the actual article. Kind of frustrating to be lured into reading something when the actual subject matter doesn't exist. Please stop posting headlines with no articles to back them up, it's a very annoying waste of my time

I've been using the Guardian App for a long time, going back to the days when I had a Windows phone. Top-notch reporting, deep dives (long reads), football updates, and recipes for food and drink. You cannot find a better app out there; it runs smooth and in the info is presented in a clean, sleek manner. I've even been a paying customer (approx. $7/mo) for about two and a half years because I greatly value the Guardian. Highly, highly, highly recommend.

This is the first time I've been moved to review. I'm on multiple media/social media forums, and this is the first one I Could. Not. Figure. Out, in the app nor the desktop site. It's anti-intuitive, disorganized, and redundant. Also, as a print journalist displaced by the economy, I thought I'd never say this -- but the constant attempts to get me to pay for a subscription are INSANE. I GET that journalism isn't free! But it's not possible for me TODAY and it won't stop. Uninstalling.

Good journalism, Horrible application. I created a profile. I signed in and marked several articles "Saved for Later". I could view these articles until I signed out and signed back in. All the saved articles disappeared when I logged in again. Also when I sign in with the same profile on multiple devices, none of the settings synchronize and neither do the saved articles. Aside from the horrible bugs, I find the design and navigation of the app very poor.

I would like to participate in the comment section for some articles. This requires that my email be verified. The problem is that whenever I am prompted to verify my email, and accept the prompt, the app crashes. Every time. This is very annoying to me, but otherwise, the app is my favorite news app of all time, in terms of presentation.

Love the Guardian, not thrilled with the app. Trying to scroll up often ends up with the article scrolling right or left so while you started reading one thing, suddenly, you are in a completely different story. It is frustrating bordering on infuriating. So much so I am considering deleting the app altogether and just waiting until I am on my computer.

I pay for this news app because of the journalism. What irritates me is that like some other news apps, it is becoming more cluttered and chaotic. I might discontinue paying for it if this doesn't improve. Update-----I stopped paying for this app, was paying at the rate of $60 a year. I'm tired of being told "You've run out of your allotment of articles to read." I like the journalism, I don't like the stingy terms.

I read 1-2 articles a day, but its not my major news source. The app limits how many articles you can read before you have to pay. $10 a month is way too much, so I don't pay anything. Maybe I'll look at the article from another device, or just don't use Guardian for the rest of the month. If there was a lower cost subscription, I would likely subscribe Otherwise the apps headlines are difficult to read and the layout doesn't work well on some devices with certain orientations

Balanced, well-researched, and insightful news, commentary, and investigative journalism. No hesitation spending money on a subscription to support this excellent work, even though they offer the content for free. Journalism of this quality is rare these days, and must be supported. I've had no problems with the app - it works well and is easy to navigate.

Dark theme already? If had that, and could block sections not read from downloading, a 5 star. That said, a solid global reporting experience; the app itself is getting better all the time. So far, accurate news I can verify externally. Free access to generally excellent, in depth reporting, but worth the subscription. Features: offline reading, suggested related articles. Ok you got me :I'm buying a subscription.

Permissions, permissions - somehow I feel we have a fundamental failure from many developers to appreciate user perspectives on what a phone app should be. Having a technical potential to do something in an app is not a reason to do it. Are people clamoring for social-networking functions in news apps, beyond basic linking or quotation? I have heard no such thing. If you have daily user requests to track user habits, maybe you have done the right things with this Guardian app. If not, not.

Poor job of explaining subscription options. The paper is a good read. Problem is I bought a 6 month subscription but it only works on Android. I learned of the "10 pack" digital subscription that allows me to read on up to 10 devices only after I made an email inquiry and my initial subscription was fulfilled. I was hoping to read my premium suwon my iPad. There was no option in the android store. Big oversight when newspapers are dying from low revenue.

UI since the redesign is poor. No customization and having the featured items at the top is terrible. It may work on the printed page or widescreen web page, but sucks on mobile. Now I can't even log in to my account, the app crashes as soon as I get past the password. I'm going to uninstall and stick to using the mobile browser for a while.

I suspect that the 1 star reviews can be attributed to the far right. I just downloaded the app. It is incredibly easy to use, showing article headlines with the first sentence or 2 as I scroll down. None of my information has been requested from me. No special permissions were required. I don't even have ANY subscriptions. Something stinks and it sure isn't the Guardian.

Offline reading experience is terrible - PLEASE fix this! I guess maybe this is considered a niche feature these days, but when offline, when you click any article the screen just goes blank for 10-15 seconds, and you have to wait to see if it's downloaded or not. Surely the whole point of download for offline reading is that it should happen immediately! You must have a lot of people reading on the tube in London who want this fixed!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for reaching out and sharing your thoughts on the Guardian app, we genuinely appreciate it.
I've passed your message along to our development team, and I‚Äôm confident they‚Äôll review it carefully as we continue to enhance the app.
Thank you again, and please keep an eye out for future updates.

scraped_reviews.content: Poor. Recently the screen goes blank whenever I try to scroll upwards. Needless to say, this makes using the app frustrating. Support says "This issue is something our developers are aware of and are investigating. Hopefully, we'll be able to fix this issue soon. You may be able to get around this bug by completely closing the app and reopening it." That didn't work. UPDATE: Still not working properly. Yet they're happy to take my subscription money. Hoping to fix it doesn't instill confidence.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We understand your frustration and sincerely apologise that the app quality did not meet your expectations. We are treating this issue as a priority, but we currently lack an estimated time for the fix. Thank you for your patience; we regret this inconvenience.

scraped_reviews.content: Since the 27/10/25 update, the app hasn't been working smoothly on my Samsung SM-X210 Tablet. An example are the live feeds such as UK Politics Live or Europe Live - you get the news feed for a fraction of a second and then the screen goes blank and you have to scroll down to see the feed again, after which it becomes quite unstable as you scroll through the feed. I have tried reinstalling the app and clearing the cache, but nothing improves. Disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry to hear this. Please get in touch with us via the app using the form in the Help section, or you can contact us at apps.feedback@guardian.co.uk, and we will try to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Good app, easy to use. Most importantly the journalism is very good and not right-wing biased like other newspapers. Update: Nov 2025 There is an annoying bug in the current version of this app on android where the screen goes blank when you scroll the text of an article upwards. The article reappears when you scroll it downwards. Please fix.

The recent changes to this app now mean that at last I can view the entirety of the content using TalkBack, and I find this now works verry well. I find the adverts unintrusive and I don't necessarily mind as I'm what is considered to be your clasic Guardian reader. The app is verry easy to use, and the content is "First Class", and the journalism and opinion is the "Gold standard".

Have had and enjoyed the app for years but the latest version is mostly white screen and frustrating beyond measure. As a fast reader it seems there is more time looking at white screens or fleeting images of a page than being able to ready steadily through articles as was the case in the past. I've tried all the fixes and it's still an issue. What are the developers doing to remedy it?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We sincerely apologise for your poor experience; we fully understand your frustration and regret the quality issue. This is a high priority for our team, but we unfortunately have no estimated fix time. Thank you for your patience while we resolve this problem.

scraped_reviews.content: Also having issues with the app with some content. Clicking some links opens a white screen and text only appears when I scroll down. Scrolling up can cause the screen to go blank, makes reading live feeds and minute by minute commentaries very difficult.

Loyal reader here, but the subscription model is incoherent. One price for app subscription through Google Play and a different price for "full digital access". My subscription to the app was titled "Premium tier", and yet logging into the website resulted in being told I either needed to have advertising or pay an additional ¬£5 per month for a "Guardian Lite" subscription. Instead, I've unsubscribed entirely. Note that reviews that mention subscription fees are never responded to.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Matt, Please accept my sincere apologies, a number of users have been in touch to report similar problems. If you could please bear with us a little longer as we have identified a third-party issue on Huawei phones and we are looking to release a temporary fix that is currently being tested in the beta.

scraped_reviews.content: Now the go-to news source for Australia. Or it was from 2016 to 2025. But some time around August, the app stopped working and kept asking for more money. Eventually, after weeks of angst, I decided to update my subscription and paid more. Maybe this was the point and they just omitted to tell me that the subscription had increased. That's fine. But now I cannot get the app to work on my phone or my tablet because they want a Subscriber ID and that is nowhere to be found. Not good enough.

I just left The Times app as it was getting really boring and thin on the whole. Headlines would take me to another story altogether sometimes. Was getting my main news from my fave You Tube pundits. Started back on the Guardian after 6 years off it and I'm thrilled at how much better it is. I subscribed after my free article limit was up as I think it's well worth it. Great and varied journalism. Improved interactivity. Thanks v much.

They have increased the price but Google play won't let me cancel it. when I try to see the subscription info it gives me an error message. Also I pay a subscription to Google play but it only covers my phone, I still get them begging for money every time I try to read on my laptop regardless of how much they are fleecing me for on Google play.

Addition of autoplaying videos on the main page is horrible. It wouldn't be so bad if there were a setting to toggle them off completely, or if the app remembered videos that I've already stopped from playing, but each time I open the app, the same videos start again üò§. I don't subscribe to a newspaper for video; if I wanted that, there are many more sources adapted for that form of media. Please stick to what you do best - print journalism.

the headings page opens, but when I click on a story it does not open the full item. if I swipe left it shows the next item fleetingly, then it disappears. I have cleared my cache and have lots of memory and no.problem with other apps.

The app seems to be be stuck in dark theme, inherited from system settings. I used to have the Guardian app in light theme while Android was dark. 31 Oct: thanks for getting back to me. However, it would be nice to have a theme option within the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for getting in touch, and sorry to hear you are having issues with the app.
Dark mode on Android is now taken for the device system settings, so please take a look there. In the meantime, apologies for any inconvenience this has caused you.

scraped_reviews.content: poor. Screen goes black every time I open or scroll up an article which makes it very painful to use. despite being a subscriber and reporting the problem, I've only been asked to restart my phone (didn't work) and no further response.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I‚Äôm sorry the app hasn‚Äôt met your expectations, and we appreciate your feedback. Please contact us via Help ‚Üí Contact us in the app. This sends diagnostic details that help us identify and resolve the issue. We take all reports seriously and will do our best to get this resolved quickly.

scraped_reviews.content: I love the guardian but I cannot afford to subscribe to it. unlike all the other major news apps, it doesn't seem interested in offering discounts of any kind. I think about 5 years ago I got it for $60 or so for a year. that was the last time I found any kind of deal. it seems like it would be better for the guardian to have many thousands paying $5 a month than paying nothing as non-subscribers. But what do I know? Reluctantly, uninstalling..

For months I've had a issue where pages don't load at all until I attempt to scroll the content that I can't actually see. Finally got around to report it as a bug and was told it was long known about but not fixed yet. I'm struggling to understand how that can be left unfixed for so long on an expensive subscription app. Really poor. Renders the experience borderline unusable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Iain, we sincerely regret your issue. Please could you report this via the app's Help section or email apps.feedback@guardian.co.uk. Kindly mark the subject: "For App Support Team" to ensure rapid investigation. Thank you for your patience.

scraped_reviews.content: Quick crossword doesn't show properly on my phone. only the grid shows, the clues not. My phone is a OnePlus open, foldable phone. I can't access the puzzles unless this is fixed.

The app is very usable and I like being able to read in dark mode. Headline stories often appear to hang when you click on the link, which is frustrating. I have found out now that you need to click and then scroll down to see the article. At least I can read the articles, but I don't think the app is meant to work this way.

Can't even open daily summaries with headlines, the app keeps saying you've reached your monthly limit! I donate to the Guardian what I can but not that it is considered a "subscription". Pretty sad, using the good ol' browser instead... üòû

Great until they changed the free crossword format! I think I've subscribed to two Guardian apps by mistake - lacking delineation? Writing too small in new version when viewed on tablet. Nobodys perfect . . .
I downloaded this app for the puzzles, but they only work with a solid internet connection so it's no use to me. If I have internet I can just visit the website.

I love the application and the Guardian, but am extremely disappointed that in spite of paying ¬£11 a month subscription, that when logging in via a browser, I'm am asked to pay more to reject cookies and to get rid of the nagging screens.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thank you for reaching out to us. We sincerely apologise for the negative experience you are having with your subscription to The Guardian app.
Please get in touch with us at subscriptions@theguardian.com, and we will be happy to investigate the issue.
Thank you for your patience and continued support of The Guardian app.

scraped_reviews.content: Latest update opens article to blank window, only when scrolling it becomes visible (but top image remains cut). Please fix. Content, on the other side, remains top notch. Congratulations on that side.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
We‚Äôre aware of the issue: when scrolling through some articles, the screen gets cut off. This has been passed this on to our development team, who are investigating the problem.
In the meantime, I‚Äôm sorry for any inconvenience this may cause you, but please look out for future releases.

scraped_reviews.content: Even with the ad supported version of their app there's a hard limit on the number of articles you can read a month. No such limit of reading via website. I've reached it in 2 days of very light browsing. I used to subscribe but recent changes altered that. New version of the app is also a massive step backwards in usability.

Updated...lost a star. Crosswords won't open in the app. I've done the clear cache and uninstall/reinstall fix, to no avail. I've also noted a $ difference between subscribing via GooglePlay and directly with the Guardian.

Thank the Lord for the Guardian as a beacon of sanity in today's world. However there seems to be an Android 10 issue, the app goes into paroxysms if you read an article then click 'home'. Only way to fix it is to restart the phone. Nasty bug.

Having changed phone at about the same time as the latest release it's mostly working, even if some stuff takes a bit of finding. Main grumble is that it's showing no comments from me, not even the latest ones.

I've been reading the Guardian for 45 years. It's been a great newspaper, but now I'm getting disappointed in what seems to me to be too much negative bashing of the Labour Party leadership. They've made mistakes, for sure, but given that they have been in opposition for so long and inherited so many problems from the useless corrupt government that was in power for so long, they ought to be given more time to rectify all of the problems. Such negative reporting can only help the rightwing.

The latest update 29 SEP 25 has broken the app!!! No longer recognises my Google Play subscription and gives me Article Limit Reached error. please fix NOW. I see there is an update on 6 October 25 but I still cannot access any content.

title: Plex: Stream Movies & TV
description:
Discover what to watch next with Plex.

Find any show or movie and where it‚Äôs streaming, then add it to a universal Watchlist for easy access when you‚Äôre ready to press play. Plex is the only entertainment app that gives you every way to discover what you want to watch, easier than ever before. Stream movies and TV shows for free with the Plex personal media player. Connect with friends and fellow fans, and leave TV and movie reviews.

Plex offers a subscription-free streaming experience with access to 600+ channels and thousands of free movies and TV shows. Connect all your streaming services to watch TV and movies and see what‚Äôs trending across platforms. Plus create a universal Watchlist to keep track of everything you want to watch, no matter where it‚Äôs streaming.

Get free access to over 50,000 titles and 600+ TV channels, including live TV with sports, news, kids' shows, and more. Watch movies and your favorite TV series, all in one place.

Media streaming, organization, and sharing made easy with Plex. Spend less time searching and get movie night started faster when you add your favorite movie apps and streaming services to Plex. Plus, enjoy access to popular movie and TV options from A24, Paramount, AMC, Magnolia, Relativity, Lionsgate, and more!

Love Live TV? Watch free TV everywhere with Plex. Featuring an easy-to-use guide, Live TV on Plex includes over 600 free TV channels including The Hallmark Channel, FOX Sports, FIFA, WNBA, NFL Channel, PBS Antiques Roadshow and more! Start streaming and catch your favorites on Plex like The Walking Dead Universe, Ice Road Truckers, Game Show Central, and NBC News Now.

Now with Plex Rentals, you can rent classic movies or new releases fresh from theaters. Simply sign in, browse the Plex rentals library, and rent your favorite movies. Download the app now to enjoy your Plex media anywhere.

PLEX FEATURES

DISCOVER MORE WITH PLEX
- Save anything from anywhere and create one universal Watchlist of TV and movies
- Add your favorite movie apps or streaming services to see what‚Äôs streaming where
- Use our universal search to find what to watch next
- Leave a movie review and share movies and shows on your Watchlist
- Connect with friends to see what movies and TV shows they‚Äôre watching now
- React and comment on friends‚Äô activity
- Let the community know your thoughts with TV and movie reviews

WATCH FREE TV EVERYWHERE
- Live TV shows and over 600 channels at your fingertips, on every device
- Free TV streaming with categories including sports, true crime, game shows, and channels En Espa√±ol
- Live stream news and local TV channels like CBS, Financial Times, Euronews, and more

ALL NEW RENTALS
- Enjoy newly released movies and classic favorites with Plex Rentals
- Watch Dune 2, Civil War, Challengers, Godzilla Minus One, and more
- Rentals starting at just $3.99

PLEX PERSONAL MEDIA SERVER
- Plex scans, organizes and automatically sorts your personal media
- Movies and TV shows, all organized into personal media collections in our movie app
- Store your TV shows, movies, and stream on any device
- Download your personal media and watch without WiFi using our offline video player

Visit https://www.plex.tv/free for more information.

Note: Streaming personal media requires Plex Media Server version 1.41.2 and higher (available for free at https://plex.tv/downloads) installed and running to stream to other devices. DRM-protected content, ISO disc images, and video_ts folders are not supported. Some features of this app are supported by interest-based advertising, to learn more about this and your choices regarding it visit the Plex Privacy Policy.

Find any show or movie and where it‚Äôs streaming, then add it to a universal Watchlist for easy access when you‚Äôre ready to press play. Plex is the only entertainment app that gives you every way to discover what you want to watch, easier than ever before. Stream movies and TV shows for free with the Plex personal media player. Connect with friends and fellow fans, and leave TV and movie reviews.
